atk-s0201a:2056_8: ito paraṃ etesaṃ mahantabhāvakathā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2056_10: ito paraṃ tassa mahantabhāvakathā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2056_11: Iccāyasmā puṇṇo ekapadeneva theraṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ āhacca ṭhapento viya ukkhipi.
atk-s0201a:2057_0: Ettakampi no nappaṭibhāseyyāti paṭisambhidāpattassa appaṭibhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2057_4: Upamā hi ajānantānaṃ āharīyatīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:2057_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana idampi paṭikkhipitvā upamā nāma buddhānampi santike āharīyati,
atk-s0201a:2058_0: Anumassa anumassa pucchitāti dasa kathāvatthūni ogāhetvā ogāhetvā pucchitā.
atk-s0201a:2058_5: Sahetukaṃ vā sakāraṇaṃ katvā pucchanampi vissajjanampi bhāriyameva.
atk-s0201a:2062_2: Tattha nevāpikoti yo migānaṃ gahaṇatthāya araññe tiṇabījāni vapati “idaṃ tiṇaṃ khādituṃ āgate mige sukhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2062_8: taṇhāya hadayaṃ pavisitvā mucchanākāraṃ pāpitāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2062_14: Ekaṃ kira nivāpatiṇaṃ nāma atthi nidāghabhaddakaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2062_16: tathā tathā nīvāravanaṃ viya meghamālā viya ca ekagghanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2062_17: taṃ luddakā ekasmiṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne kasitvā vapitvā vatiṃ katvā dvāraṃ yojetvā rakkhanti.
atk-s0201a:2062_18: Atha yadā mahānidāghe sabbatiṇāni sukkhāni honti,
atk-s0201a:2062_20: tadā migajātā sukkhatiṇāni ceva purāṇapaṇṇāni ca khādantā kampamānā viya vicarantā nivāpatiṇassa gandhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2062_21: ghāyitvā vadhabandhanādīni agaṇayitvā vatiṃ ajjhottharantā pavisanti.
atk-s0201a:2062_22: Tesañhi nivāpatiṇaṃ ativiya piyaṃ hoti manāpaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2062_23: Nevāpiko te disvā dve tīṇi divasāni pamatto viya hoti,
atk-s0201a:2062_26: migā vivaṭadvārena pavisitvā khāditamattakaṃ pivitamattakameva katvā pakkamanti,
atk-s0201a:2062_27: punadivase kiñci na karontīti kaṇṇe cālayamānā khāditvā pivitvā ataramānā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2062_28: punadivase koci kiñci kattā natthīti yāvadatthaṃ khāditvā pivitvā maṇḍalagumbaṃ pavisitvā nipajjanti.
atk-s0201a:2062_29: Luddakā tesaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ jānitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya samparivāretvā koṭito paṭṭhāya koṭṭetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2062_30: evaṃ te tasmiṃ nivāpe nevāpikassa yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti.
atk-s0201a:2063_6: Bhagavā pana āgatapaṭipāṭivasena kappetvā paṭhamā, dutiyā, tatiyā,
atk-s0201a:2063_9: vasībhāvoyeva hi ettha iddhīti ca ānubhāvoti ca adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:2064_0: 263. Bhayabhogāti bhayena bhogato. Balavīriyanti aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇavāyodhātu, sā parihāyīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2065_1: Upanissāya āsayaṃ kappeyyāmāti anto nipajjitvā khādantānampi bhayameva,
atk-s0201a:2065_3: mayaṃ pana amuṃ nivāpaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya ekamante āsayaṃ kappeyyāmāti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2065_4: Upanissāya āsayaṃ kappayiṃsūti luddakā nāma na sabbakālaṃ appamattā honti.
atk-s0201a:2065_5: Mayaṃ tattha tattha maṇḍalagumbesu ceva vatipādesu ca nipajjitvā etesu mukhadhovanatthaṃ vā āhārakiccakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2065_6: vā pakkantesu nivāpavatthuṃ pavisitvā khāditamattaṃ katvā amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisissāmāti nivāpavatthuṃ
atk-s0201a:2065_8: Bhuñjiṃsūti vuttanayena luddakānaṃ pamādakālaṃ ñatvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ pavisitvā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2065_13: Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vāti iminā nāma ṭhānena āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2065_14: amutra gacchantīti idaṃ nesaṃ na jānāma.
atk-s0201a:2065_18: santikeyeva nipannā bhavissantīti nivāpakkhettassa samantā sappadesaṃ mahantaṃ okāsaṃ anuparivāresuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2065_19: Addasaṃsūti evaṃ parivāretvā vākarajālaṃ samantato cāletvā olokentā addasaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2065_20: Yattha teti yasmiṃ ṭhāne te gāhaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2066_1: Yaṃnūna mayaṃ yattha agatīti te kira evaṃ cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0201a:2066_3: bāhirato āgantvā khādantānampi santike vasitvā khādantānampi bhayameva,
atk-s0201a:2066_6: “yaṃnūna mayaṃ yattha nevāpikassa ca nevāpikaparisāya ca agati avisayo,
atk-s0201a:2066_8: Aññe ghaṭṭessantīti tato tato dūrataravāsino aññe ghaṭṭessanti.
atk-s0201a:2066_9: Te ghaṭṭitā aññeti tepi ghaṭṭitā aññe tato dūrataravāsino ghaṭṭessanti.
atk-s0201a:2066_10: Evaṃ imaṃ nivāpaṃ nivuttaṃ sabbaso migajātā parimuccissantīti evaṃ imaṃ amhehi nivuttaṃ nivāpaṃ sabbe
atk-s0201a:2066_13: yathā tathā āgacchantesu hi taruṇapotako vā mahallako vā dubbalo vā yūthaparihīno vā sakkā honti laddhuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2067_1: Amuṃ nivāpaṃ nivuttaṃ mārassa amūni ca lokāmisānīti ettha nivāpoti vā lokāmisānīti vā vaṭṭāmisabhūtānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2067_2: Māro na ca bījāni viya kāmaguṇe vapento āhiṇḍati,
atk-s0201a:2067_4: tasmā kāmaguṇā mārassa nivāpā nāma honti.
atk-s0201a:2067_7: Na parimucciṃsu mārassa iddhānubhāvāti mārassa vasaṃ gatā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2068_1: Cetovimutti parihāyīti ettha cetovimutti nāma araññe vasissāmāti uppannaajjhāsayo;
atk-s0201a:2068_3: Tathūpame ahaṃ ime dutiyeti ayaṃ brāhmaṇadhammikapabbajjāya upamā.
atk-s0201a:2068_4: Brāhmaṇā hi aṭṭhacattālīsavassāni komārabrahmacariyaṃ caritvā vaṭṭupacchedabhayena paveṇiṃ ghaṭayissāmāti
atk-s0201a:2068_5: dhanaṃ pariyesitvā bhariyaṃ gahetvā agāramajjhe vasantā ekasmiṃ putte jāte “amhākaṃ putto jāto vaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0201a:2068_6: na ucchinnaṃ paveṇi ghaṭitā”ti puna nikkhamitvā pabbajanti vā tameva vā sa’kalattavāsaṃ vasanti.
atk-s0201a:2069_3: tatiyāpi samaṇabrāhmaṇā na parimucciṃsūti purimā viya tepi mārassa iddhānubhāvā na mucciṃsu;
atk-s0201a:2069_6: Gāmanigamarājadhāniyo osaritvā tesu tesu ārāmauyyānaṭṭhānesu assamaṃ māpetvā nivasantā kuladārake hatthiassarathasippādīni
atk-s0201a:2069_8: Iti te vākarajālena tatiyā migajātā viya mārassa pāpimato diṭṭhijālena parikkhipitvā yathākāmakaraṇīyā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2070_0: 270. Tathūpame ahaṃ ime catuttheti ayaṃ imassa sāsanassa upamā āhaṭā.
atk-s0201a:2071_1: Andhamakāsi māranti na mārassa akkhīni bhindi.
atk-s0201a:2071_2: Vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpannassa pana bhikkhuno imaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya cittaṃ vattatīti māro passituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2071_5: Apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhunti teneva pariyāyena yathā mārassa cakkhu apadaṃ hoti nippadaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2071_9: Adassanaṃ gato pāpimatoti teneva pariyāyena mārassa pāpimato adassanaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a:2071_10: Na hi so attano maṃsacakkhunā tassa vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno ñāṇasarīraṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2071_11: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti maggapaññāya cattāri ariyasaccāni disvā cattāro āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
atk-s0201a:2071_12: Tiṇṇo loke visattikanti loke sattavisattabhāvena visattikāti evaṃ saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2071_24: visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe”ti visattikā.
atk-s0201a:2071_25: Evaṃ visattikāti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ taṇhaṃ tiṇṇo nittiṇṇo uttiṇṇo.
atk-s0201a:2075_4: Ete kira pañcasatā bhikkhū janapadavāsino “dasabalaṃ passissāmā”ti sāvatthiṃ anuppattā.
atk-s0201a:2075_13: mahāaggikkhandho viya ca durāsadā vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0201a:2077_0: Nāgova kuñjaro dantī, evaṃ buddhā durāsadā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2078_0: Evaṃ durāsadaṃ satthāraṃ te bhikkhū sayaṃ yācituṃ asakkontā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ yācamānā “sādhu mayaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2079_1: Kasmā pana thero te bhikkhū “rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assamaṃ upasaṅkameyyāthā”ti āha?
atk-s0201a:2079_3: Dasabalassa hi kiriyā therassa pākaṭā hoti;
atk-s0201a:2079_5: “ajja satthā jetavane vasitvā pubbārāme divāvihāraṃ karissati;
atk-s0201a:2079_6: ajja pubbārāme vasitvā jetavane divāvihāraṃ karissati;
atk-s0201a:2079_8: ajja bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto imasmiṃ kāle janapadacārikaṃ nikkhamissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2079_9: Kiṃ panassa evaṃ jānanatthaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
atk-s0201a:2079_11: Yañhi divasaṃ bhagavā jetavane vasitvā pubbārāme divāvihāraṃ kātukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2079_14: Pubbārāme vasitvā jetavanaṃ divāvihārāya āgamanakālepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2080_0: Yadā pana ekako piṇḍāya pavisitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2080_1: tadā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdati.
atk-s0201a:2080_2: Thero “ajja bhagavā bodhaneyyabandhavaṃ disvā nisinno”ti tāya saññāya ñatvā “ajja, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2080_4: tumhe bhikkhācārasajjā hothā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ saññaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2080_6: tadā gandhakuṭidvāraṃ upaḍḍhapidahitaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdati,
atk-s0201a:2080_7: thero tāya saññāya ñatvā pattacīvaraggahaṇatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ saññaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2080_9: tadā ekaṃ dve ālope atirekaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-s0201a:2080_13: tumhākaṃ kattabbaṃ karothā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ saññaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2081_0: Bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso ahosi,
atk-s0201a:2081_1: pacchā pañcavīsati vassāni abbokiṇṇaṃ sāvatthiṃyeva upanissāya vasanto ekadivase dve ṭhānāni paribhuñjati.
atk-s0201a:2081_2: Jetavane rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:2081_4: Pubbārāme rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase pācīnadvārena sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavane divāvihāraṃ karoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2081_6: Manussattabhāve ṭhitena hi anāthapiṇḍikena viya aññena kenaci,
atk-s0201a:2081_7: mātugāmattabhāve ṭhitāya ca visākhāya viya aññāya itthiyā tathāgataṃ uddissa dhanapariccāgo kato nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2081_8: tasmā bhagavā tesaṃ anukampāya ekadivase imāni dve ṭhānāni paribhuñjati.
atk-s0201a:2081_11: “ajja bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā sāyanhakāle gattāni parisiñcanatthāya pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ gamissati;
atk-s0201a:2081_12: athāhaṃ gattāni parisiñcitvā ṭhitaṃ bhagavantaṃ yācitvā rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assamaṃ gahetvā gamissāmi.
atk-s0201a:2081_13: Evamime bhikkhū bhagavato sammukhā labhissanti dhammakathaṃ savanāyā”ti cintetvā te bhikkhū evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2082_1: Sā hi migārena seṭṭhinā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapitattā migāramātāti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2082_2: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tasmiṃ kira pāsāde dvinnaṃ mahāsāvakānaṃ sirigabbhānaṃ majjhe bhagavato sirigabbho ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2082_3: Thero dvāraṃ vivaritvā antogabbhaṃ sammajjitvā mālākacavaraṃ nīharitvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā satthu saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2082_4: Satthā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ upagamma darathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā
atk-s0201a:2082_5: uṭṭhāya phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīditvā sāyanhasamaye tato vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2083_0: Parisiñcitunti yo hi cuṇṇamattikādīhi gattāni ubbaṭṭento mallakamuṭṭhādīhi vā ghaṃsanto nhāyati,
atk-s0201a:2083_4: Bhagavatopi sarīre tathā haritabbaṃ rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati,
atk-s0201a:2083_5: utuggahaṇatthaṃ pana bhagavā kevalaṃ udakaṃ otarati. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2084_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira vihāro kadāci mahā hoti kadāci khuddako.
atk-s0201a:2084_1: Tathā hi so vipassissa bhagavato kāle yojaniko ahosi,
atk-s0201a:2084_8: Tampi nagaraṃ tassa vihārassa kadāci pācīnato hoti,
atk-s0201a:2084_12: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyaṃ pana catunnaṃ mañcapādānaṃ patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ acalameva.
atk-s0201a:2085_0: Cattāri hi acalacetiyaṭṭhānāni nāma mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ isipatane dhammacakkappavattanaṭṭhānaṃ saṅkassanagaradvāre
atk-s0201a:2085_2: Ayaṃ pana pubbakoṭṭhako kassapadasabalassa vīsatiusabhavihārakāle pācīnadvāre koṭṭhako ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2085_4: Kassapadasabalassa kāle aciravatī nagaraṃ parikkhipitvā sandamānā pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ patvā udakena bhinditvā
atk-s0201a:2085_9: ekaṃ buddhānanti evaṃ pāṭiyekkāni nhānatitthāni honti ramaṇīyāni vippakiṇṇarajatapaṭṭasadisavālikāni.
atk-s0201a:2085_10: Iti bhagavā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ yena ayaṃ evarūpo pubbakoṭṭhako tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
atk-s0201a:2085_13: Thero dupaṭṭena saddhiṃ mahācīvaraṃ attano hatthagatamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2085_15: Sahotaraṇenevassa udake macchakacchapā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2085_16: Yantanālikāhi suvaṇṇarasadhārānisiñcamānakālo viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāraṇakālo viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2085_17: Atha bhagavato nhānavattaṃ dassetvā nhatvā paccuttiṇṇassa thero rattadupaṭṭaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0201a:2085_18: Bhagavā taṃ nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā mahācīvaraṃ antantena saṃharitvā padumagabbhasadisaṃ
atk-s0201a:2085_19: katvā upanītaṃ dvīsu kaṇṇesu gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2086_0: Evaṃ ṭhitassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitakamaluppalasaraṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ pāricchattakaṃ tārāmarīcivikasitaṃ
atk-s0201a:2086_1: ca gaganatalaṃ siriyā avahasamānaṃ viya virocittha.
atk-s0201a:2086_2: Byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī cassa dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇamālā ganthetvā ṭhapitā dvattiṃsacandamālā viya,
atk-s0201a:2086_4: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitā dvattiṃsacakkavatti dvattiṃsadevarājā dvattiṃsamahābrahmāno viya ca ativiya virocittha,
atk-s0201a:2086_6: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu buddhānaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ vā guṇavaṇṇaṃ vā cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthāhi vā atthañca upamāyo
atk-s0201a:2086_7: ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā paṭibalena dhammakathikena pūretvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti evarūpesu ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa
atk-s0201a:2087_1: Gattāni pubbāpayamānoti pakatibhāvaṃ gamayamāno nirudakāni kurumāno,
atk-s0201a:2087_3: Sodakena gattena cīvaraṃ pārupantassa hi cīvare kaṇṇikā uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0201a:2087_5: Buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati;
atk-s0201a:2087_6: padumapatte pakkhittaudakabindu viya udakaṃ vinivattetvā gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2087_8: “pabbajitavattaṃ nāmeta”nti mahācīvaraṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā purato kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2087_10: “bhagavā mahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā migāramātupāsādaṃ ārabbha gamanābhihārato paṭṭhāya dunnivattiyo bhavissati;
atk-s0201a:2087_11: buddhānañhi adhippāyakopanaṃ nāma ekacārikasīhassa gahaṇatthaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya;
atk-s0201a:2087_13: uggatejassa āsīvisassa gīvāya gahaṇaṃ viya ca bhāriyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2087_14: Idheva rammakassa brāhmaṇassa assamassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā tattha gamanatthāya bhagavantaṃ yācissāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2088_0: Tattha anukampaṃ upādāyāti bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sossāmāti taṃ assamaṃ gatānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ anukampaṃ paṭicca,
atk-s0201a:2088_2: Dhammiyā kathāyāti dasasu pāramitāsu aññatarāya pāramiyā ceva mahābhinikkhamanassa ca vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānā sannisinnā honti.
atk-s0201a:2088_4: Ahaṃ buddhoti sahasā appavisitvā yāva sā kathā niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2088_6: Aggaḷaṃ ākoṭesīti agganakhena kavāṭe saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2088_7: Vivariṃsūti sotaṃ odahitvāva nisinnattā taṅkhaṇaṃyeva āgantvā vivariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2089_0: Paññatte āsaneti buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati,
atk-s0201a:2089_2: Bhagavā kira attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti “asuko mayhaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gato,
atk-s0201a:2089_3: sakkhissati nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ no vā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2089_4: Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā akusalavitakke vitakkayamānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2089_5: tato “kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā
atk-s0201a:2089_6: abhibhavitvā anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī”ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā taṃ
atk-s0201a:2089_7: kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2089_9: “satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti;
atk-s0201a:2089_17: so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā kaṭṭhaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā vālikapuñjaṃ vā paññapeti.
atk-s0201a:2089_18: Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṅkaḍḍhitvā tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a:2090_0: Kāya nutthāti katamāya nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2090_5: Antarā kathāti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārauddesaparipucchādīnaṃ antarā aññā ekā kathā.
atk-s0201a:2090_6: Vippakatāti mama āgamanapaccayā apariniṭṭhitā sikhaṃ appattā.
atk-s0201a:2090_7: Atha bhagavā anuppattoti atha etasmiṃ kāle bhagavā āgato.
atk-s0201a:2090_8: Dhammī vā kathāti dasakathāvatthunissitā vā dhammī kathā.
atk-s0201a:2090_9: Ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvoti ettha pana dutiyajjhānampi ariyo tuṇhībhāvo mūlakammaṭṭhānampi.
atk-s0201a:2090_11: mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnopi bhikkhu ariyena tuṇhībhāvena nisinnoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2091_3: Te bhikkhū sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sossāmāti therassa bhāraṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2091_5: Te tattha nisīditvā atiracchānakathikā hutvā dhammiyā kathāya nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2091_6: Atha bhagavā “ayaṃ tumhākaṃ pariyesanā ariyapariyesanā nāmā”ti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2091_9: anariyapariyesanāti ettha yathā maggakusalo puriso paṭhamaṃ vajjetabbaṃ apāyamaggaṃ dassento “vāmaṃ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2091_10: Evaṃ bhagavā desanākusalatāya paṭhamaṃ vajjetabbaṃ anariyapariyesanaṃ ācikkhitvā pacchā itaraṃ ācikkhissāmīti uddesānukkamaṃ bhinditvā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2092_9: na hetassa sīsarogādayo byādhayo nāma honti,
atk-s0201a:2092_12: Ayādīhi pana saṃkilesehi saṃkilissatīti saṃkilesadhammavāre gahitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2093_4: ayaṃ niddosatāyapi ariyehi pariyesitabbatāyapi ariyapariyesanāti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2094_7: Svāhaṃ taṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:2094_9: Te taṃ pahāya ariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesitvā khīṇāsavabhūmiṃ pattā.
atk-s0201a:2094_10: Tumhepi mama ceva pañcavaggiyānañca maggaṃ āruḷhā.
atk-s0201a:2094_11: Ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ pariyesanā”ti mūlato paṭṭhāya attano mahābhinikkhamanaṃ dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2095_15: Yena āḷāro kālāmoti ettha āḷāroti tassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2095_20: Yattha viññū purisoti yasmiṃ dhamme paṇḍito puriso.
atk-s0201a:2095_24: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ tesaṃ samayaṃ tantiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2096_6: Ahañceva aññe cāti na kevalaṃ ahaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2096_8: Kevalaṃ saddhāmattakenāti paññāya asacchikatvā suddhena saddhāmattakeneva.
atk-s0201a:2096_11: addhā esa sattannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ lābhī”ti aññāsi,
atk-s0201a:2097_0: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ pavedesīti ākiñcaññāyatanapariyosānā satta samāpattiyo maṃ jānāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2097_1: Saddhāti imāsaṃ sattannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ nibbattanatthāya saddhā.
atk-s0201a:2097_4: Nacirasseva taṃ dhammaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsinti bodhisatto kira vīriyaṃ paggahetvā
atk-s0201a:2097_5: katipāhaññeva satta suvaṇṇanisseṇiyo pasārento viya satta samāpattiyo nibbattesi;
atk-s0201a:2098_3: kinti katvā imaṃ dhammaṃ nibbattesī”ti usūyaṃ akatvā pasanno pasādaṃ pavedento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2098_4: Ubhova santā imaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāmāti “mahā ayaṃ gaṇo,
atk-s0201a:2098_5: dvepi janā pariharāmā”ti vatvā gaṇassa saññaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0201a:2098_8: ettakā janā mahāpurisassa santike parikammaṃ uggaṇhatha,
atk-s0201a:2098_11: Pūjāyāti kālāmassa kira upaṭṭhākā itthiyopi purisāpi gandhamālādīni gahetvā āgacchanti. Kālāmo –
atk-s0201a:2098_14: Te taṃ pūjetvā yaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2098_17: tānipi mahāpurisassa dāpetvā yadi avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2098_19: Gatagataṭṭhāne varasenāsanaṃ bodhisattassa jaggāpetvā sesakaṃ attanā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2098_21: Nāyaṃ dhammo nibbidāyātiādīsu ayaṃ sattasamāpattidhammo neva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya,
atk-s0201a:2099_0: Yāvadeva ākiñcaññāyatanūpapattiyāti yāva saṭṭhikappasahassāyuparimāṇe ākiñcaññāyatanabhave upapatti,
atk-s0201a:2099_6: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana mahāsatto yathā nāma chātajjhattapuriso manuññabhojanaṃ labhitvā sampiyāyamānopi
atk-s0201a:2099_7: bhuñjitvā pittavasena vā semhavasena vā makkhikāvasena vā chaḍḍetvā puna ekaṃ piṇḍampi bhuñjissāmīti
atk-s0201a:2099_9: evameva imā satta samāpattiyo mahantena ussāhena nibbattetvāpi,
atk-s0201a:2099_11: puna imaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjissāmi vā samāpajjissāmi vā adhiṭṭhahissāmi vā vuṭṭhahissāmi vā paccavekkhissāmi vāti cittameva na uppādesi.
atk-s0201a:2100_1: Na kho rāmo imaṃ dhammanti idhāpi bodhisatto taṃ dhammaṃ uggaṇhantoyeva aññāsi –
atk-s0201a:2101_1: Yena uruvelā senānigamoti ettha uruvelāti mahāvelā,
atk-s0201a:2101_5: velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2101_6: Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassā kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃ padese viharantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā katikavattaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0201a:2101_9: Tasmā yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi,
atk-s0201a:2101_11: so attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālikaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ākiratu,
atk-s0201a:2101_13: Tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi,
atk-s0201a:2101_16: Tato taṃ pacchimā janatā parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi;
atk-s0201a:2101_23: Velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
atk-s0201a:2102_1: Paṭhamakappikānaṃ kira tasmiṃ ṭhāne senāniveso ahosi;
atk-s0201a:2102_9: Nadiñca sandantinti sandamānañca maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ vimalanīlasītalasalilaṃ nerañjaraṃ nadiṃ addasaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2102_13: Samantā ca gocaragāmanti tassa padesassa samantā avidūre gamanāgamanasampannaṃ sampattapabbajitānaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ gocaragāmañca addasaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2102_19: Alamidaṃ padhānāyāti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ padhānatthāya samatthanti evaṃ cintetvā nisīdinti attho.
atk-s0201a:2103_2: Ñāṇañca pana me dassananti sabbadhammadassanasamatthañca me sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0201a:2103_3: Akuppā me vimuttīti mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppatāya ca akuppārammaṇatāya ca akuppā,
atk-s0201a:2103_4: sā hi rāgādīhi na kuppatīti akuppatāyapi akuppā,
atk-s0201a:2103_7: Natthi dāni punabbhavoti idāni me puna paṭisandhi nāma natthīti evaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi me uppannanti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2104_12: Atakkāvacaroti takkena avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2104_23: Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati,
atk-s0201a:2104_29: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento “ālayarāmā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2105_5: idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0201a:2105_8: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-s0201a:2105_10: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti,
atk-s0201a:2105_14: tasmā sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodhoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2105_16: phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2105_18: So mamassa kilamathoti yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma,
atk-s0201a:2105_21: Kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca assāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2106_3: Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2106_7: kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti evamādīni dentassa,
atk-s0201a:2106_8: aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamaniyapaṭipadaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2106_13: evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa alaṃ desituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2107_0: Paṭisotagāminti niccādīnaṃ paṭisotaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti evaṃ gataṃ catusaccadhammaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2107_1: Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena ca rattā.
atk-s0201a:2107_2: Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti,
atk-s0201a:2107_3: te apassante ko sakkhissati evaṃ gāhāpetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2111_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0201a:2111_2: tadevaṃ paccavekkhaṇānubhāvena panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0201a:2111_3: Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2111_4: dhammassa ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0201a:2111_8: añjanamakkhitahattho viya ca kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā,
atk-s0201a:2111_9: te kiṃ nāma paṭivijjhissantī”ti cintayato kilesagahanapaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenāpi evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0201a:2112_1: pabbatena paṭicchādetvā ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso,
atk-s0201a:2112_2: satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭipaṭipādanaṃ viya duranubodho.
atk-s0201a:2112_3: Nanu mayā hi imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2112_6: Tassa me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassāpi pathavī na kampittha,
atk-s0201a:2112_9: pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0201a:2112_10: Iti mādisenāpi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo paṭividdho,
atk-s0201a:2112_11: taṃ lokiyamahājanā kathaṃ paṭivijjhissantī”ti dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenāpi evaṃ cittaṃ namīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2113_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0201a:2113_2: “mama appossukkatāya citte namamāne maṃ mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0201a:2113_4: te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0201a:2113_9: Idampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami,
atk-s0201a:2114_0: Sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyukabrahmā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0201a:2114_5: bhoti so kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāresi,
atk-s0201a:2114_7: Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma loke.
atk-s0201a:2114_8: Purato pāturahosīti tehi dasahi brahmasahassehi saddhiṃ pāturahosi.
atk-s0201a:2114_9: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2114_12: Bhavissantīti purimabuddhesu dasapuññakiriyavasena katādhikārā paripākagatapadumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2114_13: dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā catuppadikagāthāvasāne ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve,
atk-s0201a:2115_1: Samalehi cintitoti samalehi chahi satthārehi cintito.
atk-s0201a:2115_2: Te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe kaṇṭake pattharamānā viya,
atk-s0201a:2115_3: visaṃ siñcamānā viya ca samalaṃ micchādiṭṭhidhammaṃ desayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2115_5: Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa dvārabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2115_6: Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato vimalena sammāsambuddhena anubuddhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2116_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathā ṭhitova.
atk-s0201a:2116_1: Na hi tassa ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0201a:2116_4: yathā selapabbatamuddhani ṭhitova cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
atk-s0201a:2116_7: sabbaññutaññāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtaṃ
atk-s0201a:2116_10: yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2116_12: atha tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2116_17: Evaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa,
atk-s0201a:2116_19: te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2116_22: te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2116_23: so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca.
atk-s0201a:2118_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2119_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati.
atk-s0201a:2120_6: Apparajakkhetiādīsu yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2121_46: Iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2121_48: Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati aññāsi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0201a:2122_3: Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0201a:2122_5: tāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni.
atk-s0201a:2122_10: Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarogauppalādīni nāma atthi,
atk-s0201a:2123_1: evameva ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti cattāro puggalā.
atk-s0201a:2123_2: Tattha “yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2123_4: Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2123_6: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2123_8: Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2123_10: Tattha bhagavā uppalavanādisadisaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokento “ajja pupphanakāni viya ugghaṭitaññū,
atk-s0201a:2123_16: tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākāratova addasa.
atk-s0201a:2124_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0201a:2124_2: Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ uppādetvā puna
atk-s0201a:2124_3: sabbepi tīsu bhavesu satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2124_6: ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā assaddhā
atk-s0201a:2124_7: acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2124_12: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā “ettakā rāgacaritā,
atk-s0201a:2124_13: ettakā dosamohacaritā vitakkasaddhābuddhicaritā”ti cha koṭṭhāse akāsi;
atk-s0201a:2125_5: Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ pamuñcantu,
atk-s0201a:2125_8: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2125_9: Idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu,
atk-s0201a:2126_4: kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyanti ayaṃ dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko udapādīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2127_1: bodhisatto kira mahābhinikkhamanadivase vivaṭaṃ itthāgāraṃ disvā saṃviggahadayo,
atk-s0201a:2127_2: “kaṇḍakaṃ āharā”ti channaṃ āmantetvā channasahāyo assarājapiṭṭhigato nagarato nikkhamitvā kaṇḍakanivattanacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2127_3: nāma dassetvā tīṇi rajjāni atikkamma anomānadītīre pabbajitvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno rājagahe piṇḍāya
atk-s0201a:2127_4: caritvā paṇḍavapabbate nisinno magadhissarena raññā nāmagottaṃ pucchitvā,
atk-s0201a:2127_8: ahaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya lokahitatthāya padhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā loke vivaṭacchado bhavissāmīti nikkhanto”ti vatvā,
atk-s0201a:2127_9: “tena hi buddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ mayhaṃ vijitaṃ osareyyāsī”ti paṭiññaṃ gahito kālāmañca udakañca upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0201a:2127_10: tesaṃ dhammadesanāya sāraṃ avindanto tato pakkamitvā uruveḷāya chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi amataṃ
atk-s0201a:2128_0: Tadā ca uruvelagāme sujātā nāma kuṭumbiyadhītā ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe patthanamakāsi –
atk-s0201a:2128_1: “sacāhaṃ samānajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2128_4: Sā visākhapuṇṇamadivase pātova balikammaṃ karissāmīti rattiyā paccūsasamaye eva pāyasaṃ paṭiyādesi.
atk-s0201a:2128_5: Tasmiṃ pāyase paccamāne mahantamahantā pupphuḷā uṭṭhahitvā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭā hutvā sañcaranti.
atk-s0201a:2128_10: Devatā catūsu dīpesu ojaṃ saṃharitvā tattha pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2128_11: Bodhisatto bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno pātova gantvā rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2128_12: Rukkhamūle sodhanatthāya gatā dhātī āgantvā sujātāya ārocesi –
atk-s0201a:2128_14: sabbaṃ pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā satasahassagghanike suvaṇṇathāle pāyasaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā
atk-s0201a:2128_15: pidahitvā ukkhipitvā gatā mahāpurisaṃ disvā saheva pātiyā hatthe ṭhapetvā vanditvā “yathā mayhaṃ manoratho
atk-s0201a:2129_0: Bodhisatto nerañjarāya tīraṃ gantvā suvaṇṇathālaṃ tīre ṭhapetvā nhatvā paccuttaritvā ekūnapaṇṇāsapiṇḍe
atk-s0201a:2129_1: karonto pāyasaṃ paribhuñjitvā “sacāhaṃ ajja buddho bhavāmi,
atk-s0201a:2129_3: Thālaṃ paṭisotaṃ gantvā thokaṃ ṭhatvā kālanāgarājassa bhavanaṃ pavisitvā tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ thālāni ukkhipitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2130_0: Mahāsatto vanasaṇḍe divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sottiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2130_1: So padeso paduminipatte udakabindu viya akampittha.
atk-s0201a:2130_3: “ayaṃ mama guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkotī”ti pacchimadisābhāgaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0201a:2130_8: tattha pallaṅkappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ sunikhātaindakhilo viya niccalamahosi.
atk-s0201a:2130_9: Mahāsatto “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ kilesabhañjanaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi.
atk-s0201a:2130_10: Tāni cittakārena tūlikaggena paricchinnāni viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2130_12: “bodhiṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmī”ti caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2131_0: Taṅkhaṇaññeva māro bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ girimekhalaṃ nāma hatthiṃ āruyha navayojanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2131_1: mārabalaṃ gahetvā addhakkhikena olokayamāno pabbato viya ajjhottharanto upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2131_3: “mayhaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūrentassa añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā sakkhi natthi,
atk-s0201a:2131_4: vessantarattabhāve pana mayhaṃ sattasu vāresu mahāpathavī sakkhi ahosi;
atk-s0201a:2131_5: idānipi me ayameva acetanā kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamā mahāpathavī sakkhī”ti hatthaṃ pasāreti.
atk-s0201a:2131_6: Mahāpathavī tāvadeva ayadaṇḍena pahataṃ kaṃsathālaṃ viya ravasataṃ ravasahassaṃ muñcamānā viravitvā parivattamānā
atk-s0201a:2131_8: Mahāsatto sūriye dharamāneyeva mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2131_9: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ sammasitvā aruṇodaye buddho hutvā,
atk-s0201a:2131_10: “mayā anekakappakoṭisatasahassaṃ addhānaṃ imassa pallaṅkassa atthāya vāyāmo kato”ti sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2131_12: “kiṃ nu kho aññepi buddhattakarā dhammā atthī”ti kaṅkhā udapādi.
atk-s0201a:2132_0: Atha bhagavā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya devatānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā
atk-s0201a:2132_1: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vidhamitvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā
atk-s0201a:2132_2: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkañceva bodhirukkhañca
atk-s0201a:2133_0: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0201a:2133_3: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0201a:2133_5: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0201a:2133_6: tatrāpi dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi,
atk-s0201a:2133_7: dhammaṃ vicinanto cettha evaṃ abhidhamme nayamaggaṃ sammasi –
atk-s0201a:2134_0: Tatthassa saṇhasukhumapaṭṭhānamhi citte otiṇṇe pīti uppajji;
atk-s0201a:2134_3: Chaviyā pasannāya puratthimakāyato kūṭāgārādippamāṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ākāse pakkhandachaddantanāgakulaṃ
atk-s0201a:2134_7: vāmaṃsakūṭato uṭṭhahitvā uttaradisāya anantāni cakkavāḷāni pakkhandā,
atk-s0201a:2134_8: pādatalehi pavāḷaṅkuravaṇṇā rasmiyo nikkhamitvā mahāpathaviṃ vinivijjhitvā udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā vātakkhandhaṃ padāletvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā,
atk-s0201a:2134_9: sīsato samparivattiyamānaṃ maṇidāmaṃ viya nīlavaṇṇā rasmivaṭṭi uṭṭhahitvā cha devaloke vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0201a:2134_10: nava brahmaloke vehapphale pañca suddhāvāse ca vinivijjhitvā cattāro āruppe atikkamma ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandā.
atk-s0201a:2134_11: Tasmiṃ divase aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇā sattā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2134_12: Taṃ divasañca pana bhagavato sarīrā nikkhantā yāvajjadivasāpi tā rasmiyo anantā lokadhātuyo gacchantiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2135_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ajapālanigrodhe sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā tato aparaṃ sattāhaṃ mucalinde nisīdi,
atk-s0201a:2135_1: nisinnamattasseva cassa sakalaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento mahāakālamegho udapādi.
atk-s0201a:2135_2: Evarūpo kira mahāmegho dvīsuyeva kālesu vassati cakkavattimhi vā uppanne buddhe vā.
atk-s0201a:2135_4: Tasmiṃ pana uppanne mucalindo nāgarājā cintesi –
atk-s0201a:2135_5: “ayaṃ megho satthari mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhamatteva uppanno,
atk-s0201a:2135_7: So sattaratanamayaṃ pāsādaṃ nimminituṃ sakkontopi evaṃ kate mayhaṃ mahapphalaṃ na bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2135_8: dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmīti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ dhāresi.
atk-s0201a:2135_9: Parikkhepassa anto okāso heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇo ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2135_10: Icchiticchitena iriyāpathena satthā viharissatīti nāgarājassa ajjhāsayo ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2135_16: Evaṃ bhagavā taṃ sattāhaṃ tattha vītināmetvā tato aparaṃ sattāhaṃ rājāyatane nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2136_0: Aṭṭhame sattāhe sakkena devānamindena ābhataṃ dantakaṭṭhañca osadhaharītakañca khāditvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a:2136_1: catūhi lokapālehi upanīte paccagghe selamaye patte tapussabhallikānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā puna paccāgantvā
atk-s0201a:2136_2: ajapālanigrodhe nisinnassa sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇo ayaṃ vitakko udapādi.
atk-s0201a:2137_5: Ñāṇañca pana meti mayhampi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0201a:2137_6: Bhagavā kira devatāya kathiteneva niṭṭhaṃ agantvā sayampi sabbaññutaññāṇena olokento ito sattamadivasamatthake
atk-s0201a:2137_10: Mahājāniyoti sattadivasabbhantare pattabbamaggaphalato parihīnattā mahatī jāni assāti mahājāniyo.
atk-s0201a:2137_11: Akkhaṇe nibbattattā gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa sotuṃ sotappasādo natthi,
atk-s0201a:2137_15: Ñāṇañca pana meti mayhampi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0201a:2137_16: Idhāpi kira bhagavā devatāya vacanena sanniṭṭhānaṃ akatvā sabbaññutaññāṇena olokento “hiyyo aḍḍharatte
atk-s0201a:2137_17: kālaṅkatvā udako rāmaputto nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nibbatto”ti addasa.
atk-s0201a:2137_21: Padhānapahitattaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsūti padhānatthāya pesitattabhāvaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pariveṇasammajjanena pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2137_23: Ke pana te pañcavaggiyā nāma? Yete –
atk-s0201a:2142_0: Bodhisattassa jātakāle supinapaṭiggāhakā ceva lakkhaṇapaṭiggāhakā ca aṭṭha brāhmaṇā.
atk-s0201a:2142_2: “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0201a:2142_9: Te attanā laddhaṃ puṇṇapattaṃ ñātakānaṃ vissajjetvā “ayaṃ mahāpuriso agāraṃ na ajjhāvasissati,
atk-s0201a:2142_10: ekantena buddho bhavissatī”ti nibbitakkā bodhisattaṃ uddissa samaṇapabbajjaṃ pabbajitā.
atk-s0201a:2143_0: Ete kira daharakāleyeva bahū mante jāniṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2143_2: Te pacchā amhehi puttadārajaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā na sakkā bhavissati pabbajitunti daharakāleyeva pabbajitvā ramaṇīyāni senāsanāni paribhuñjantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2143_6: tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakamajjhe devo viya sampattiṃ anubhotī”ti vadanti. Te sutvā,
atk-s0201a:2143_7: “na tāva mahāpurisassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gacchatī”ti appossukkā vihariṃsuyeva.
atk-s0201a:2143_13: Paricayavasena hesa āḷārañceva kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0201a:2143_14: Etasmiṃ pana buddhakkhette ṭhapetvā aññāsikoṇḍaññaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2144_0: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle dve bhātaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2144_2: Tattha jeṭṭhakassa “ekasmiṃ sasse navavāre aggasassadānaṃ mayā dātabba”nti ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2144_3: So vappakāle bījaggaṃ nāma datvā gabbhakāle kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ mantesi –
atk-s0201a:2144_6: Jeṭṭho kaniṭṭhassa ananuvattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā khettaṃ vibhajitvā attano koṭṭhāsato gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ nīharitvā sappiphāṇitehi yojetvā adāsi,
atk-s0201a:2144_8: lāyane lāyanaggaṃ veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ kalāpādīsu kalāpaggaṃ khaḷaggaṃ bhaṇḍaggaṃ koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasasse navavāre aggadānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2144_12: Iti ekasmiṃ sasse navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattā ṭhapetvā theraṃ añño paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2144_13: “Bahukārā kho ime pañcavaggiyā”ti idaṃ pana upakārānussaraṇamattakeneva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2145_0: Isipatane migadāyeti tasmiṃ kira padese anuppanne buddhe paccekasambuddhā gandhamādanapabbate sattāhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2145_1: nirodhasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā nirodhā vuṭṭhāya nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0201a:2145_3: Tattha cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā gamanakālepi tatoyeva uppatitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2145_4: Iti isayo ettha nipatanti uppatanti cāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ isipatananti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2145_5: Migānaṃ pana abhayatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2146_1: Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhinti gayāya ca bodhissa ca vivare tigāvutantare ṭhāne.
atk-s0201a:2146_4: Upako bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:2146_6: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti.
atk-s0201a:2146_12: Addhānamaggagamanasamayassa hi vibhaṅge “addhayojanaṃ gacchissāmīti bhuñjitabba”ntiādivacanato addhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2147_2: Sabbesu dhammesu anupalittoti sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu kilesalepanena anupalitto.
atk-s0201a:2147_3: Sabbaṃ jahoti sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2147_4: Taṇhākkhaye vimuttoti taṇhākkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto.
atk-s0201a:2147_5: Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti sabbaṃ catubhūmakadhammaṃ attanāva jānitvā.
atk-s0201a:2147_6: Kamuddiseyyanti kaṃ aññaṃ “ayaṃ me ācariyo”ti uddiseyyaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2148_0: Na me ācariyo atthīti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2148_1: Natthi me paṭipuggaloti mayhaṃ paṭibhāgapuggalo nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2148_2: Sammāsambuddhoti sahetunā nayena cattāri saccāni sayaṃ buddho.
atk-s0201a:2148_6: Āhañchaṃ amatadundubhinti dhammacakkapaṭilābhāya amatabheriṃ paharissāmīti gacchāmi.
atk-s0201a:2149_4: migaluddako dūre migavaṃ gacchanto “amhākaṃ arahante mā pamajjī”ti chāvaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi.
atk-s0201a:2149_5: Sā cassa dhītā dassanīyā hoti koṭṭhāsasampannā.
atk-s0201a:2149_6: Dutiyadivase upako gharaṃ āgato taṃ dārikaṃ sabbaṃ upacāraṃ katvā parivisituṃ upagataṃ disvā rāgena abhibhūto
atk-s0201a:2149_7: bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ ekamante nikkhipitvā sace
atk-s0201a:2149_10: Sattame divase māgaviko āgantvā dhītaraṃ upakassa pavattiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2149_12: Māgaviko āgataveseneva naṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmīti taṃkhaṇaṃyeva gantvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2149_23: kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena sakkā gharāvāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātunti.
atk-s0201a:2150_4: “amhākampi etadeva ruccatī”ti uttarasāṭakaṃ datvā gharaṃ ānetvā dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2150_8: migaluddakassa putta mā rodī”tiādīni vadamānā puttatosanagītena upakaṃ uppaṇḍesi.
atk-s0201a:2150_12: Chāvā evamayaṃ aṭṭīyatīti ñatvā punappunaṃ katheti.
atk-s0201a:2151_0: Bhagavā ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane mahāvihāre.
atk-s0201a:2151_1: Atha kho bhagavā paṭikacceva bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “yo,
atk-s0201a:2151_5: Upakopi kho “kuhiṃ anantajino vasatī”ti pucchanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhatvā kuhiṃ anantajinoti pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2151_15: So kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karonto anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya kālaṃ katvā avihesu nibbatto.
atk-s0201a:2151_17: Avihesu nibbattamattā hi satta janā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2155_0: Upako palagaṇḍo ca, pukkusāti ca te tayo;
atk-s0201a:2156_0: Bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bahuraggi ca saṅgiyo;
atk-s0201a:2157_0: Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upajjhagu”nti. ;
atk-s0201a:2158_5: Apica kho āsanaṃ ṭhapetabbanti apica kho panassa uccakule nibbattassa āsanamattaṃ ṭhapetabbanti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2158_6: Nāsakkhiṃsūti buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā abhibhūtā attano katikāya ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2158_7: Nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācarantīti gotamāti,
atk-s0201a:2158_10: mayaṃ uruvelāyaṃ padhānakāle tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarimhā,
atk-s0201a:2158_14: kacci amhesu pakkantesu na cintayitthāti evarūpiṃ kathaṃ kathentīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2158_19: Abhijānātha me noti abhijānātha nu mama.
atk-s0201a:2158_20: Evarūpaṃ pabhāvitametanti etaṃ evarūpaṃ vākyabhedanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2158_21: Api nu ahaṃ uruvelāya padhāne tumhākaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ rattiṃ vā divā vā āgantvā, – “āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2158_23: mayhaṃ obhāso vā nimittaṃ vā paññāyatī”ti evarūpaṃ kañci vacanabhedaṃ akāsinti adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:2158_25: “handa addhā esa buddho jāto”ti saddahitvā no hetaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2158_31: pañcavaggiye bhikkhū buddho ahanti jānāpetuṃ asakkhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2158_33: Attano buddhabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā koṇḍaññattheraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2158_34: Suttapariyosāne thero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2159_2: bhikkhū ovadāmītiādi pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya piṇḍapātatthāyapi gāmaṃ appavisanadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2159_3: Tesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānesu uppannamalavisodhanatthaṃ bhagavā antovihāreyeva ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2159_4: Uppanne uppanne kammaṭṭhānamale tepi bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā pucchanti.
atk-s0201a:2159_5: Bhagavāpi tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā malaṃ vinodeti.
atk-s0201a:2159_6: Atha nesaṃ bhagavatā evaṃ nīhaṭabhattena ovadiyamānānaṃ vappatthero pāṭipadadivase sotāpanno ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2159_10: Pakkhassa pana pañcamiyaṃ sabbeva te ekato sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0201a:2159_17: Ettakaṃ kathāmaggaṃ bhagavā yaṃ pubbe avaca –
atk-s0201a:2159_19: ariyapariyesanā tumhākaṃ pariyesanā”ti imaṃ ekameva anusandhiṃ dassento āhari.
atk-s0201a:2160_1: Idāni yasmā na agāriyānaṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇapariyesanā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2160_2: anagāriyānampi cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantānaṃ pañcakāmaguṇavasena anariyapariyesanā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2160_6: Tattha navarattesu pattacīvarādīsu cakkhuviññeyyā rūpātiādayo cattāro kāmaguṇā labbhanti.
atk-s0201a:2160_8: Manuññe piṇḍapāte bhesajje ca pañcapi labbhanti.
atk-s0201a:2160_13: Evaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe dassetvā idāni ye evaṃ vadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2160_16: tesaṃ paṭisedhanatthāya “pabbajitānampi catūsu paccayesu appaccavekkhaṇaparibhogo anariyapariyesanā evā”ti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2161_0: Idāni tassatthassa sādhakaṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpi,
atk-s0201a:2161_4: luddakena araññe ṭhapitapāso viya cattāro paccayā,
atk-s0201a:2161_5: tassa luddassa pāsarāsiṃ ajjhottharitvā sayanakālo viya tesaṃ cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhogakālo.
atk-s0201a:2161_6: Luddake āgacchante magassa yena kāmaṃ agamanakālo viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyakālo,
atk-s0201a:2161_8: Magassa pana abaddhassa pāsarāsiṃ adhisayitakālo viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ catūsu paccayesu paccavekkhaṇaparibhogo,
atk-s0201a:2161_9: luddake āgacchante magassa yena kāmaṃ gamanaṃ viya samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ māravasaṃ anupagamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2166_11: setāya sudaṃ vālabījaniyā bījiyatī”ti evaṃ vuttena sakalasetena catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathena.
atk-s0201a:2167_8: Tattha chattaggāhako vālabījaniggāhako tālavaṇṭaggāhakoti evaṃ aṭṭha vā dasa vā sukhena ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2168_0: Sāvatthiyā niyyātīti so kira channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2168_1: Ito ettakehi divasehi nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karissatīti puretarameva ghosanā karīyati;
atk-s0201a:2168_2: taṃ sutvā ye nagarato na pakkantā,
atk-s0201a:2168_7: tadā pātova nagaravīthiyo sammajjitvā vālikaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamehi pupphehi abhippakiritvā puṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0201a:2168_8: ṭhapetvā kadaliyo ca dhaje ca ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhūpitavāsitaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2168_9: Brāhmaṇo pātova sīsaṃ nhāyitvā purebhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vuttanayeneva setavatthādīhi attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā pāsādā oruyha rathaṃ abhiruhati.
atk-s0201a:2168_10: Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā sabbasetavatthavilepanamālālaṅkārā setacchattāni gahetvā parivārenti;
atk-s0201a:2168_11: tato mahājanassa sannipātanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva taruṇadārakānaṃ phalāphalāni vikiritvā tadanantaraṃ māsakarūpāni;
atk-s0201a:2168_15: Atha brāhmaṇo maṅgalikasovatthikādīsu maṅgalāni ceva suvatthiyo ca karontesu mahāsampattiyā nagaraṃ anuvicarati.
atk-s0201a:2168_16: Puññavantā manussā ekabhūmakādipāsāde āruyha sukapattasadisāni vātapānakavāṭāni vivaritvā olokenti.
atk-s0201a:2168_17: Brāhmaṇopi attano yasasirisampattiyā nagaraṃ ajjhottharanto viya dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2169_2: Pilotikaṃ paribbājakanti pilotikāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavohāravasena laddhanāmaṃ paribbājakaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2169_3: So kira paribbājako daharo paṭhamavaye ṭhito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo buddhupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0201a:2169_4: pātova tathāgatassa ceva mahātherānañca upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā tidaṇḍakuṇḍikādiparikkhāraṃ ādāya jetavanā nikkhamitvā nagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0201a:2169_6: Etadavocāti anukkamena santikaṃ āgataṃ sañjānitvā etaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2169_7: “handa kuto nu bhavaṃ vacchāyano āgacchatī”ti gottaṃ kittento vacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a:2169_8: Paṇḍito maññeti bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṇḍitoti maññati,
atk-s0201a:2170_1: samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānane ahaṃ ko nāma?
atk-s0201a:2170_2: Ko ca samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmīti kuto cāhaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jānissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2170_5: Sopi nūnassa tādisovāti yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyya,
atk-s0201a:2170_6: sopi nūna dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto tādiso buddhoyeva bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2170_7: Sineruṃ vā himavantaṃ vā pathaviṃ vā ākāsaṃ vā pametukāmena tappamāṇova daṇḍo vā rajju vā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2170_8: Samaṇassa gotamassa paññaṃ jānantenapi tassa ñāṇasadisameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0201a:2170_10: Uḷārāyāti uttarāya seṭṭhāya. Ko cāhaṃ, bhoti, bho,
atk-s0201a:2170_11: ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa pasaṃsane ko nāma?
atk-s0201a:2170_12: Ko ca samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsissāmīti kena kāraṇena pasaṃsissāmi?
atk-s0201a:2170_13: Pasatthapasatthoti sabbaguṇānaṃ uttaritarehi sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho,
atk-s0201a:2170_15: Yathā hi campakapupphaṃ vā nīluppalaṃ vā padumaṃ vā lohitacandanaṃ vā attano vaṇṇagandhasiriyāva pāsādikañceva sugandhañca,
atk-s0201a:2170_16: na tassa āgantukehi vaṇṇagandhehi thomanakiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0201a:2170_17: Yathā ca maṇiratanaṃ vā candamaṇḍalaṃ vā attano ālokeneva obhāsati,
atk-s0201a:2170_19: Evaṃ samaṇo gotamo sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho thomito sabbalokassa seṭṭhataṃ pāpito,
atk-s0201a:2171_6: aññepi te te khattiyā tehi tehi jānapadehi pasatthā.
atk-s0201a:2172_1: Athassa paribbājako attano pasādakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto seyyathāpi, bho,
atk-s0201a:2172_4: Parato pana uggahitasippo puriso nāgavanikoti āgato.
atk-s0201a:2173_4: Kataparappavādeti viññātaparappavāde ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicaye ca.
atk-s0201a:2173_6: Te bhindantā maññe carantīti vālavedhi viya vālaṃ sukhumānipi paresaṃ diṭṭhigatāni attano paññāgatena bhindantā viya carantīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2173_7: Pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharontīti dupadampi tipadampi catuppadampi pañhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2173_9: Na ceva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantīti;
atk-s0201a:2173_11: Bhagavā kira parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desento parisāya ajjhāsayaṃ oloketi,
atk-s0201a:2173_13: “ime khattiyapaṇḍitā guḷhaṃ rahassaṃ pañhaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2173_14: So tehi apuṭṭhoyeva evarūpe pañhe pucchāya ettakā dosā,
atk-s0201a:2173_16: atthe pade akkhare ettakāti ime pañhe pucchanto evaṃ puccheyya,
atk-s0201a:2173_18: iti ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānīte pañhe dhammakathāya antare pakkhipitvā viddhaṃseti.
atk-s0201a:2173_20: ye mayaṃ ime pañhe na pucchimhā,
atk-s0201a:2173_22: appatiṭṭheva no katvā samaṇo gotamo khipeyyā”ti attamanā bhavanti.
atk-s0201a:2174_0: Apica buddhā nāma dhammaṃ desentā parisaṃ mettāya pharanti,
atk-s0201a:2174_2: buddhā ca nāma rūpaggappattā honti dassanasampannā madhurassarā mudujivhā suphusitadantāvaraṇā amatena hadayaṃ siñcantā viya dhammaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a:2174_3: Tatra nesaṃ mettāpharaṇena pasannacittānaṃ evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0201a:2174_4: “evarūpaṃ advejjhakathaṃ amoghakathaṃ niyyānikakathaṃ kathentena bhagavatā saddhiṃ na sakkhissāma paccanīkaggāhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2175_8: iminā thokena anupasaṅkamanamattena apayirupāsanamatteneva naṭṭhā bhaveyyāma.
atk-s0201a:2176_2: Yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2176_5: yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2176_8: Evameva yaṃ pītimayaṃ vacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2176_9: adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati,
atk-s0201a:2176_12: Hatthipadopamoti hatthipadaṃ upamā assa dhammassāti hatthipadopamo.
atk-s0201a:2176_13: So na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2176_15: Atha kasmā idha kusaloti na vuttoti?
atk-s0201a:2176_20: Tasmā idha kusaloti avatvā parato vutto.
atk-s0201a:2177_1: Vāmanikāti rassā āyāmatopi na dīghā mahākucchihatthiniyo.
atk-s0201a:2177_2: Uccā ca nisevitanti sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese ghaṃsitaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2177_3: Uccā kāḷārikāti uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisapādā hutvā,
atk-s0201a:2177_5: Tāsaṃ kira eko danto unnato hoti,
atk-s0201a:2177_9: Uccā ca dantehi ārañjitānīti sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese pharasunā pahataṭṭhānaṃ viya dāṭṭhāhi chinnaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2177_10: Uccā kaṇerukā nāmāti uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisadīghapādā hutvā,
atk-s0201a:2177_14: So niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti so nāgavaniko yassa vatāhaṃ nāgassa anupadaṃ āgato,
atk-s0201a:2177_16: Yañhi ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ padaṃ disvā vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ idaṃ bhavissatīti niṭṭhaṃ na gato,
atk-s0201a:2177_17: yampi tato orabhāge disvā kāḷārikānaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2177_19: sabbaṃ taṃ imasseva mahāhatthino padanti mahāhatthiṃ disvāva niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2178_1: nāgavanaṃ viya hi ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nīvaraṇappahānā dhammadesanā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2178_5: Nāgavanikassa tattha tattha hatthipadaṃ disvāpi vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2178_6: kāḷārikānaṃ kaṇerukānaṃ padaṃ bhavissatīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo viya yogino,
atk-s0201a:2178_7: imā jhānābhiññā nāma bāhirakaparibbājakānampi santīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo.
atk-s0201a:2178_9: tattha tattha mayā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ imasseva mahāhatthino,
atk-s0201a:2178_10: na aññassāti mahāhatthiṃ disvā niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ viya ariyasāvakassa arahattaṃ patvāva niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2178_11: Idañca pana opammasaṃsandanaṃ matthake ṭhatvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2178_13: Anukkamāgataṃ pana pāḷipadaṃ gahetvā idheva kataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2178_15: Svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:2180_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2181_3: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2181_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “brāhmaṇa imasmiṃ loke tathāgato uppajjati arahaṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a:2182_2: Loke uppajjatīti ettha pana lokoti okāsaloko sattaloko saṅkhāralokoti tividho.
atk-s0201a:2182_4: Sattaloke uppajjamānopi ca tathāgato na devaloke,
atk-s0201a:2182_25: orato majjhe”ti evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimapadese uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:2182_27: paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti.
atk-s0201a:2182_28: Tattha tathāgato sujātāya dinnamadhupāyasabhojanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggo,
atk-s0201a:2182_36: Idha sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2182_37: tathāgato loke uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.
atk-s0201a:2183_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2183_15: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko,
atk-s0201a:2184_4: Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādiggahaṇena catuparisavasena sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko avasesasabbasattaloko vā.
atk-s0201a:2185_0: Apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassa lokassa sacchikatabhāvamāha.
atk-s0201a:2185_7: ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi…pe…
atk-s0201a:2185_8: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-s0201a:2185_15: Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajanti āha.
atk-s0201a:2185_16: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena
atk-s0201a:2185_23: Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu pakkhipetvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussa”nti āha.
atk-s0201a:2185_24: Evaṃ pañcahi padehi tena tenākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
atk-s0201a:2186_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti sayanti sāmaṃ aparaneyyo hutvā.
atk-s0201a:2186_7: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:2186_8: Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti.
atk-s0201a:2186_9: Ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti. Majjhepi…
atk-s0201a:2186_10: pariyosānepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2187_2: Desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāya paṭhamapādo ādi nāma,
atk-s0201a:2187_10: majjhe eko vā dve vā bahū vā majjhameva.
atk-s0201a:2187_17: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ vutto pana ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a:2187_21: etaṃ pariyosāna”nti hi ettha phalaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2187_24: brahmacariyaṃ vussati nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ettha nibbānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2187_26: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento ādimhi sīlaṃ dassetvā majjhe maggaṃ pariyosāne nibbānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2190_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti yassa hi yāgubhattaitthipurisādivaṇṇanā nissitā desanā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2190_2: Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ desanaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:2190_4: Yassa pana desanā ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbavissaṭṭhasabbaniggahītabyañjanā vā,
atk-s0201a:2190_5: tassa damiḷakirāsavarādimilakkhūnaṃ bhāsā viya byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2192_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
atk-s0201a:2193_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:2194_6: Yo hi idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmīti deseti,
atk-s0201a:2194_8: Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti.
atk-s0201a:2194_10: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti ettha brahmacariyanti sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2194_11: Tasmā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a:2194_13: evaṃ desento ca sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2194_15: Brahmabhūtānaṃ vā buddhādīnaṃ cariyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2195_1: Suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti?
atk-s0201a:2195_3: Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2195_4: Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2195_5: Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:2195_6: Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā nihatamānadappā honti.
atk-s0201a:2195_7: Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2195_8: Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā,
atk-s0201a:2195_10: iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
atk-s0201a:2196_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2196_2: Tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho vata bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a:2196_4: Sambādho gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0201a:2196_9: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati.
atk-s0201a:2196_13: Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato.
atk-s0201a:2197_2: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2197_3: Ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2197_5: idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ.
atk-s0201a:2197_6: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0201a:2197_7: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti.
atk-s0201a:2197_8: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2197_13: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a:2198_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca,
atk-s0201a:2198_2: yattha cete saha jīvanti ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti,
atk-s0201a:2198_3: taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno.
atk-s0201a:2198_5: sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2198_6: Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva.
atk-s0201a:2198_8: Paṭivirato hotīti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova hoti.
atk-s0201a:2198_9: Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2198_10: Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vihiṃsanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2198_11: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalakaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0201a:2198_17: Tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2199_6: athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2200_3: Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā.
atk-s0201a:2201_3: Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati,
atk-s0201a:2201_5: tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati.
atk-s0201a:2201_8: jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho.
atk-s0201a:2201_13: assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2201_14: Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya indakhilo viya ca thirakatho hoti;
atk-s0201a:2201_15: asinā sīse chijjantepi dve kathā na katheti;
atk-s0201a:2201_19: Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti,
atk-s0201a:2201_21: asukenā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0201a:2201_30: Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2202_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2202_2: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnampi mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2202_3: ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā.
atk-s0201a:2202_6: “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2202_13: te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2202_15: Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti,
atk-s0201a:2203_6: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0201a:2203_17: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0201a:2203_18: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0201a:2204_9: Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati,
atk-s0201a:2204_13: Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:2204_15: Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2204_16: yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati,
atk-s0201a:2204_17: tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0201a:2204_18: na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2205_1: Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa
atk-s0201a:2205_2: ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā,
atk-s0201a:2205_7: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2205_11: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṃgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2205_13: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2205_14: Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca,
atk-s0201a:2205_15: antamaso mayūranaccanādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā.
atk-s0201a:2205_16: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0201a:2205_22: Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2205_24: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-s0201a:2206_4: Rajatanti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2206_12: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:2207_3: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:2207_5: ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2207_7: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0201a:2207_14: gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2207_15: Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2207_17: tasmā dūteyyapahiṇagamanānaṃ anuyogāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2208_2: Tattha tulākūṭaṃ tāva rūpakūṭaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2208_3: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā sarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:2208_5: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0201a:2208_7: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:2208_9: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-s0201a:2208_13: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karoti,
atk-s0201a:2208_14: tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva addhakulaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0201a:2208_15: “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
atk-s0201a:2208_16: Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte –
atk-s0201a:2208_17: “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2209_2: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena,
atk-s0201a:2209_3: “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti;
atk-s0201a:2209_4: dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0201a:2209_6: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:2209_7: dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-s0201a:2209_9: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0201a:2210_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2210_1: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2210_3: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati.
atk-s0201a:2210_7: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto, “na me, bho,
atk-s0201a:2210_10: Tena hi “dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti. So āha – “nanu te, bho,
atk-s0201a:2210_14: evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2210_15: So kāraṇaṃ vadatīti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0201a:2211_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-s0201a:2211_5: tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2211_6: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2211_12: Yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggapaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-s0201a:2211_18: gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2212_1: So santuṭṭho hotīti svāyaṃ bhikkhu heṭṭhā vuttena catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0201a:2212_2: Iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti
atk-s0201a:2212_3: tīṇi cīvarāni patto dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi ekā sūci kāyabandhanaṃ parissāvananti.
atk-s0201a:2213_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0201a:2215_0: Te sabbepi kāyaparihārikāpi honti kucchiparihārikāpi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a:2215_1: Ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati posetīti kāyaparihārikaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2215_2: cīvarakaṇṇena udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle khāditabbaphalāphalaggahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati posetīti kucchiparihārikaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2215_3: Pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nahānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihāriko hoti,
atk-s0201a:2215_5: Vāsipi tāya dantakaṭṭhacchedanakāle mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgapādacīvarakuṭidaṇḍakasajjanakāle ca kāyaparihārikā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2215_8: pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā.
atk-s0201a:2215_13: pānīyaparissāvanakāle teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle ca kucchiparihārikaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2216_0: Navaparikkhārikassa pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2216_1: Dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2216_2: Ekādasaparikkhārikassa kattarayaṭṭhi vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2216_3: Dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2216_7: Etepi hi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva subharāva sallahukavuttinova.
atk-s0201a:2216_8: Bhagavā pana nayimaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi,
atk-s0201a:2216_10: So hi khuddakavāsiñca sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā
atk-s0201a:2216_11: ticīvaraṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati.
atk-s0201a:2216_13: iti imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2217_2: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti taṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2217_3: “mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”tissa saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2217_5: yūthā apakkanto mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2223_4: sakuṇā nāma “asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti.
atk-s0201a:2223_5: “Idaṃ ajjatanāya idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti nesaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0201a:2223_6: Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0201a:2223_7: na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti,
atk-s0201a:2223_8: atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati,
atk-s0201a:2223_11: Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati.
atk-s0201a:2224_1: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2224_6: Indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2224_7: So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu
atk-s0201a:2225_3: Yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi,
atk-s0201a:2225_5: tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0201a:2225_9: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-s0201a:2225_12: so hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati,
atk-s0201a:2225_13: araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-s0201a:2225_14: itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-s0201a:2226_6: Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2226_17: Apica “vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā”ti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2226_24: “Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantī”ti idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2226_26: Imassa pana sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikaṃ dassento araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2227_1: sabbametaṃ arañña”nti idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ araññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2227_2: “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2227_6: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena vījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2227_14: Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0201a:2227_15: nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2227_26: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti,
atk-s0201a:2227_27: gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0201a:2228_4: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0201a:2228_6: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2228_11: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā,
atk-s0201a:2228_14: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā,
atk-s0201a:2228_19: tena vuccati parimukhaṃ sati”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2229_0: Abhijjhaṃ loketi ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko,
atk-s0201a:2229_1: tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0201a:2229_4: Abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti.
atk-s0201a:2229_9: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikammāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ pajahatīti byāpādo.
atk-s0201a:2229_16: Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divā diṭṭhaālokasañjānanasamatthatāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0201a:2229_17: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0201a:2229_24: kathamime kusalā”ti evaṃ na vicikicchati na kaṅkhatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2229_26: imesu pana nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0201a:2230_1: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti ime pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti,
atk-s0201a:2230_2: uppannā api aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā ucchinditvā pātenti;
atk-s0201a:2230_4: Tathāgatapadaṃ itipīti idampi tathāgatassa ñāṇapadaṃ ñāṇavaḷañjaṃ ñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2231_2: Natveva tāva ariyasāvako niṭṭhaṃ gato hotīti imā jhānābhiññā bāhirakehipi sādhāraṇāti na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0201a:2231_3: Maggakkhaṇepi apariyositakiccatāya na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0201a:2231_4: Apica kho niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti apica kho pana maggakkhaṇe mahāhatthiṃ passanto nāgavaniko viya sammāsambuddho
atk-s0201a:2231_5: bhagavāti iminā ākārena tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2231_6: Niṭṭhaṃ gato hotīti evaṃ maggakkhaṇe niṭṭhaṃ gacchanto arahattaphalakkhaṇe pariyositasabbakiccatāya sabbākārena tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0201a:2235_9: Ye keci kusalā dhammāti ye keci lokiyā vā lokuttarā vā kusalā dhammā.
atk-s0201a:2235_15: Tattha “sabbe khattiyā āgacchantu sabbe brāhmaṇā”ti evaṃ samānajātivasena saṅgaho sajātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0201a:2235_16: “Sabbe kosalakā sabbe māgadhakā”ti evaṃ sañjātidesavasena saṅgaho sañjātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0201a:2235_17: “Sabbe rathikā sabbe dhanuggahā”ti evaṃ kiriyavasena saṅgaho kiriyasaṅgaho nāma.
atk-s0201a:2235_21: tena vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita”nti,
atk-s0201a:2236_0: Nanu ca “catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatāti pañhassa vissajjane samudayasaccaṃ akusalaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2236_5: siyā abyākata”nti āgatattā catubhūmakampi kusalaṃ diyaḍḍhameva saccaṃ bhajati.
atk-s0201a:2236_6: Atha kasmā mahāthero catūsu ariyasaccesu gaṇanaṃ gacchatīti āhāti?
atk-s0201a:2236_14: sikkhā adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhā”ti ettha sādhikamidaṃ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ ekā adhisīlasikkhāva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2236_15: taṃ sikkhantopi tisso sikkhā sikkhatīti dassito,
atk-s0201a:2236_17: Yathā ca ekassa hatthipadassa catūsu koṭṭhāsesu ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse otiṇṇānipi dvīsu tīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu
atk-s0201a:2236_18: otiṇṇānipi siṅgālasasamigādīnaṃ pādāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gatāneva honti.
atk-s0201a:2236_20: Evameva ekasmimpi dvīsupi tīsupi catūsupi saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā dhammā catūsu saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatāva honti;
atk-s0201a:2236_21: saccānaṃ antogadhattāti diyaḍḍhasaccagaṇanaṃ gatepi kusaladhamme “sabbe te catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2236_22: “Dukkhe ariyasacce”tiādīsu uddesapadesu ceva jātipi dukkhātiādīsu niddesapadesu ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2237_1: Yathā hi cheko vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ labhitvā catudhā chetvā tato tayo koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā pañcadhā bhindeyya,
atk-s0201a:2237_2: tatopi cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā phālento pañca pesiyo kareyya,
atk-s0201a:2237_3: tato catasso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā kucchibhāgaṃ piṭṭhibhāganti dvidhā phāletvā piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2237_4: kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya tato samuggabījanitālavaṇṭādinānappakāraṃ veḷuvikatiṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:2237_5: so piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca catasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse kammāya na upanessatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0201a:2237_8: Evameva ayaṃ mahātheropi vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ labhitvā cattāro koṭṭhāse viya,
atk-s0201a:2237_9: imaṃ mahantaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhitvā catuariyasaccavasena mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2237_10: Vilīvakārassa tayo koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā tassa pañcadhā karaṇaṃ viya therassa tīṇi ariyasaccāni
atk-s0201a:2237_11: ṭhapetvā ekaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ gahetvā bhājentassa khandhavasena pañcadhā karaṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2237_12: Tato yathā so vilīvakāro cattāro koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā pañcadhā phālesi,
atk-s0201a:2237_13: evaṃ thero cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā rūpakkhandhaṃ vibhajanto cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpanti pañcadhā akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2237_14: Tato yathā so vilīvakāro catasso pesiyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā kucchibhāgaṃ piṭṭhibhāganti dvidhā phālesi,
atk-s0201a:2237_15: evaṃ thero upādāya rūpañca tisso ca dhātuyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajanto ajjhattikabāhiravasena dvidhā dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2237_16: Yathā so vilīvakāro piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya nānappakāraṃ vilīvavikatiṃ akāsi,
atk-s0201a:2237_17: evaṃ thero bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhattikaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vīsatiyā ākārehi vibhajitvā dassetuṃ katamā cāvuso,
atk-s0201a:2238_0: Yathā pana vilīvakāro piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca cattasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse anupubbena kammāya upanessati,
atk-s0201a:2238_2: evaṃ theropi bāhirañca pathavīdhātuṃ itarā ca tisso dhātuyo upādārūpañca itare ca cattāro arūpino khandhe
atk-s0201a:2238_3: itarāni ca tīṇi ariyasaccāni anupubbena vibhajitvā dassessati,
atk-s0201a:2239_2: So tesaṃ piḷandhanaparikkhāraṃ catūsu peḷāsu ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhaputtassa appesi – “idaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0201a:2239_3: bhātikānaṃ piḷandhanabhaṇḍaṃ tathārūpe chaṇe sampatte piḷandhanaṃ no dehīti yācantānaṃ dadeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2239_5: tathārūpe chaṇadivase rājaputtā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “piḷandhanaṃ no, tāta, detha,
atk-s0201a:2239_7: jeṭṭhabhātikassa vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2239_9: Te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2239_13: catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā tisso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā,
atk-s0201a:2239_14: tato pañca samugge nīharitvā cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā,
atk-s0201a:2239_15: tato pañcasu karaṇḍesu nīharitesu cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā tato hatthūpagapādūpagādīni
atk-s0201a:2239_17: So kiñcāpi itarehi catūhi karaṇḍehi itarehi catūhi samuggehi itarāhi tīhi peḷāhi na tāva bhājetvā deti,
atk-s0201a:2240_9: ‘bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jāto dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadāyādo,
atk-s0201a:2240_10: no āmisadāyādo’ti sāriputtameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya,
atk-s0201a:2243_0: Rañño tesaṃ puttānaṃ piḷandhanaṃ catūsu peḷāsu pakkhipitvā jeṭṭhaputtassa hatthe ṭhapitakālo viya bhagavato
atk-s0201a:2243_5: pahoti cattāri ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṃ desetuṃ paññāpetuṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ vivarituṃ vibhajituṃ uttānīkātu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2243_6: Tathārūpe khaṇe tesaṃ rājaputtānaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā piḷandhanaṃ yācanakālo viya bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0201a:2243_8: Upakaṭṭhāya kira vassūpanāyikāya idaṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ. Rañño, “tātā,
atk-s0201a:2243_9: jeṭṭhabhātikassa vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ taṃ āharāpetvā piḷandhathā”ti vuttakālo viya sambuddhenāpi, “sevetha,
atk-s0201a:2243_14: Paṇḍitā bhikkhū anuggāhakā sabrahmacārīna”nti evaṃ dhammasenāpatino santike bhikkhūnaṃ pesitakālo.
atk-s0201a:2244_0: Rājaputtehi rañño kathaṃ sutvā jeṭṭhabhātikassa santikaṃ gantvā piḷandhanaṃ yācitakālo viya bhikkhūhi
atk-s0201a:2244_1: satthukathaṃ sutvā dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamma dhammadesanaṃ āyācitakālo.
atk-s0201a:2244_2: Jeṭṭhabhātikassa gabbhaṃ vivaritvā catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā ṭhapanaṃ viya dhammasenāpatissa imaṃ suttantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2244_3: ārabhitvā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ vasena mātikāya ṭhapanaṃ.
