atk-s0201a:2244_4: Tisso peḷāyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcasamugganīharaṇaṃ viya tīṇi ariyasaccāni ṭhapetvā dukkhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2244_6: Cattāro samugge ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcakaraṇḍanīharaṇaṃ viya cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2245_1: Cattāro karaṇḍe ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā hatthūpagapādūpagādipiḷandhanadānaṃ viya
atk-s0201a:2245_2: tīṇi mahābhūtāni upādārūpañca ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajantassa bāhiraṃ tāva pidhānaṃ viya ṭhapetvā
atk-s0201a:2245_3: ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi dassanatthaṃ “katamā cāvuso ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū”tiādivacanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2246_0: Tassa pana rājaputtassa tehi catūhi karaṇḍehi catūhi samuggehi tīhi ca peḷāhi pacchā anupubbena nīharitvā
atk-s0201a:2246_1: piḷandhanadānaṃ viya therassāpi itaresañca tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpānañca catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānañca
atk-s0201a:2246_2: tiṇṇaṃ ariyasaccānañca pacchā anupubbena bhājetvā dassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2246_15: udariyaṃ karīsanti idaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa kulaputtassa ajjhattikapathavīdhātuvasena tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2246_16: Ettha pana manasikāraṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gahetukāmena yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2246_21: “ayampi acetanā abyākatā suññā thaddhā pathavīdhātu evā”ti manasi kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2246_22: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti idaṃ itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu anugatāya pathavīdhātuyā gahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2246_23: Yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātūti yā ca ayaṃ vuttappakārā ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a:2246_24: Yā ca bāhirāti yā ca vibhaṅge,
atk-s0201a:2246_25: “ayo lohaṃ tipu sīsa”ntiādinā nayena āgatā bāhirā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0201a:2247_0: Ettāvatā therena ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi vitthārena dassitā,
atk-s0201a:2247_2: Yasmiñhi ṭhāne sattānaṃ ālayo nikanti patthanā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmāso balavā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2247_3: tattha tesaṃ ālayādīnaṃ uddharaṇatthaṃ buddhā vā buddhasāvakā vā vitthārakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0201a:2247_6: Yathā hi kassako khettaṃ kasamāno yattha mūlasantānakānaṃ balavatāya naṅgalaṃ laggati,
atk-s0201a:2247_7: tattha goṇe ṭhapetvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā mūlasantānakāni chetvā chetvā uddharanto bahuṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2247_9: tattha balavaṃ payogaṃ katvā goṇe piṭṭhiyaṃ paharamāno kasatiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2248_0: Pathavīdhāturevesāti duvidhāpesā thaddhaṭṭhena kakkhaḷaṭṭhena pharusaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātuyeva,
atk-s0201a:2248_1: āvusoti ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2248_4: tasmā sā bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisā acetanāyevāti gaṇhantassa sukhapariggaho hoti.
atk-s0201a:2248_6: Yathā dantena goṇena saddhiṃ yojito adanto katipāhameva visūkāyati vipphandati,
atk-s0201a:2248_8: Evaṃ ajjhattikāpi bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisāti gaṇhantassa katipāhameva acetanābhāvo na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2248_9: atha na cirenevassā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2248_10: Taṃ netaṃ mamāti taṃ ubhayampi na etaṃ mama,
atk-s0201a:2248_12: na eso me attāti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2248_15: tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2249_2: Bāhiraāpodhātuvasena bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā vināsaṃ dassetvā tato visesatarena upādinnāya sarīraṭṭhakapathavīdhātuyā vināsadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2249_4: Antarahitā tasmiṃ samaye bāhirā pathavīdhātu hotīti tasmiṃ samaye koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe khārodakena
atk-s0201a:2249_5: vilīyamānā udakānugatā hutvā sabbā pabbatādivasena saṇṭhitā pathavīdhātu antarahitā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2252_6: iti sabbehipi imehi padehi aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2252_10: taṃ anattāti tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni āgatāneva honti.
atk-s0201a:2252_12: tattha dvīhākārehi imassa kāyassa parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā ṭhitiparittatāya ca sarasaparittatāya ca.
atk-s0201a:2255_0: Idaṃ etasseva parittaṭṭhitidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ ṭhitiparittatāya parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2257_0: Taṇhupādinnassāti taṇhāya ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhassa ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā.
atk-s0201a:2257_1: Atha khvāssa notevettha hotīti atha kho assa bhikkhuno evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā passantassa ettha
atk-s0201a:2257_2: ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā ahanti vātiādi tividho taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāho noteva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2257_5: evaṃ tejodhātuvāyodhātuvasenapi bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā antaradhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2258_1: āvusoti idha tassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno sotadvāre pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapento balaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2258_4: evañca evañca taṃ karissāmāti vācāya paribhāsanti.
atk-s0201a:2258_8: So evanti so dhātukammaṭṭhāniko evaṃ sampajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2258_9: Uppannā kho me ayanti sampativattamānuppannabhāvena ca samudācāruppannabhāvena ca uppannā.
atk-s0201a:2258_11: phasso aniccoti sotasamphasso hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccoti passati.
atk-s0201a:2258_22: Ayañhi sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe āpāthagate mūlapariññāāgantukatāvakālikavasena pariggahaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2259_0: Evaṃ katapariggahassa hi dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balavavipassakassa sacepi cakkhudvārādīsu ārammaṇe āpāthagate ayoniso āvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2259_1: voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāre āsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva otarati,
atk-s0201a:2259_4: Aparassa rāgādivasena ekaṃ vāraṃ javanaṃ javati,
atk-s0201a:2259_5: javanapariyosāne pana rāgādivasena evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2259_7: Aparassa ekavāraṃ evaṃ āvajjato puna dutiyavāraṃ rāgādivasena javanaṃ javatiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2259_8: dutiyavārāvasāne pana evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2260_0: Evaṃ sotadvāre pariggahitavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balaṃ dassetvā idāni kāyadvāre dīpento tañce,
atk-s0201a:2260_2: Aniṭṭhārammaṇañhi patvā dvīsu vāresu kilamati sotadvāre ca kāyadvāre ca.
atk-s0201a:2260_3: Tasmā yathā nāma khettassāmī puriso kudālaṃ gahetvā khettaṃ anusañcaranto yattha vā tattha vā mattikapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0201a:2260_4: adatvā dubbalaṭṭhānesuyeva kudālena bhūmiṃ bhinditvā satiṇamattikapiṇḍaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2260_5: Evameva mahāthero anāgate sikkhākāmā padhānakammikā kulaputtā imesu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ paṭṭhapetvā khippameva
atk-s0201a:2260_6: jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantīti imesuyeva dvīsu dvāresu gāḷhaṃ katvā saṃvaraṃ desento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2261_6: Evaṃ buddhaṃ anussaratotiādīsu itipi so bhagavātiādinā nayena anussarantopi buddhaṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a:2261_7: vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatāti anussarantopi anussaratiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2261_8: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammotiādinā nayena anussarantopi dhammaṃ anussarati,
atk-s0201a:2261_11: kakacokantanaṃ adhivāsayamānassa bhikkhuno guṇaṃ anussaramānopi anussaratiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2262_0: Upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātīti idha vipassanupekkhā adhippetā.
atk-s0201a:2262_2: sā panesā kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu arajjanādivasena pavattati,
atk-s0201a:2262_3: ayaṃ pana bhikkhu vīriyabalena bhāvanāsiddhiyā attano vipassanaṃ khīṇāsavassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāṭhāne ṭhapetīti vipassanāva chaḷaṅgupekkhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0201a:2263_3: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2263_9: uddhane āropitaudakaṃ viya khayaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0201a:2264_2: Tejo eva vā tejobhāvaṃ gatanti tejogataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2264_3: Purime āpogatepi pacchime vāyogatepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2264_7: Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati,
atk-s0201a:2264_9: Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo dayhati,
atk-s0201a:2264_10: so ca puggalo dayhāmi dayhāmīti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepañca tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati.
atk-s0201a:2264_11: Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti yena taṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi,
atk-s0201a:2264_14: sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2264_18: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2265_9: tejosaṃvaṭṭakāle pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ jhāpetvā chārikāmattampi na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2265_11: Aggiṃ gavesantīti evarūpaṃ sukhumaṃ upādānaṃ gahetvā aggiṃ pariyesanti,
atk-s0201a:2266_1: Vāyodhātuniddese uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkārādipavattakā uddhaṃ ārohanavātā.
atk-s0201a:2266_5: Aṅgamaṅgānusārinoti dhamanījālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakavātā.
atk-s0201a:2266_10: taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2267_0: Gāmampi vahatīti sakalagāmampi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānā ādāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2268_8: Ākāso parivāritoti etāni kaṭṭhādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ākāso ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0201a:2268_9: Agāraṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti agāranti paṇṇattimattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2268_10: Kaṭṭhādīsu pana visuṃ visuṃ rāsikatesu kaṭṭharāsivallirāsītveva vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2268_11: Evameva khoti evameva aṭṭhiādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso,
atk-s0201a:2268_12: tāneva aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2268_14: Yathā kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca gehanti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ khattiyagehaṃ brāhmaṇagehanti vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2268_16: na hettha koci satto vā jīvo vā vijjati.
atk-s0201a:2269_2: Heṭṭhā upādārūpaṃ cattāro ca arūpino khandhā tīṇi ca ariyasaccāni na kathitāni,
atk-s0201a:2269_3: idāni tāni kathetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhāti.
atk-s0201a:2269_4: Tattha cakkhuṃ aparibhinnanti cakkhupasāde niruddhepi upahatepi pittasemhalohitehi palibuddhepi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2269_6: cakkhuviññāṇassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2269_8: Tajjo samannāhāroti taṃ cakkhuñca rūpe ca paṭicca bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppajjanamanasikāro,
atk-s0201a:2269_10: Taṃ rūpānaṃ anāpāthagatattāpi aññāvihitassapi na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2270_0: Yaṃ tathābhūtassātiādīsu dvāravasena cattāri saccāni dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2270_3: Rūpanti cakkhuviññāṇassa na rūpajanakattā cakkhuviññāṇakkhaṇe tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2270_12: Yo paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passatīti yo paccaye passati.
atk-s0201a:2270_13: So dhammaṃ passatīti so paṭiccasamuppannadhamme passati,
atk-s0201a:2270_20: iti tīṇi saccāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva maggasaccaṃ āharitvā gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2270_21: yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi bhāvanāpaṭivedho,
atk-s0201a:2270_23: Bahukataṃ hotīti ettāvatāpi bahuṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2271_0: Manodvāre pana ajjhattiko mano nāma bhavaṅgacittaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2271_1: Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva pavattamānampi paribhinnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2271_2: Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2271_4: Neva tāva tajjassāti idaṃ bhavaṅgasamayeneva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2271_15: Iti mahāthero heṭṭhā ekadesameva sammasanto āgantvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā heṭṭhā parihīnadesanaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0201a:2271_16: taṃtaṃdvāravasena bhājetvā dassento yathānusandhināva suttantaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2275_2: Tattha acirapakkanteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā nacirapakkante saliṅgeneva pāṭiyekke jāte.
atk-s0201a:2276_2: ekacco kulaputtoti kiñcāpi asukakulaputtoti na niyāmito,
atk-s0201a:2276_3: devadattaṃyeva pana sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2276_4: So hi asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā okkākavaṃse jātattā jātikulaputto.
atk-s0201a:2276_12: Apaññātāti dvinnaṃ janānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne na paññāyanti,
atk-s0201a:2276_15: purato vā pacchato vā gacchantaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0201a:2277_0: Sārena sārakaraṇīyanti rukkhasārena kattabbaṃ akkhacakkayuganaṅgalādikaṃ yaṃkiñci.
atk-s0201a:2277_1: Sākhāpalāsaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassāti maggaphalasārassa sāsanabrahmacariyassa cattāro paccayā sākhāpalāsaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a:2277_3: Tena ca vosānaṃ āpādīti teneva ca alamettāvatā sāro me pattoti vosānaṃ āpanno.
atk-s0201a:2278_2: dibbacakkhu ca pañcannaṃ abhiññānaṃ matthake ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2278_4: Ajānaṃ apassaṃ viharantīti kiñci sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ ajānantā antamaso paṃsupisācakampi apassantā viharanti.
atk-s0201a:2279_3: Cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni,
atk-s0201a:2279_5: ayaṃ asamayavimokkho”ti evaṃ vutte navalokuttaradhamme ārādheti sampādeti paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a:2279_6: Lokiyasamāpattiyo hi appitappitakkhaṇeyeva paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanti, tasmā,
atk-s0201a:2279_8: Cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo,
atk-s0201a:2279_11: sakiṃ vimuttāni hi maggaphalāni vimuttāneva honti.
atk-s0201a:2279_12: Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi accantaṃ vimuttamevāti ime nava dhammā asamayavimokkhoti vuttā.
atk-s0201a:2280_4: Etaṃ sāranti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa sāraṃ.
atk-s0201a:2280_5: Etaṃ pariyosānanti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, esā koṭi,
atk-s0201a:2280_6: na ito paraṃ pattabbaṃ atthīti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2284_5: Saṅghinotiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti saṅghino.
atk-s0201a:2284_10: appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī”tiādinā nayena samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti yasassino.
atk-s0201a:2284_12: Sādhusammatāti ime sādhu sundarā sappurisāti evaṃ sammatā.
atk-s0201a:2284_17: So kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto,
atk-s0201a:2284_23: So paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0201a:2284_26: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0201a:2284_27: So “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi,
atk-s0201a:2284_29: Tassa santike aññepi pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2285_2: Taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, “tāta,
atk-s0201a:2285_4: So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0201a:2285_6: Sopi sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi,
atk-s0201a:2286_4: tato paṭikiṭṭhataraṃ vatthaṃ nāma natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0201a:2286_11: sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso”ti.
atk-s0201a:2287_6: uṇhodakaṃ vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti,
atk-s0201a:2287_8: “sīlaṃ me bhinna”nti vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2288_3: kilesagaṇṭharahitā mayanti evaṃ vāditāya laddhanāmavasena nigaṇṭho.
atk-s0201a:2288_8: sace nesaṃ sā paṭiññā niyyānikā sabbe abbhaññaṃsu. No ce,
atk-s0201a:2288_10: Tasmā kiṃ tesaṃ paṭiññā niyyānikā na niyyānikāti,
atk-s0201a:2288_12: Atha bhagavā nesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvakathanena atthābhāvato alanti paṭikkhipitvā upamāya atthaṃ pavedento dhammameva desetuṃ, dhammaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2289_2: Na chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāchandaṃ na janayati.
atk-s0201a:2289_3: Na vāyamatīti vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0201a:2290_2: vivicceva kāmehīti kathaṃ ime paṭhamajjhānādidhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā jātāti?
atk-s0201a:2290_7: Iti bhagavā idampi suttaṃ yathānusandhināva niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2296_2: Tattha nātike viharatīti nātikā nāma ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā,
atk-s0201a:2296_5: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye bhagavā mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto vajjiraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno nātikaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0201a:2296_6: Nātikavāsino manussā bhagavato mahādānaṃ datvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannahadayā,
atk-s0201a:2296_7: “satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmā”ti mantetvā iṭṭhakāheva bhittisopānatthambhe vāḷarūpādīni dassento pāsādaṃ
atk-s0201a:2296_8: katvā sudhāya limpitvā mālākammalatākammādīni niṭṭhāpetvā bhummattharaṇamañcapīṭhādīni paññapetvā satthu
atk-s0201a:2296_10: Aparāparaṃ panettha manussā bhikkhusaṅghassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānamaṇḍapacaṅkamādīni kārayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2297_0: Gosiṅgasālavanadāyeti tattha ekassa jeṭṭhakarukkhassa khandhato gosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ hutvā viṭapaṃ uṭṭhahi,
atk-s0201a:2297_1: taṃ rukkhaṃ upādāya sabbampi taṃ vanaṃ gosiṅgasālavananti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2297_7: Tadā hi te laddhassādā laddhapatiṭṭhā adhigatapaṭisambhidā khīṇāsavā hutvā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā tattha vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2298_0: Yena gosiṅgasālavanadāyo tenupasaṅkamīti dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā asītimahāsāvakesu vā,
atk-s0201a:2298_1: antamaso dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaānandattherampi kañci anāmantetvā sayameva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya anīkā nissaṭo hatthī viya,
atk-s0201a:2298_9: “ahaṃ ime kulaputte paggaṇhitvā ukkaṃsitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2298_12: “anāgate kulaputtā sammāsambuddho samaggavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ santikaṃ sayaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā tayo kulaputte paggaṇhi,
atk-s0201a:2298_13: ko nāma samaggavāsaṃ na vaseyyāti samaggavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā khippameva dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2298_16: so ca nesaṃ dhammagarubhāvo rathavinīte āvikatova.
atk-s0201a:2298_17: Iti imasmā dhammagarubhāvatopi dhammaṃ paggaṇhissāmīti agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2299_1: So taṃ araññaṃ yathā icchiticchitappadesena manussā pavisitvā tattha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā niyyāsaṃ vā dabbasambhāraṃ vā na haranti,
atk-s0201a:2299_2: evaṃ vatiyā parikkhittassa tassa araññassa yojite dvāre nisīditvā taṃ araññaṃ rakkhati, pāleti.
atk-s0201a:2299_4: Attakāmarūpāti attano hitaṃ kāmayamānasabhāvā hutvā viharanti.
atk-s0201a:2299_5: Yo hi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammadūtakammapahiṇagamanādīnaṃ vasena ekavīsatianesanāhi jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0201a:2299_7: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā ekavīsatianesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2299_8: uggaṇhitvā sappāyadhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantaṃ
atk-s0201a:2299_9: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ kurumāno viharati,
atk-s0201a:2300_0: Mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsīti tesaṃ mā aphāsukaṃ akāsīti bhagavantaṃ vāresi.
atk-s0201a:2300_6: kadāci ayampi evaṃ karonto imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samaggavāsaṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a:2300_7: Pāsādiko ca panesa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo surasagiddho maññe,
atk-s0201a:2300_8: gatakālato paṭṭhāya paṇītadāyakānaṃ attano upaṭṭhākānañca vaṇṇakathanādīhi imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ appamādavihāraṃ bhindeyya.
atk-s0201a:2300_9: Vasanaṭṭhānāni cāpi etesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibaddhāni paricchinnāni tisso ca paṇṇasālā tayo caṅkamā tīṇi divāṭṭhānāni tīṇi mañcapīṭhāni.
atk-s0201a:2300_10: Ayaṃ pana samaṇo mahākāyo vuḍḍhataro maññe bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2300_11: So akāle ime kulaputte senāsanā vuṭṭhāpessati.
atk-s0201a:2301_2: Kiñcāpi hi tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanādīni pāṭihāriyāni pavattiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2301_3: araññavāsino pana dubbalamanussā sakammappasutā tāni sallakkhetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:2301_4: Sammāsambuddho ca nāma yadā anekabhikkhusahassaparivāro byāmappabhāya asītianubyañjanehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā
atk-s0201a:2301_6: tadā ko esoti apucchitvāva jānitabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2301_7: Tadā pana bhagavā sabbampi taṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ cīvaragabbhena paṭicchādetvā valāhakagabbhena paṭicchanno
atk-s0201a:2301_8: puṇṇacando viya sayameva pattacīvaramādāya aññātakavesena agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2302_0: Etadavocāti thero kira mā samaṇāti dāyapālassa kathaṃ sutvāva cintesi –
atk-s0201a:2302_3: ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya saddhiṃ katheti,
atk-s0201a:2302_4: ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya dvāre ṭhatvā maggaṃ olokento bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:2302_5: Bhagavāpi therassa saha dassaneneva sarīrobhāsaṃ muñci,
atk-s0201a:2302_6: asītianubyañjanavirājitā byāmappabhā pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭo viya virocittha. Thero,
atk-s0201a:2302_7: “ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataṃ āsivisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārento viya loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2302_8: aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetī”ti nivārento etaṃ, “mā,
atk-s0201a:2303_0: Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akatvā upasaṅkami?
atk-s0201a:2303_4: samaggavāso nāma na bhavissatī”ti piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0201a:2303_7: tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2303_8: Keci pana tesaṃ therānaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre caṅkamanakoṭiyā bhagavato āgamanamaggo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2303_9: tasmā thero tesaṃ saññaṃ dadamānova gatoti.
atk-s0201a:2303_11: Pāde pakkhālesīti vikasitapadumasannibhehi jālahatthehi maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇesu piṭṭhipādesu
atk-s0201a:2303_13: Buddhānaṃ kāye rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati,
atk-s0201a:2303_17: Amhehi abhihaṭena udakena bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi,
atk-s0201a:2303_18: paribhogaṃ akāsīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ balavasomanassavasena cittaṃ pīṇitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2303_20: Āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavocāti so kira tesaṃ vuḍḍhataro.
atk-s0201a:2304_1: Tassa saṅgahe kate sesānaṃ katova hotīti theraññeva etaṃ kacci vo anuruddhātiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0201a:2304_11: sampatte vo disvā manussā uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vā dātabbaṃ maññantīti bhikkhācāravattaṃ pucchati. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2304_12: Paccayena akilamantena hi sakkā samaṇadhammo kātuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2304_17: manussā tumhākaṃ araññe vasantānaṃ adatvā kassa aññassa dātabbaṃ maññissanti,
atk-s0201a:2304_18: tumhe pana etaṃ bhuñjitvā kiṃ nu kho migapotakā viya aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭentā viharatha,
atk-s0201a:2304_19: udāhu sāmaggibhāvo vo atthī”ti sāmaggirasaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2305_0: Tattha khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati,
atk-s0201a:2305_3: kacci evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā viharathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2305_4: Piyacakkhūhīti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā olokanacakkhūni piyacakkhūni nāma.
atk-s0201a:2305_5: Kacci tathārūpehi cakkhūhi aññamaññaṃ sampassantā viharathāti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2305_9: Yathā kathaṃ panāti ettha yathāti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2305_13: taṃ me kāraṇaṃ brūthāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2305_15: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ceva parammukhā ca.
atk-s0201a:2306_3: Yañhi sahavasantesu ekena mañcapīṭhaṃ vā dārubhaṇḍaṃ vā mattikābhaṇḍaṃ vā bahi dunnikkhittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2306_4: taṃ disvā kenidaṃ vaḷañjitanti avaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittaṃ viya gahetvā paṭisāmentassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2306_5: vā pana ṭhānaṃ paṭijaggantassa sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2306_6: Ekasmiṃ pakkante tena dunnikkhittaṃ senāsanaparikkhāraṃ tatheva nikkhipantassa paṭijaggitabbayuttaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2306_7: vā pana paṭijaggantassa parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2306_8: Sahavasantassa pana tehi saddhiṃ madhuraṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ paṭisanthārakathaṃ sāraṇīyakathaṃ dhammīkathaṃ
atk-s0201a:2306_9: sarabhaññaṃ sākacchaṃ pañhapucchanaṃ pañhavissajjananti evamādikaraṇe sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2306_10: Theresu pana pakkantesu mayhaṃ piyasahāyo nandiyatthero kimilatthero evaṃ sīlasampanno,
atk-s0201a:2306_11: evaṃ ācārasampannotiādiguṇakathanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2306_12: Mayhaṃ piyamitto nandiyatthero kimilatthero avero hotu,
atk-s0201a:2306_13: abyāpajjo sukhī hotūti evaṃ samannāharato pana sammukhāpi parammukhāpi mettaṃ manokammaṃ hotiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2307_1: kāyāti kāyañhi piṭṭhaṃ viya mattikā viya ca omadditvā ekato kātuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0201a:2307_2: Ekañca pana maññe cittanti cittaṃ pana no hitaṭṭhena nirantaraṭṭhena aviggahaṭṭhena samaggaṭṭhena ekamevāti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2307_3: Kathaṃ panetaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā itaresaṃ cittavasena vattiṃsūti?
atk-s0201a:2307_9: patte malaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ pacituṃ vaṭṭatīti vutte itare mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ dhovitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2307_10: mayhaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ kātabbanti avatvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dārūni āharitvā chinditvā pattakaṭāhe paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā tato paraṃ cīvaraṃ vā dhovanti,
atk-s0201a:2307_13: mama paṇṇasālā uklāpā paribhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti paṭhamataraṃ ārocitepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0201a:2308_2: anuruddhāti bhagavā heṭṭhā na ca mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2308_3: piṇḍakena kilamimhāti vutte na sādhukāramadāsi. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2308_4: Ayañhi kabaḷīkāro āhāro nāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ apāyalokepi devamanussalokepi āciṇṇasamāciṇṇova.
atk-s0201a:2308_6: apāyaloke devamanussalokepi ime sattā paṭiviruddhā eva,
atk-s0201a:2308_8: kadācideva hotīti samaggavāsassa dullabhattā idha bhagavā sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0201a:2308_9: Idāni tesaṃ appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto kacci pana vo,
atk-s0201a:2308_14: Piṇḍāya paṭikkamatīti gāme piṇḍāya caritvā paccāgacchati.
atk-s0201a:2308_15: Avakkārapātinti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekaṃ samuggapātiṃ dhovitvā ṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a:2309_0: Yo pacchāti te kira therā na ekatova bhikkhācāraṃ pavisanti,
atk-s0201a:2309_2: Pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā vattappaṭipattiṃ pūretvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:2309_3: Tesu yo paṭhamataraṃ nisinno attano kālaparicchedavasena paṭhamataraṃ uṭṭhāti;
atk-s0201a:2309_4: so piṇḍāya caritvā paṭinivatto bhattakiccaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā jānāti –
atk-s0201a:2309_7: Atha pattaṃ pidahitvā āsanapaññāpanādīni katvā yadi patte paṭivisamattameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2309_11: Katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a:2309_15: So sace patte bhattaṃ pamāṇameva hoti, bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a:2309_19: avakkārapātiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pamāṇameva bhuñjitvā purimatthero viya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a:2309_23: Sopi dutiyatthero viya bhuñjitvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya osāpetvā āsanāni ukkhipitvā paṭisāmeti;
atk-s0201a:2309_24: pānīyaghaṭe vā paribhojanīyaghaṭe vā avasesaṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā ghaṭe nikujjitvā avakkārapātiyaṃ sace avasesabhattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2309_25: taṃ vuttanayena jahitvā pātiṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmeti;
atk-s0201a:2309_27: Tato kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā sammajjaniṃ ukkhipitvā upacikāhi muttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pattacīvaramādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0201a:2309_28: Idaṃ therānaṃ bahivihāre araññe bhattakiccakaraṇaṭṭhāne bhojanasālāyaṃ vattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2310_0: Yo passatītiādi pana nesaṃ antovihāre vattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2310_7: Te kira pānīyaghaṭādīsu yaṃkiñci tucchakaṃ gahetvā pokkharaṇiṃ gantvā anto ca bahi ca dhovitvā udakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2310_8: parissāvetvā tīre ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ hatthavikārena āmantenti,
atk-s0201a:2310_9: odissa vā anodissa vā saddaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a:2310_16: tato dvīhi kattabbakamme tatiyassa kammacchedo bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2310_17: Saṃyatapadasaddo pana hutvā aparassa bhikkhuno divāṭṭhānasantikaṃ gantvā tena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā hatthasaññaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2310_19: tato dve janā hatthena hatthaṃ saṃsibbantā dvīsu hatthesu ṭhapetvā upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0201a:2311_0: Pañcāhikaṃ kho panāti cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyanti idaṃ tāva pakatidhammassavanameva,
atk-s0201a:2311_1: taṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pañcame pañcame divase dve therā nātivikāle nhāyitvā anuruddhattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2311_2: Tattha tayopi nisīditvā tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti,
atk-s0201a:2311_6: Ettāvatā therena bhagavatā appamādalakkhaṇaṃ pucchitena pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2311_17: Tasmā thero amhākaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ muñcitvā pamādakālo nāma natthīti dassento pamādaṭṭhānesuyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a:2312_1: Athassa bhagavā sādhukāraṃ datvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pucchanto puna atthi pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2313_1: Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānādhigame byākate dutiyajjhānādīni pucchanto etassa pana votiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2313_5: Pacchimapañhe pana lokuttarañāṇadassanavasena adhigataṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ pucchanto alamariyañāṇadassanavisesoti āha.
atk-s0201a:2313_7: Tattha yasmā vedayitasukhato avedayitasukhaṃ santataraṃ paṇītataraṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2313_8: tasmā aññaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vā na samanupassāmāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2314_3: tena tesaṃ paṭivedhatthāya kiñci kathetabbaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a:2314_4: Sāmaggirasena pana ayañca ayañca ānisaṃsoti sāmaggirasānisaṃsameva nesaṃ bhagavā kathesi.
atk-s0201a:2314_6: Te kira bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā thokaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2314_11: Kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ āyasmatoti bhagavantaṃ nissāya pabbajjādīni adhigantvāpi attano guṇakathāya aṭṭiyamānā adhigamappicchatāya āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2314_13: Cetasā ceto paricca viditoti ajja me āyasmanto lokiyasamāpattiyā vītināmesuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2314_14: ajja lokuttarāyāti evaṃ cittena cittaṃ paricchinditvā viditaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2314_18: ajja ayyo kimilatthero imāya ca imāya ca samāpattiyā vītināmesīti evamārocesunti attho.
atk-s0201a:2314_19: Pañhābhipuṭṭhenāti tampi mayā sayaṃ viditanti vā devatāhi ārocitanti vā ettakeneva mukhaṃ me sajjanti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā apuṭṭheneva me na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2314_20: Bhagavatā pana pañhābhipuṭṭhena pañhaṃ abhipucchitena satā byākataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2314_21: tatra me kiṃ na rocathāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2315_2: atho serīsako sahā”ti evaṃ āgato aṭṭhavīsatiyā yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ abbhantaro eko devarājā.
atk-s0201a:2315_4: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira vessavaṇena pesito etaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ sayaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0201a:2315_5: gahetvā giñjakāvasathato gosiṅgasālavanassa antare disvā bhagavā attanā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gosiṅgasālavane
atk-s0201a:2315_8: Mayāpi tassā desanāya bhāginā bhavitabbanti adissamānena kāyena satthu padānupadiko gantvā avidūre ṭhatvā dhammaṃ sutvā satthari gacchantepi na gato, –
atk-s0201a:2315_9: “ime therā kiṃ karissantī”ti dassanatthaṃ pana tattheva ṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2315_10: Atha te dve there anuruddhattheraṃ paliveṭhente disvā, –
atk-s0201a:2315_11: “ime therā bhagavantaṃ nissāya pabbajjādayo sabbaguṇe adhigantvāpi bhagavatova maccharāyanti,
atk-s0201a:2315_15: pathavito yāva brahmalokā etesaṃ guṇe pakāsessāmī”ti cintetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2316_2: vajjiraṭṭhavāsino bhagavantañca ime ca tayo kulaputte passituṃ labhanti,
atk-s0201a:2316_8: Saddaṃ sutvāti so kira attano yakkhānubhāvena mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā sakalaṃ vajjiraṭṭhaṃ ajjhottharanto taṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0201a:2316_9: Tena cassa tesu rukkhapabbatādīsu adhivatthā bhummā devatā saddaṃ assosuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2316_16: “amhākaṃ kulato nikkhamitvā ime kulaputtā pabbajitā evaṃ sīlavanto guṇavanto ācārasampannā kalyāṇadhammā”ti
atk-s0201a:2316_17: evaṃ tañcepi kulaṃ ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaṃ anussareyyāti evaṃ sabbattha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0201a:2320_4: “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā pacchā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2320_5: Imasmiṃ pana mahāgosiṅgasutte bhagavato gocaragāmo anibandho,
atk-s0201a:2320_11: Therehi sāvakehi saddhinti pātimokkhasaṃvarādīhi thirakārakeheva dhammehi samannāgatattā therehi,
atk-s0201a:2320_15: Tatthāyasmā sāriputto attano sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhasāsane abhiññāto.
atk-s0201a:2320_16: Cakkhumantānaṃ gaganamajjhe ṭhito sūriyo viya cando viya,
atk-s0201a:2320_17: samuddatīre ṭhitānaṃ sāgaro viya ca pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0201a:2320_18: Na kevalañcassa imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇavaseneva mahantatā veditabbā,
atk-s0201a:2320_19: ito aññesaṃ dhammadāyādasuttaṃ anaṅgaṇasuttaṃ sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ sīhanādasuttaṃ rathavinītaṃ mahāhatthipadopamaṃ
atk-s0201a:2320_20: mahāvedallaṃ cātumasuttaṃ dīghanakhaṃ anupadasuttaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbasuttaṃ saccavibhaṅgasuttaṃ piṇḍapātapārisuddhi
atk-s0201a:2320_21: sampasādanīyaṃ saṅgītisuttaṃ dasuttarasuttaṃ pavāraṇāsuttaṃ susimasuttaṃ therapañhasuttaṃ mahāniddeso
atk-s0201a:2320_22: paṭisambhidāmaggo therasīhanādasuttaṃ abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi suttānaṃ vasena therassa mahantatā
atk-s0201a:2320_27: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2321_0: Mahāmoggallānopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2321_2: cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttaṃ māratajjaniyasuttaṃ pāsādakampanaṃ sakalaṃ iddhipādasaṃyuttaṃ nandopanandadamanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2321_3: yamakapāṭihāriyakāle devalokagamanaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi
atk-s0201a:2321_8: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2322_0: Mahākassapopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2322_1: Apicassa cīvaraparivattanasuttaṃ jiṇṇacīvarasuttaṃ candopamaṃ sakalaṃ kassapasaṃyuttaṃ mahāariyavaṃsasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2322_2: therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2322_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2323_0: Anuruddhattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2323_1: Apicassa cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ naḷakapānasuttaṃ anuttariyasuttaṃ upakkilesasuttaṃ anuruddhasaṃyuttaṃ mahāpurisavitakkasuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2323_2: therassa abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2323_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2324_0: Āyasmatā ca revatenāti ettha pana dve revatā khadiravaniyarevato ca kaṅkhārevato ca.
atk-s0201a:2324_4: akappiyā muggā”ti evaṃ kaṅkhābahulo pana thero idha revatoti adhippeto.
atk-s0201a:2324_5: Sopi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2324_10: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2325_0: Ānandattheropi sīlādiguṇehi ceva imasmiṃ sutte āgataguṇehi ca thero viya abhiññāto pākaṭo mahā.
atk-s0201a:2325_1: Apicassa sekkhasuttaṃ bāhitikasuttaṃ āneñjasappāyaṃ gopakamoggallānaṃ bahudhātukaṃ cūḷasuññataṃ mahāsuññataṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_2: acchariyabbhutasuttaṃ bhaddekarattaṃ mahānidānaṃ mahāparinibbānaṃ subhasuttaṃ cūḷaniyalokadhātusuttaṃ
atk-s0201a:2325_3: abhinikkhamanaṃ etadagganti imesampi vasena mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2325_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2326_0: Aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehīti na kevalañca eteheva,
atk-s0201a:2326_1: aññehi ca mahāguṇatāya pākaṭehi abhiññātehi bahūhi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṃ bhagavā gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2326_2: Āyasmā hi sāriputto sayaṃ mahāpañño aññepi bahū mahāpaññe bhikkhū gahetvā tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi.
atk-s0201a:2326_7: āyasmā ānando sayaṃ bahussuto aññepi bahū bahussute bhikkhū gahetvā tadā dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihāsi,
atk-s0201a:2326_8: evaṃ tadā ete ca aññe ca abhiññātā mahātherā tiṃsasahassamattā bhikkhū dasabalaṃ parivāretvā vihariṃsūti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2327_1: Yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkamīti thero kira paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito pacchimalokadhātuṃ olokento vanante
atk-s0201a:2327_2: kīḷantassa mattakhattiyassa kaṇṇato patamānaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2327_4: maṇināgadantato patamānaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ viya ca atthaṃ gacchamānaṃ paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ addasa.
atk-s0201a:2327_5: Tadanantaraṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento nemiyaṃ gahetvā parivattayamānaṃ rajatacakkaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2327_7: sapakkhe papphoṭetvā gaganatale pakkhandamānaṃ setahaṃsaṃ viya ca meghavaṇṇāya samuddakucchito uggantvā
atk-s0201a:2327_10: Tasmiñhi samaye sālarukkhā mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā sabbapāliphullā dukūlapārutā viya,
atk-s0201a:2327_13: tattha tattha nipatantena pupphareṇunā lākhārasena siñcamānaṃ viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2327_14: Bhamaramadhukaragaṇā kusumareṇumadamattā upagāyamānā viya vanantaresu vicaranti.
atk-s0201a:2327_17: “kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti cintesi,
atk-s0201a:2327_20: “ajja mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dhammasenāpatittherassa santikaṃ gantvā dhammaratiyā vītināmessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2327_21: Gacchanto pana ekakova agantvā “mayhaṃ piyasahāyaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato
atk-s0201a:2327_22: vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2328_0: Evamāvusoti kho āyasmā mahākassapoti theropi yasmā piyadhammassavanova ariyasāvako,
atk-s0201a:2328_1: tasmā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gacchāvuso, tvaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2328_2: mayhaṃ sīsaṃ vā rujjati piṭṭhi vāti kiñci lesāpadesaṃ akatvā tuṭṭhahadayova,
atk-s0201a:2328_4: Paṭissutvā ca nisinnaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahāmoggallānaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0201a:2328_5: Tasmiṃ samaye dve mahātherā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya,
atk-s0201a:2328_10: Anuruddhattheropi tasmiṃ samaye divāṭṭhāne nisinno dve mahāthere sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ gacchante
atk-s0201a:2328_11: disvā pacchimalokadhātuṃ olokento sūriyaṃ vanantaṃ pavisantaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2328_12: pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento candaṃ vanantato uggacchantaṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2328_13: sālavanaṃ olokento sabbapāliphullameva sālavanañca disvā ajja uposathadivaso,
atk-s0201a:2328_14: ime ca me jeṭṭhabhātikā dhammasenāpatissa santikaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2328_16: ahampi dhammassavanassa bhāgī bhavissāmīti nisinnaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā mahātherānaṃ padānupadiko hutvā nikkhami.
atk-s0201a:2328_18: “atha kho āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca anuruddho yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0201a:2329_1: Evaṃ upasaṅkamante pana te mahāthere āyasmā ānando attano divāṭṭhāne nisinnoyeva disvā,
atk-s0201a:2329_5: mayhaṃ piyasahāyampi revatattheraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti sabbaṃ mahāmoggallānassa mahākassapassa anuruddhassa
atk-s0201a:2329_7: Iti te dve janā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā dve candā viya,
atk-s0201a:2329_12: Disvāna āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti dūratova disvā anukkamena kathāupacāraṃ sampattametaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2329_15: āvusoti ettha duvidhaṃ rāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ puggalarāmaṇeyyakañca.
atk-s0201a:2329_16: Tattha vanaṃ nāma nāgasalaḷasālacampakādīhi sañchannaṃ hoti bahalacchāyaṃ pupphaphalūpagaṃ vividharukkhaṃ udakasampannaṃ gāmato nissaṭaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2332_0: Vanaṃ pana sacepi ujjaṅgale hoti nirudakaṃ viralacchāyaṃ kaṇṭakasamākiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2333_0: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0201a:2335_1: Tadā hi gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ hoti kusumagandhasugandhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2335_2: sadevake cettha loke aggapuggalo sammāsambuddho tiṃsasahassamattehi abhiññātabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ viharati.
atk-s0201a:2336_1: abbhaṃ mahikā dhūmo rajo rāhūti imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi virahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2336_3: mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā apupphitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2336_4: Dibbā maññe gandhā sampavantīti dibbā mandārapupphakoviḷārapāricchattakacandanacuṇṇagandhā viya samantā pavāyanti,
atk-s0201a:2337_1: āvuso ānandāti ānandatthero tesaṃ pañcannaṃ therānaṃ saṅghanavakova.
atk-s0201a:2337_4: Te hi dve therā aññamaññaṃ mamāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2337_6: “mayā kattabbaṃ satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ karotī”ti ānandattheraṃ mamāyi.
atk-s0201a:2337_7: Ānandatthero bhagavato sāvakānaṃ aggoti sāriputtattheraṃ mamāyi,
atk-s0201a:2337_8: kuladārake pabbājetvā sāriputtattherassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2337_10: Evaṃ ekamekena attano pattacīvaraṃ datvā pabbājetvā upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpitāni pañca bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2337_11: Āyasmā ānando paṇītāni cīvarādīnipi labhitvā therasseva deti.
atk-s0201a:2338_2: kathaṃ nu kho dhammaratanaṃ pūjitaṃ nāma hotī”ti?
atk-s0201a:2338_12: Thero taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2338_16: idaṃ panāhaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmoti. Dehi, ānandāti.
atk-s0201a:2339_0: Apica anumatipucchā nāmesā khuddakato paṭṭhāya pucchitabbā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2339_11: Ettāvatāpi ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā na bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2339_12: atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma,
atk-s0201a:2339_14: Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2339_15: Yathā hi janapadamhi uppanno aṭṭo gāmabhojakaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0201a:2339_21: raññā vinicchitakālato paṭṭhāya aṭṭo aparāparaṃ na sañcarati,
atk-s0201a:2339_24: atha mayaṃ sabbepi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma,
atk-s0201a:2339_26: Ettāvatā ayaṃ dhammadesanā sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2339_27: Evaṃ anumatipucchaṃ pucchanto thero paṭhamaṃ ānandattheraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2340_0: Bahussuto hotīti bahu assa sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2340_1: navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ pāḷianusandhipubbāparavasena uggahitaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2340_3: Yassa hi ito gahitaṃ ito palāyati,
atk-s0201a:2340_5: parisamajjhe ekaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2340_7: Yassa pana uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2340_8: dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa na nassati,
atk-s0201a:2340_11: Yathā hi sutaṃ hadayamañjūsāya sannicitaṃ silāyaṃ lekhā viya,
atk-s0201a:2340_12: suvaṇṇaghaṭe pakkhittasīhavasā viya ca ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2340_15: Ekaccassa hi uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ niccalitaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2340_16: asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehīti vutte sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2340_18: asukasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehīti vutte uddharitvā tameva katheti.
atk-s0201a:2341_4: yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2341_5: Mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:2341_8: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suppaṭividdhā.
atk-s0201a:2341_9: Parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehīti ettha padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2341_10: taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā dasavidhabyañjanabuddhiyo aparihāpetvā vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0201a:2341_12: Apica yo bhikkhu parisati dhammaṃ desento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhapitvā aññaṃ upārambhakaraṃ suttaṃ āharati,
atk-s0201a:2341_15: evamidaṃ gahetvā ettha khipanto ekapasseneva pariharanto kālaṃ ñatvā vuṭṭhahati.
atk-s0201a:2341_18: Yo pana suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā bahi ekapadampi agantvā pāḷiyā anusandhiñca pubbāparañca amakkhento
atk-s0201a:2341_19: ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā tulikāya paricchindanto viya,
atk-s0201a:2342_0: Anuppabandhehīti ettha yo bhikkhu dhammaṃ kathento suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā ārabhitvā āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya turitaturito araṇiṃ manthento viya,
atk-s0201a:2342_2: pāḷiyā anusandhipubbāparesu gahitaṃ gahitameva aggahitaṃ aggahitameva ca katvā purāṇapaṇṇantaresu caramānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2342_3: godhaṃ uṭṭhapento viya tattha tattha paharanto osāpento ohāya gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2342_4: Yopi dhammaṃ kathento kālena sīghaṃ kālena dandhaṃ kālena mahāsaddaṃ kālena khuddakasaddaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2342_11: imesaṃ sabbesampi kathā appabandhā nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2342_12: Yo pana suttaṃ ārabhitvā ācariyehi dinnanaye ṭhito acchinnadhāraṃ katvā nadīsotaṃ viya pavatteti,
atk-s0201a:2342_13: ākāsagaṅgato bhassamānaṃ udakaṃ viya nirantaraṃ kathaṃ pavatteti,
atk-s0201a:2342_17: Evarūpenāti evarūpena bahussutena bhikkhunā tathārūpeneva bhikkhusatena bhikkhusahassena vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇena vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2342_18: pallaṅkena vā pallaṅkaṃ āhacca nisinnena gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyya.
atk-s0201a:2343_0: 334. Paṭisallānaṃ assa ārāmoti paṭisallānārāmo. Paṭisallāne ratoti paṭisallānarato.
atk-s0201a:2344_3: ākaṅkhamāno pana thero anekānipi cakkavāḷasahassāni voloketiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2344_4: Uparipāsādavaragatoti sattabhūmakassa vā navabhūmakassa vā pāsādavarassa upari gato.
atk-s0201a:2344_5: Sahassaṃ nemimaṇḍalānaṃ volokeyyāti pāsādapariveṇe nābhiyā patiṭṭhitānaṃ nemivaṭṭiyā nemivaṭṭiṃ āhacca
atk-s0201a:2344_6: ṭhitānaṃ nemimaṇḍalānaṃ sahassaṃ vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokeyya,
atk-s0201a:2344_10: evaṃ ayampi dibbacakkhuko bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokānaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0201a:2344_11: Tassa pāsāde ṭhitapurisassa cakkanābhiyo viya cakkavāḷasahasse sinerusahassaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2346_2: Sahetukañhi sakāraṇaṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ vissajjitumpi asakkonto saṃsādeti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2347_0: 338. Yāya vihārasamāpattiyāti yāya lokiyāya vihārasamāpattiyā, yāya lokuttarāya vihārasamāpattiyā.
atk-s0201a:2348_1: Sādhu sādhu sāriputtāti ayaṃ sādhukāro ānandattherassa dinno.
atk-s0201a:2348_4: Yathā taṃ ānandovāti yathā ānandova sammā byākaraṇamāno byākareyya,
atk-s0201a:2348_9: “aho vata sāsane sabrahmacārī bahussutā bhaveyyu”nti. Kasmā?
atk-s0201a:2348_12: Bahussuto uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ āvajjitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2348_15: imasmiṃ maggaphalanibbānānīti sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā,
atk-s0201a:2348_16: samādhissa āgataṭṭhāne samādhiṃ pūretvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikaroti.
atk-s0201a:2348_18: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye uggahetvā āvajjantā sīlādīnaṃ
atk-s0201a:2348_19: āgataṭṭhānesu sīlādīni paripūretvā anukkamena maggaphalanibbānāni sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2349_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ekikā nisīditvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2350_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā anekesu cakkavāḷasahassesu cavamāne ca upapajjamāne
atk-s0201a:2350_4: ca satte disvā vaṭṭabhayena cittaṃ saṃvejetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2351_3: “aho vata sabrahmacārī dhutavādā hutvā dhutaṅgānubhāvena paccayataṇhaṃ milāpetvā aparepi nānappakāre
atk-s0201a:2351_4: kilese dhunitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2352_2: sukhumaṃ pana cittantaraṃ khandhantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ jhānokkantikaṃ ārammaṇokkantikaṃ aṅgavavatthānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2352_3: ārammaṇavavatthānaṃ aṅgasaṅkanti ārammaṇasaṅkanti ekatovaḍḍhanaṃ ubhatovaḍḍhananti ābhidhammikadhammakathikasseva pākaṭaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2352_13: “aho vata sabrahmacārī ābhidhammikā hutvā sukhumesu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2353_2: paññavāyeva ca cittaṃ attano vase vattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2353_4: Duppañño hi uppannassa cittassa vase vattetvā ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi katipāheneva gihibhāvaṃ patvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0201a:2353_6: “aho vata sabrahmacārī acittavasikā hutvā cittaṃ attano vase vattetvā sabbānassa visevitavipphanditāni
atk-s0201a:2353_7: bhañjitvā īsakampi bahi nikkhamituṃ adentā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā lokuttaradhammaṃ sacchikareyyu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2354_4: yasmā saṅghārāmassa nāma bahussutabhikkhūhipi sobhanakāraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:2354_13: Apica mamapi suṇāthāti apica mamapi vacanaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0201a:2354_14: Na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmīti na tāva ahaṃ imaṃ caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya ābhujitaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2354_16: Idaṃ kira bhagavā paripākagate ñāṇe rajjasiriṃ pahāya katābhinikkhamano anupubbena bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha
atk-s0201a:2354_17: caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aparājitapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā daḷhasamādāno hutvā nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0201a:2354_18: bhinditvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādento sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0201a:2354_20: Apica pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānopi paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2354_29: mayaṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhissāmā’ti pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0201a:2354_30: daḷhasamādānā hutvā ‘arahattaṃ appatvā imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmā’ti samaṇadhammaṃ kātabbaṃ maññissanti,
atk-s0201a:2354_31: te evaṃ paṭipannā katipāheneva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2354_32: imaṃ pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamāno paṭipattisāraṃ puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2354_37: evarūpena bhikkhunā nippariyāyeneva gosiṅgasālavanaṃ sobheyyāti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
atk-s0201a:2358_5: Tattha pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṃ ekanāḷikā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2358_9: paṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvāti catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathanaṃ caturassā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2358_13: paṇḍitaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamananti ayaṃ nisinnavattikā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2359_7: Na rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2359_8: Gaṇanato na jānāti nāma attano gunnaṃ sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vāti saṅkhyaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2359_9: So gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā,
atk-s0201a:2359_10: ajja ettikā na dissantīti dve tīṇi gāmantarāni vā aṭaviṃ vā vicaranto na pariyesati,
atk-s0201a:2359_11: aññesaṃ gāvīsu attano gogaṇaṃ paviṭṭhāsupi gogaṇaṃ gaṇetvā,
atk-s0201a:2359_12: “imā ettikā gāvo na amhāka”nti yaṭṭhiyā pothetvā na nīharati,
atk-s0201a:2359_15: “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ dhenuṃ gaṇhātī”ti tajjetvā attano gāviyo gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2359_22: ettikā kabarā ettikā nīlā”ti na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2360_0: Na lakkhaṇakusalo hotīti gāvīnaṃ sarīre kataṃ dhanusattisūlādibhedaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2360_1: so gāvīsu haṭāsu vā palātāsu vā ajja asukalakkhaṇā ca asukalakkhaṇā ca gāvo na dissanti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2361_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretāti gunnaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi pahaṭaṭṭhānesu vaṇo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2361_3: Tāni daṇḍena apanetvā bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2361_10: gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2362_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti gunnaṃ vuttanayeneva sañjāto vaṇo bhesajjaṃ datvā vākena vā cīrakena vā bandhitvā paṭicchādetabbo hoti.
atk-s0201a:2362_5: Evaṃ gāvo gelaññābhibhūtā neva yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ…pe…
atk-s0201a:2363_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti antovasse ḍaṃsamakasādīnaṃ ussannakāle gogaṇe vajaṃ paviṭṭhe tattha tattha dhūmo kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2363_2: Gogaṇo sabbarattiṃ ḍaṃsādīhi upadduto niddaṃ alabhitvā punadivase araññe tattha tattha rukkhamūlādīsu nipajjitvā niddāyati,
atk-s0201a:2364_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthaṃ samanti vā visamanti vā sagāhanti vā niggāhanti vā na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2364_2: Tāsaṃ visamatitthe pāsāṇādīni akkamantīnaṃ pādā bhijjanti,
atk-s0201a:2364_3: sagāhaṃ gambhīraṃ titthaṃ otiṇṇā kumbhīlādayo gāhā gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:2365_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti pītampi apītampi na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2365_4: imāya na laddho”ti evaṃ pītāpītaṃ jānitabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2365_5: Ayaṃ pana divasabhāgaṃ araññe gogaṇaṃ rakkhitvā pānīyaṃ pāyessāmīti nadiṃ vā taḷākaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2365_6: Tattha mahāusabhā ca anuusabhā ca balavagāviyo ca dubbalāni ceva mahallakāni ca gorūpāni siṅgehi vā phāsukāhi
atk-s0201a:2365_7: vā paharitvā attano okāsaṃ katvā ūruppamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā yathākāmaṃ pivanti.
atk-s0201a:2365_8: Avasesā okāsaṃ alabhamānā tīre ṭhatvā kalalamissakaṃ udakaṃ pivanti,
atk-s0201a:2365_10: Atha ne gopālako piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā puna araññaṃ paveseti,
atk-s0201a:2365_11: tattha apītagāviyo pipāsāya sukkhamānā yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2366_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti “ayaṃ maggo samo khemo,
atk-s0201a:2366_1: ayaṃ visamo sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo”ti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2366_2: So samaṃ khemaṃ maggaṃ vajjetvā gogaṇaṃ itaraṃ maggaṃ paṭipādeti,
atk-s0201a:2366_3: tattha gāvo sīhabyagghādīnaṃ gandhena coraparissayena vā abhibhūtā bhantamigasappaṭibhāgā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0201a:2367_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti gopālakena hi gocarakusalena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2367_2: ekadisāya gogaṇaṃ cāretvā punadivase tattha na cāretabbo.
atk-s0201a:2367_3: Mahatā hi gogaṇena ciṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ bheritalaṃ viya suddhaṃ hoti nittiṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2367_5: Tasmā pañcame vā sattame vā divase puna tattha cāretuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:2367_8: Ayaṃ pana imaṃ pañcāhikavāraṃ vā sattāhikavāraṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2368_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṇḍitagopālakena yāva vacchakassa maṃsalohitaṃ saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2368_1: tāva ekaṃ dve thane ṭhapetvā sāvasesadohinā bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2368_4: saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto kampamāno mātu purato patitvā kālaṅkaroti.
atk-s0201a:2368_6: “mayhaṃ puttako attano mātukhīraṃ pātumpi na labhatī”ti puttasokena na yāvadatthaṃ tiṇāni khādituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2369_1: Gāvo pariṇayanti yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti gopariṇāyakā.
atk-s0201a:2369_2: Na atirekapūjāyāti paṇḍito hi gopālako evarūpe usabhe atirekapūjāya pūjeti,
atk-s0201a:2369_7: rattiṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā celavitānassa heṭṭhā sayāpeti.
atk-s0201a:2369_8: Ayaṃ pana tato ekasakkārampi na karoti,
atk-s0201a:2369_9: usabhā atirekapūjaṃ alabhamānā gogaṇaṃ na rakkhanti,
atk-s0201a:2370_3: “cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti evaṃ vuttarūpaṃ dvīhākārehi na jānāti gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā.
atk-s0201a:2370_17: kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatā pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsāti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2370_18: Seyyathāpi so gopālako gaṇanato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2370_20: So gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0201a:2370_21: lakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2370_22: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2370_23: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sīlasamādhivipassanāmaggaphalanibbānehi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2370_24: yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti,
atk-s0201a:2371_6: Seyyathāpi so gopālako vaṇṇato gunnaṃ rūpaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2371_8: So samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā…pe…
atk-s0201a:2372_1: kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍitoti evaṃ vuttaṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ paṇḍitabālalakkhaṇanti na jānāti.
atk-s0201a:2372_2: So evaṃ ajānanto bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevati,
atk-s0201a:2372_3: bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite asevanto kappiyākappiyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ garukalahukaṃ satekicchaatekicchaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ na jānāti;
atk-s0201a:2372_4: taṃ ajānanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2372_5: So yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2372_6: evaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuttehi sīlādīhi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2372_7: gopālako viya ca pañcahi gorasehi pañcahi dhammakkhandhehi paribāhiro hoti.
atk-s0201a:2373_0: Na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hotīti uppannaṃ kāmavitakkanti evaṃ vutte kāmavitakkādike na vinodeti,
atk-s0201a:2373_1: so imaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā vitakkavasiko hutvā vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2374_0: Na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hotīti cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hotītiādinā nayena sabbārammaṇesu nimittaṃ
atk-s0201a:2374_1: gaṇhanto yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0201a:2374_3: So vivaṭadvāro vicaranto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2375_0: Na dhūmaṃ kattā hotīti so gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0201a:2375_1: dhammakathaṃ vā sarabhaññaṃ vā upanisinnakathaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā na karoti.
atk-s0201a:2375_2: Tato naṃ manussā bahussuto guṇavāti na jānanti,
atk-s0201a:2375_3: te guṇāguṇaṃ ajānantā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0201a:2375_4: So paccayehi kilamamāno buddhavacanaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2376_0: Na titthaṃ jānātīti titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū na upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0201a:2376_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho kiṃ dīpetī”ti evaṃ na paripucchati na paripañhati,
atk-s0201a:2376_7: Tassa te evaṃ aparipucchato avivaṭañceva na vivaranti,
atk-s0201a:2376_11: Anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesūti anekavidhāsu kaṅkhāsu ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na paṭivinodenti.
atk-s0201a:2376_12: Kaṅkhā eva hi kaṅkhāṭhāniyā dhammā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2376_13: Tattha ekaṃ kaṅkhampi na nīharantīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2376_14: So evaṃ bahussutatitthaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2376_15: Yathā ca so gopālako titthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2376_16: evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu dhammatitthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2376_20: Te avisaye puṭṭhā kathetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2376_21: so attanā sakaṅkho kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2377_0: Na pītaṃ jānātīti yathā so gopālako pītāpītaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2377_1: evaṃ dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ na jānāti na labhati,
atk-s0201a:2377_2: savanamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ nissāya ānisaṃsaṃ na vindati,
atk-s0201a:2377_7: so sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ asuṇanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2378_0: Na vīthiṃ jānātīti so gopālako maggāmaggaṃ viya, –
atk-s0201a:2378_1: “ayaṃ lokiyo ayaṃ lokuttaro”ti ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2378_2: Ajānanto lokiyamagge abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2379_0: Na gocarakusalo hotīti so gopālako pañcāhikavāre sattāhikavāre viya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0201a:2379_1: “ime lokiyā ime lokuttarā”ti yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti.
atk-s0201a:2379_2: Ajānanto sukhumaṭṭhānesu attano ñāṇaṃ carāpetvā lokiyasatipaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā lokuttaraṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2380_0: Anavasesadohī ca hotīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto anavasesaṃ duhati.
atk-s0201a:2380_1: Niddesavāre panassa abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentīti abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0201a:2380_2: Ettha dve abhihārā vācābhihāro ca paccayābhihāro ca.
atk-s0201a:2380_3: Vācābhihāro nāma manussā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2380_6: Paccayābhihāro nāma vatthādīni vā telaphāṇitādīni vā gahetvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2380_9: Tatra bhikkhu mattaṃ na jānātīti bhikkhu tesu paccayesu pamāṇaṃ na jānāti, –
atk-s0201a:2380_12: attano thāmo veditabbo”ti rathavinīte vuttanayena pamāṇayuttaṃ aggahetvā yaṃ āharanti,
atk-s0201a:2380_14: Manussā vippaṭisārino na puna abhiharitvā pavārenti.
atk-s0201a:2380_15: So paccayehi kilamanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkoti…pe…
atk-s0201a:2381_0: Te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hotīti so gopālako mahāusabhe viya te there bhikkhū imāya āvi ceva raho ca mettāya kāyakammādikāya atirekapūjāya na pūjeti.
atk-s0201a:2381_2: “ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti navake bhikkhū dvīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0201a:2381_3: na āmisasaṅgahena cīvarena vā pattena vā pattapariyāpannena vā vasanaṭṭhānena vā.
atk-s0201a:2381_5: Pāḷiṃ vā aṭṭhakathaṃ vā dhammakathābandhaṃ vā guyhaganthaṃ vā na sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0201a:2381_6: Navakā therānaṃ santikā sabbaso ime dve saṅgahe alabhamānā imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:2381_7: Yathā tassa gopālakassa gogaṇo na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0201a:2381_9: Yathā ca so gopālako pañcahi gorasehi paribāhiro hoti,
atk-s0201a:2385_3: Tasmiṃ kira māpiyamāne rattiṃ gaṅgāsotato maccho thalaṃ patto.
atk-s0201a:2385_4: Manussā celāni telapātiyaṃ temetvā ukkā katvā macchaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2385_5: Nagare niṭṭhite tassa nāmaṃ karonte amhehi nagaraṭṭhānassa gahitadivase celukkāhi maccho gahitoti ukkacelā-
atk-s0201a:2385_7: Bhikkhū āmantesīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnassa sabbā gaṅgā pākaṭā hutvā paññāyati,
atk-s0201a:2385_8: tādise vālikussade gaṅgātitthe sāyanhasamaye mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā mahāgaṅgaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sandamānaṃ olokento, –
atk-s0201a:2385_9: “atthi nu kho imaṃ gaṅgaṃ nissāya koci pubbe vaḍḍhiparihāniṃ patto”ti āvajjitvā,
atk-s0201a:2385_10: pubbe ekaṃ bālagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassā gogaṇā imissā gaṅgāya āvaṭṭe patitvā samuddameva paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a:2385_11: aparaṃ pana paṇḍitagopālakaṃ nissāya anekasatasahassagogaṇassa sotthi jātā vaḍḍhi jātā ārogyaṃ jātanti addasa.
atk-s0201a:2385_12: Disvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmīti cintetvā bhikkhū āmantesi.
atk-s0201a:2386_4: Uttaraṃ tīraṃ suvidehānanti gaṅgāya orime tīre magadharaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2386_6: gāvo magadharaṭṭhato videharaṭṭhaṃ netvā rakkhissāmīti uttaraṃ tīraṃ patāresi.
atk-s0201a:2386_12: Tena hi gopālakena gāvo otārentena gaṅgāya orimatīre samatitthañca visamatitthañca oloketabbaṃ assa,
atk-s0201a:2386_13: majjhe gaṅgāya gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ dve tīṇi vālikatthalāni sallakkhetabbāni assu.
atk-s0201a:2386_15: imasmā titthā bhaṭṭhā imaṃ titthaṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0201a:2386_17: Ayaṃ pana bālagopālako orimatīre gunnaṃ otaraṇatitthaṃ samaṃ vā visamaṃ vā anoloketvāva majjhe gaṅgāya
atk-s0201a:2386_18: gunnaṃ vissamaṭṭhānatthaṃ dve tīṇi vālikatthalānipi asallakkhetvāva paratīre cattāri pañca uttaraṇatitthāni
atk-s0201a:2386_20: Athassa mahāusabho javanasampannatāya ceva thāmasampannatāya ca tiriyaṃ gaṅgāya sotaṃ chetvā pārimaṃ
atk-s0201a:2386_24: Gāvo mahāusabho nivatto mayampi nivattissāmāti nivattā.
atk-s0201a:2386_25: Mahato gogaṇassa nivattaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chijjitvā majjhe gaṅgāya āvaṭṭaṃ uṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2386_27: Ekopi goṇo arogo nāma nāhosi. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2387_0: Akusalā imassa lokassāti idha loke khandhadhātāyatanesu akusalā achekā,
atk-s0201a:2388_1: Evaṃ kaṇhapakkhaṃ niṭṭhapetvā sukkapakkhaṃ dassento bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2388_3: Tattha balavagāvoti dantagoṇe ceva dhenuyo ca.
atk-s0201a:2388_9: Mātugoravakena vuyhamānoti mātā purato purato huṃhunti goravaṃ katvā saññaṃ dadamānā urena udakaṃ chindamānā gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2388_10: vacchako tāya goravasaññāya dhenuyā vā urena chinnodakena gacchamāno “mātugoravakena vuyhamāno”ti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2389_1: Mārassa sotaṃ chetvāti arahattamaggena mārassa taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā.
atk-s0201a:2389_2: Pāraṃ gatāti mahāusabhā nadīpāraṃ viya saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0201a:2389_3: Pāraṃ agamaṃsūti mahāusabhānaṃ pāraṅgatakkhaṇe gaṅgāya sotassa tayo koṭṭhāse atikkamma ṭhitā mahāusabhe
atk-s0201a:2389_4: pāraṃ patte disvā tesaṃ gatamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2389_5: Pāraṃ gamissantīti catumaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse khepetvā ṭhitā idāni arahattamaggena avasesaṃ
atk-s0201a:2389_6: taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā balavagāvo viya nadīpāraṃ saṃsārapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamissantīti.
atk-s0201a:2390_9: Evarūpaṃ satthāraṃ labhitvā tumhe pattāyeva nāmāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2394_2: Tattha mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2394_3: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2394_6: Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā sabbākārasampannā
atk-s0201a:2395_0: Saccako nigaṇṭhaputtoti pubbe kira eko nigaṇṭho ca nigaṇṭhī ca pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahetvā,
atk-s0201a:2395_1: vādaṃ āropessāmāti jambudīpe vicarantā vesāliyaṃ samāgatā.
atk-s0201a:2395_17: idheva vasathā”ti gehaṃ datvā baliṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2395_24: mātāpitūhi uggahitāni pañca pañca vādasatāni uggahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2395_26: “amhākaṃ ammā kule dārikā nāma hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni datvā kulagharaṃ pesitapubbā nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2395_27: Yo pana agāriko tāsaṃ vādaṃ maddituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2395_34: “ayaṃ jambudīpo nāma jambuyā paññāyatī”ti jambusākhaṃ gahetvā cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2395_36: tassa dvāre paṃsupuñje vā vālikapuñje vā jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā, –
atk-s0201a:2395_38: so imaṃ maddatū”ti vatvā gāmaṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0201a:2395_39: Evaṃ gāmena gāmaṃ vicarantiyo sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇitvā tatheva gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ ṭhapetvā sampattamanussānaṃ ārocetvā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0201a:2396_0: Tena samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ nissāya jetavane viharati.
atk-s0201a:2396_1: Athāyasmā sāriputto gilāne pucchanto ajaggitaṭṭhānaṃ jagganto attano kiccamahantatāya aññehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0201a:2396_2: divātaraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto gāmadvāre jambudhajaṃ disvā, –
atk-s0201a:2396_11: vādaṃ āropetukāmā jetavane therassa santikaṃ gacchathāti vadeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2396_12: Te therassa vacanaṃ sutvā jambudhajaṃ madditvā chaḍḍesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2396_17: Paribbājikā puna gāmaṃ pavisitvā ekekaṃ vīthiṃ gahetvā, –
atk-s0201a:2396_18: “buddhasāvako kira sāriputto nāma amhehi saddhiṃ vādaṃ karissati,
atk-s0201a:2397_1: “amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne mātugāmassa āgamanaṃ nāma aphāsuka”nti vihāramajjhe nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2397_9: tumhe pana mātugāmā nāma paṭhamaṃ pucchathāti āha.
atk-s0201a:2397_10: Tā catassopi catūsu disāsu ṭhatvā mātāpitūnaṃ santike uggahitaṃ vādasahassaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2397_11: Thero khaggena kumudanāḷaṃ chindanto viya pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā kathesi,
atk-s0201a:2397_17: ahaṃ pana ekaṃ yeva pañhaṃ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2398_0: Thero ayaṃ pana kulaputte pabbājetvā paṭhamaṃ sikkhāpetabbapañhoti vatvā, –
atk-s0201a:2398_7: mayhaṃ tumhe ekaṃ pañhampi kathetuṃ na sakkotha,
atk-s0201a:2398_8: evaṃ sante kassa jayo kassa parājayoti? Tumhākaṃ, bhante, jayo,
atk-s0201a:2398_13: Tumhe mātugāmā nāma amhākaṃ santike pabbajituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0201a:2398_14: amhākaṃ pana sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbajathāti.
atk-s0201a:2398_15: Tā sādhūti therassa sāsanaṃ gahetvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2398_16: Pabbajitā ca pana appamattā ātāpiniyo hutvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2399_3: tato bahutarañca bāhirasamayaṃ uggahetvā katthaci agantvā rājadārake sippaṃ sikkhāpento tattheva vesāliyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0201a:2399_4: paññāya atipūritattā kucchi me bhijjeyyāti bhīto ayapaṭṭena kucchiṃ parikkhipitvā carati,
atk-s0201a:2400_3: Sādhusammato bahujanassāti yaṃ yaṃ nakkhattacārena ādisati,
atk-s0201a:2400_5: tasmā ayaṃ sādhuladdhiko bhaddakoti evaṃ sammato mahājanassa.
atk-s0201a:2400_6: Vādena vādaṃ samāraddhoti kathāmaggena dosaṃ āropito.
atk-s0201a:2400_8: Jaṅghāvihāraṃ anucaṅkamamānoti tato tato licchavirājagehato taṃ taṃ gehaṃ gamanatthāya anucaṅkamamāno.
atk-s0201a:2401_3: Parassa hi samayaṃ ñatvā āropito vādo svāropito nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2401_4: Ayaṃ pana samaṇassa gotamassa sāvako paññāyati assajitthero;
atk-s0201a:2401_6: etāhaṃ pucchitvā kathaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2401_10: Thero pana yasmā dukkhanti vutte upārambhassa okāso hoti,
atk-s0201a:2401_21: uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya dukkhameva jirāpentā āhiṇḍathā”ti dosaṃ āropeyya,
atk-s0201a:2401_22: tasmā paravādissa pariyāyakathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2402_2: Yena te licchavī tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ kirassa ahosi –
atk-s0201a:2402_3: “ahaṃ pubbe samayaṃ ajānanabhāvena samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ na āropesiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2402_4: idāni panassa mahāsāvakena kathitaṃ samayaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0201a:2402_5: ime ca mama antevāsikā pañcasatā licchavī sannipatitā.
atk-s0201a:2402_6: Etehi saddhiṃ gantvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti tasmā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2402_11: tatra mayā kiṃ sakkā kātunti idāneva piṭṭhiṃ parivattento āha.
atk-s0201a:2402_18: Vālaṃ kaṇṇe gahetvāti surāparissāvanatthavikaṃ dhovitukāmo kasaṭanidhunanatthaṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā.
atk-s0201a:2402_22: Sāṇadhovikaṃ nāmāti ettha manussā sāṇasāṭakakaraṇatthaṃ sāṇavāke gahetvā muṭṭhiṃ muṭṭhiṃ bandhitvā udake pakkhipanti.
atk-s0201a:2402_24: Atha manussā ambilayāgusurādīni ādāya tattha gantvā sāṇamuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0201a:2402_25: dakkhiṇato vāmato sammukhā cāti tīsu phalakesu sakiṃ dakkhiṇaphalake,
atk-s0201a:2402_27: sakiṃ sammukhaphalake paharantā ambilayāgusurādīni bhuñjantā pivantā khādantā dhovanti.
atk-s0201a:2402_29: Rañño nāgo taṃ kīḷaṃ disvā gambhīraṃ udakaṃ anupavisitvā soṇḍāya udakaṃ gahetvā sakiṃ kumbhe sakiṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0201a:2402_30: sakiṃ ubhosu passesu sakiṃ antarasatthiyaṃ pakkhipanto kīḷittha.
atk-s0201a:2402_31: Tadupādāya taṃ kīḷitajātaṃ sāṇadhovikaṃ nāma vuccati,
atk-s0201a:2402_35: yo bhagavato vādaṃ āropessatīti yo saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati,
atk-s0201a:2402_36: so kiṃ bhavamāno kiṃ yakkho bhavamāno udāhu indo,
atk-s0201a:2402_37: udāhu brahmā bhavamāno bhagavato vādaṃ āropessati?
atk-s0201a:2402_38: Na hi sakkā pakatimanussena bhagavato vādaṃ āropetunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0201a:2403_1: Tena kho pana samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye saccako ārāmaṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2403_7: Tādisānañhi pacchābhattaṃ caṅkamitvā nhatvā sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpetvā nisajja samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2403_8: Yena te bhikkhūti so kira kuhiṃ samaṇo gotamoti pariveṇato pariveṇaṃ gantvā pucchitvā pavisissāmīti vilokento
atk-s0201a:2403_9: araññe hatthī viya caṅkame caṅkamamāne paṃsukūlikabhikkhū disvā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2403_13: bhoti katarasmiṃ āvāse vā maṇḍape vāti attho. Esa,
atk-s0201a:2403_15: bhagavāti tadā kira bhagavā paccūsakāle mahākaruṇā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷe sabbaññutaññāṇajālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2403_17: “sve saccako nigaṇṭhaputto mahatiṃ licchaviparisaṃ gahetvā mama vādaṃ āropetukāmo āgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2403_18: Tasmā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro vesāliyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0201a:2403_19: mahāparisāya nisīdituṃ sukhaṭṭhāne nisīdissāmīti gandhakuṭiṃ apavisitvā mahāvane aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0201a:2403_21: Te bhikkhū bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā āgatā,
atk-s0201a:2403_22: saccakena puṭṭhā dūre nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassentā,
atk-s0201a:2404_0: Mahatiyā licchaviparisāya saddhinti heṭṭhā pañcamattehi licchavisatehi parivutoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2404_2: antovesāliyaṃ pana saccako pañcamattāni licchavirājasatāni gahetvā,
atk-s0201a:2404_3: “vādatthiko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanto”ti sutvā dvinnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sossāmāti yebhuyyena manussā nikkhantā,
atk-s0201a:2404_4: evaṃ sā parisā mahatī aparicchinnagaṇanā ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2404_17: ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idha āgatoti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0201a:2404_19: ahaṃ vāsiṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idha āgatoti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0201a:2404_20: Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmāti evaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2404_25: atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhī nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:2404_26: Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍo viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0201a:2405_1: Kiñcideva desanti kañci okāsaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2405_2: athassa bhagavā pañhapucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha – puccha,
atk-s0201a:2405_9: sabbaṃ te vissajjessāmī”ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvamahāsāvakehi.
atk-s0201a:2406_0: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a:2407_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā,
atk-s0201a:2408_0: “Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti vā,
atk-s0201a:2410_0: Katāvakāsā pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā”ti. vā,
atk-s0201a:2411_0: “Puccha maṃ sabhiya pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0201a:2412_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te” iti. vā –
atk-s0201a:2413_2: yaṃ bhagavā buddhabhūmiṃ patvā etaṃ pavāraṇaṃ pavāreyya.
atk-s0201a:2423_1: sambhavajātake ca sakalajambudīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā pañhānaṃ antakaraṃ adisvā suciratena brāhmaṇena pañhaṃ puṭṭho okāse kārite,
atk-s0201a:2423_2: jātiyā sattavasso rathikāyaṃ paṃsuṃ kīḷanto pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā antaravīthiyaṃ nisinnova –
atk-s0201a:2425_0: Rājā ca kho taṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti. –
atk-s0201a:2427_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya attamano pañhaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2428_9: tattha kiṃ mayā sakkā kātu”nti evaṃ nigaṇṭhassa vacanokāso mā hotūti heṭṭhā assajittherena kathitaniyāmeneva kathento,
atk-s0201a:2428_21: āhara taṃ upamaṃ visatthoti bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0201a:2428_23: Rūpattāyaṃ purisapuggaloti rūpaṃ attā assāti rūpattā,
atk-s0201a:2428_25: Rūpe patiṭṭhāyāti tasmiṃ attāti gahitarūpe patiṭṭhahitvā.
atk-s0201a:2428_26: Puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā pasavatīti kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā paṭilabhati.
atk-s0201a:2428_29: Ime pañcakkhandhā imesaṃ sattānaṃ pathavī viya patiṭṭhā,
atk-s0201a:2428_30: te imesu pañcasu khandhesu patiṭṭhāya kusalākusalakammaṃ nāma āyūhanti.
atk-s0201a:2428_31: Tumhe evarūpaṃ vijjamānameva attānaṃ paṭisedhento pañcakkhandhā anattāti dīpethāti ativiya sakāraṇaṃ katvā upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0201a:2428_33: sabbaññubuddhato añño tassa kathaṃ chinditvā vāde dosaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2428_34: Duvidhā hi puggalā buddhaveneyyā ca sāvakaveneyyā ca.
atk-s0201a:2428_36: Buddhaveneyye pana sāvakā vinetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0201a:2428_39: tasmā etassa vādaṃ chinditvā añño dosaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0201a:2428_40: Tenassa bhagavā sayameva vāde dosadassanatthaṃ nanu tvaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2429_4: Handāhaṃ imaṃ vādaṃ mahājanassāpi matthake pakkhipāmī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2429_10: Bhagavā pana nigaṇṭhato sataguṇenapi sahassaguṇenapi satasahassaguṇenapi vādīvarataro,
atk-s0201a:2429_12: “ayaṃ nigaṇṭho attānaṃ mocetvā mahājanassa matthake vādaṃ pakkhipati,
atk-s0201a:2429_18: nāyaṃ janatā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgatā,
atk-s0201a:2429_19: tvaṃyeva sakalaṃ vesāliṃ saṃvaṭṭitvā mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ āgato,
atk-s0201a:2430_1: Iti bhagavā nigaṇṭhassa vādaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā, tena hi,
atk-s0201a:2430_7: Ghātetāyaṃ vā ghātetunti ghātārahaṃ ghātetabbayuttakaṃ ghātetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2430_8: Jāpetāyaṃ vā jāpetunti dhanajānirahaṃ jāpetabbayuttaṃ jāpetuṃ jiṇṇadhanaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2430_9: Pabbājetāyaṃ vā pabbājetunti sakaraṭṭhato pabbājanārahaṃ pabbājetuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2430_11: Vattituñca arahatīti vattati ceva vattituñca arahati.
atk-s0201a:2430_13: Iti nigaṇṭho attano vādabhedanatthaṃ āhaṭakāraṇameva attano māraṇatthāya āvudhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ karonto viya visesetvā dīpeti,
atk-s0201a:2430_15: Evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotūti mama rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ hotu,
atk-s0201a:2430_16: pāsādikaṃ abhirūpaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya susajjitacittapaṭo viya ca manāpadassananti.
atk-s0201a:2430_17: Evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosīti mama rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0201a:2431_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti nigaṇṭho imasmiṃ ṭhāne viraddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0201a:2431_1: “samaṇo gotamo mama vādaṃ bhindanatthāya kāraṇaṃ āhari,
atk-s0201a:2431_7: tvaṃ mama rūpe vaso vattatīti vadasi,
atk-s0201a:2431_9: kasmā tvaṃ yathā ime licchavirājāno tāvatiṃsadevasadisehi attabhāvehi virocanti abhirūpā pāsādikā,
atk-s0201a:2431_14: tvaṃ pubbe vattati me rūpasmiṃ vasoti vatvā idāni paṭikkhipasī’ti vādaṃ āropessati.
atk-s0201a:2431_16: na vattatīti vuttepi eko doso”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2431_19: Yasmā pana yāvatatiyaṃ bhagavatā pucchite abyākarontassa sattadhā muddhā phalati,
atk-s0201a:2431_20: buddhā ca nāma sattānaṃyeva atthāya kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramīnaṃ pūritattā sattesu balavaanuddayā honti.
atk-s0201a:2431_21: Tasmā yāvatatiyaṃ apucchitvā atha kho bhagavā saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0201a:2432_2: Yakkhoti na yo vā so vā yakkho,
atk-s0201a:2432_10: bhayānakāni akkhināsādīnīti evaṃ virūparūpaṃ māpetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2432_14: pare ca me na ājāneyyu”nti evaṃ dhammadesanāya appossukkabhāvaṃ āpanne bhagavati sakko mahābrahmunā saddhiṃ āgantvā,
atk-s0201a:2432_19: Tasmā “ajja saccakaṃ tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmī”ti āgato.
atk-s0201a:2433_1: saccako ca nigaṇṭhaputtoti yadi hi taṃ aññepi passeyyuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2433_3: “samaṇo gotamo saccakaṃ attano vāde anotarantaṃ ñatvā yakkhaṃ āvāhetvā dassesi,
atk-s0201a:2433_5: Tasmā bhagavā ceva passati saccako ca.
atk-s0201a:2433_6: Tassa taṃ disvāva sakalasarīrato sedā mucciṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2433_8: So “aññepi nu kho passantī”ti olokento kassaci lomahaṃsamattampi na addasa. Tato –
atk-s0201a:2433_13: paṭhamaṃ yakkhaṃ adisvā samaṇena gotamena vādasaṅghāṭe khittova yakkhaṃ passasī’ti vadeyyu”nti cintetvā –
atk-s0201a:2433_14: “na dāni me idha aññaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:2434_1: Manasi karitvāti manamhi katvā paccavekkhitvā upadhāretvā.
atk-s0201a:2434_2: Evaṃ me vedanā hotūti kusalāva hotu,
atk-s0201a:2434_4: Evaṃ me saññā hotūti kusalāva hotu,
atk-s0201a:2434_8: Mā ahosīti ettha pana vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2434_10: Samanupassitunti “etaṃ mama esohamasmi eso me attā”ti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena passituṃ. No hidaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2434_13: Iti bhagavā yathā nāma cheko ahituṇḍiko sappadaṭṭhavisaṃ teneva sappena puna ḍaṃsāpetvā ubbāheyya,
atk-s0201a:2434_14: evaṃ tassaṃyeva parisati saccakaṃ nigaṇṭhaputtaṃ teneva mukhena pañcakkhandhā aniccā dukkhā anattāti vadāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2434_15: Dukkhaṃ allīnoti imaṃ pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi allīno.
atk-s0201a:2434_17: Dukkhaṃ etaṃ mamātiādīsu pañcakkhandhadukkhaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samanupassatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2434_18: Parijāneyyāti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tīraṇapariññāya parito jāneyya.
atk-s0201a:2435_2: Akukkukajātanti pupphaggahaṇakāle anto aṅguṭṭhappamāṇo eko ghanadaṇḍako nibbattati,
atk-s0201a:2435_7: Bhāsitā kho pana teti idaṃ bhagavā tassa mukharabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā niggaṇhanto āha.
atk-s0201a:2435_8: So kira pubbe pūraṇādayo cha satthāro upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2435_10: Atha nesaṃ parisamajjhe mahantaṃ vippakāraṃ āropetvā uṭṭhāya jayaṃ pavedento gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2435_11: So sammāsambuddhampi tatheva viheṭhessāmīti saññāya upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-s0201a:2436_0: “Ambho ko nāma yaṃ rukkho, sinnapatto sakaṇṭako;
atk-s0201a:2438_0: Ayaṃ khadiraṃ āhacca asārakarukkhaparicito mudutuṇḍasakuṇo viya sabbaññutaññāṇasāraṃ āhacca ñāṇatuṇḍabhedaṃ
atk-s0201a:2438_2: Tadassa parisamajjhe pakāsento bhāsitā kho pana tetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2438_3: Natthi etarahīti upādinnakasarīre sedo nāma natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2438_5: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kāyaṃ vivarīti na sabbaṃ kāyaṃ vivari.
atk-s0201a:2438_6: Buddhā nāma gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā paṭicchannasarīrā parisati dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-s0201a:2438_7: Atha bhagavā galavāṭakasammukhaṭṭhāne cīvaraṃ gahetvā caturaṅgulamattaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0201a:2438_8: Otāritamatte pana tasmiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo puñjapuñjā hutvā suvaṇṇaghaṭato rattasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya,
atk-s0201a:2438_9: rattavaṇṇavalāhakato vijjulatā viya ca nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇamurajasadisaṃ mahākhandhaṃ uttamasiraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kurumānā ākāse pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2438_12: Mahājano hi samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ sedo natthīti vadati,
atk-s0201a:2438_13: saccakassa tāva nigaṇṭhaputtassa yantāruḷhassa viya sedā paggharanti.
atk-s0201a:2438_14: Samaṇo pana gotamo ghanadupaṭṭacīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinno,
atk-s0201a:2438_15: anto sedassa atthitā vā natthitā vā kathaṃ sakkā ñātunti kaṅkhaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:2439_4: Abhabbo taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ puna otaritunti sabbesaṃ aḷānaṃ bhaggattā pacchinnagamano otarituṃ abhabbo,
atk-s0201a:2439_10: vādādhippāyo hutvā vādaṃ āropessāmīti ajjhāsayena upasaṅkamituṃ abhabbo;
atk-s0201a:2439_13: Dummukhassa kirassa upamāharaṇakāle sesa licchavikumārāpi cintesuṃ –
atk-s0201a:2439_14: “iminā nigaṇṭhena amhākaṃ sippuggahaṇaṭṭhāne ciraṃ avamāno kato,
atk-s0201a:2439_15: ayaṃ dāni amittassa piṭṭhiṃ passituṃ kālo.
atk-s0201a:2439_16: Mayampi ekekaṃ upamaṃ āharitvā pāṇippahārena patitaṃ muggarena pothento viya tathā naṃ karissāma,
atk-s0201a:2439_17: yathā na puna parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissatī”ti,
atk-s0201a:2439_18: te opammāni karitvā dummukhassa kathāpariyosānaṃ āgamayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2439_20: ime sabbeva gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā oṭṭhehi calamānehi ṭhitā;
atk-s0201a:2439_22: puna mayā parisamajjhe sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2439_23: handāhaṃ dummukhaṃ apasādetvā yathā aññassa okāso na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2439_24: evaṃ kathāvāraṃ pacchinditvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmīti tasmā etadavoca.
atk-s0201a:2440_4: esā amhākañceva aññesañca puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vācā tiṭṭhatu.
atk-s0201a:2440_5: Vilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ maññeti etañhi vacanaṃ vilapitaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0201a:2440_7: Atha vā tiṭṭhatesāti ettha kathāti āharitvā vattabbā.
atk-s0201a:2440_8: Vācāvilāpaṃ vilapitaṃ maññeti ettha panidaṃ vācānicchāraṇaṃ vilapitamattaṃ maññe hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2441_6: Yasmā panettha passatīti vuttattā sekkhabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0201a:2441_7: Tasmā uttari asekkhabhūmiṃ pucchanto dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0201a:2441_18: Buddho so bhagavāti so bhagavā sayampi cattāri saccāni buddho.
atk-s0201a:2442_5: Natveva bhavantaṃ gotamanti bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ āsajja kassaci attano vādaṃ anupahataṃ sakalaṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ thāmo natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2442_6: Na hi bhagavā hatthiādayo viya kassaci jīvitantarāyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2442_7: Ayaṃ pana nigaṇṭho imā tisso upamā na bhagavato ukkaṃsanatthaṃ āhari,
atk-s0201a:2442_9: Yathā hi rājā kañci paccatthikaṃ ghātetvā evaṃ nāma sūro evaṃ thāmasampanno puriso bhavissatīti paccatthikaṃ thomentopi attānameva thometi.
atk-s0201a:2442_12: hatthiṃ pabhinnantiādīhi bhagavantaṃ ukkaṃsentopi mayameva sūrā mayaṃ paṇḍitā mayaṃ bahussutāyeva evaṃ pabhinnahatthiṃ viya,
atk-s0201a:2442_14: phaṇakataāsīvisaṃ viya ca vādatthikā sammāsambuddhaṃ upasaṅkamimhāti attānaṃyeva ukkaṃseti.
atk-s0201a:2442_15: Evaṃ attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā bhagavantaṃ nimantayamāno adhivāsetu metiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2442_17: Svātanāyāti yaṃ me tumhesu kāraṃ karoto sve bhavissati puññañca pītipāmojjañca,
atk-s0201a:2442_19: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti bhagavā kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā acopetvā abbhantareyeva khantiṃ dhārento tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsesi.
atk-s0201a:2442_20: Saccakassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ manasāva sampaṭicchīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2443_1: Yamassa patirūpaṃ maññeyyāthāti te kira licchavī tassa pañcathālipākasatāni niccabhattaṃ āharanti.
atk-s0201a:2443_2: Tadeva sandhāya esa sve tumhe yaṃ assa samaṇassa gotamassa patirūpaṃ kappiyanti maññeyyātha,
atk-s0201a:2443_4: samaṇassa hi gotamassa tumhe paricārakā kappiyākappiyaṃ yuttāyuttaṃ jānāthāti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2443_17: onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇī.
atk-s0201a:2443_19: hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho.
atk-s0201a:2443_20: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti bhagavantaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ ñatvā ekasmiṃ okāse nisīdīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2443_24: Taṃ dāyakānaṃ sukhāya hotūti taṃ imesaṃ licchavīnaṃ sukhatthāya hotu.
atk-s0201a:2443_25: Idaṃ kira so ahaṃ pabbajito nāma,
atk-s0201a:2443_26: pabbajitena ca na yuttaṃ attano dānaṃ niyyātetunti tesaṃ niyyātento evamāha.
