atk-s0201a:2639_10: Satavatthukaṃ pañcasatavatthukaṃ sahassavatthukaṃ mahābaliṃ rājāva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2639_11: Tattha pañcakulikagāmo viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā;
atk-s0201a:2639_14: dubbalabhojakānaṃ parittakaṃ āyapāpuṇanaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ rūpadassanādimattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2639_16: Rañño mahābaliggahaṇaṃ viya tesu dvāresu javanassa rajjanādīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0201a:2640_4: Kiriyamayapavattasmiñhi vattamāne arūpadhammā pasādānaṃ balavapaccayā honti.
atk-s0201a:2640_5: Yo pana taṃ pavattaṃ nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno,
atk-s0201a:2640_6: tassa antonirodhe pañca pasādā kiṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhantīti idaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2640_8: Usmaṃ paṭiccāti jīvitindriyaṃ kammajatejaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2640_9: Yasmā pana kammajatejopi jīvitindriyena vinā na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2640_14: Ābhaṃ paṭicca accīti taṃ ālokaṃ paṭicca jālasikhā paññāyati.
atk-s0201a:2641_1: āyu usmaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatīti ettha jālasikhā viya kammajatejo.
atk-s0201a:2641_3: Jālasikhā hi uppajjamānā ālokaṃ gahetvāva uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:2641_4: Sā tena attanā janitaālokeneva sayampi aṇu thūlā dīghā rassāti pākaṭā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2641_5: Tattha jālapavattiyā janitaālokena tassāyeva jālapavattiyā pākaṭabhāvo viya usmaṃ paṭicca nibbattena
atk-s0201a:2641_9: Iti mahābhūtāni upādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayādivasena paccayāni hontīti āyu usmaṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2641_10: Jīvitindriyaṃ mahābhūtāni pāletīti usmā āyuṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatīti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2642_4: Yo hi bhikkhu arūpapavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā saññañca vedanañca nirodhetvā nirodhaṃ samāpanno,
atk-s0201a:2642_8: Yathā eko puriso jālāpavatte ukkhaṇṭhito udakena paharitvā jālaṃ appavattaṃ katvā chārikāya aṅgāre pidhāya tuṇhī nisīdati.
atk-s0201a:2642_9: Yadā panassa puna jālāya attho hoti,
atk-s0201a:2642_10: chārikaṃ apanetvā aṅgāre parivattetvā upādānaṃ datvā mukhavātaṃ vā tālavaṇṭavātaṃ vā dadāti.
atk-s0201a:2642_13: Purisassa jālāpavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā udakappahārena jālaṃ appavattaṃ katvā chārikāya aṅgāre pidhāya tuṇhībhūtassa
atk-s0201a:2642_14: nisajjā viya bhikkhuno arūpapavatte ukkaṇṭhitvā saññañca vedanañca nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpajjanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2642_16: Purisassa puna jālāya atthe sati chārikāpanayanādīni viya bhikkhuno yathāparicchinnakālāpagamanaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2642_17: Aggijālāya pavatti viya puna arūpadhammesu uppannesu rūpārūpapavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2643_2: cittanti ime tayo dhammā yadā imaṃ rūpakāyaṃ jahanti,
atk-s0201a:2643_3: athāyaṃ acetanaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ viya pathaviyaṃ chaḍḍito setīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2644_0: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
atk-s0201a:2646_6: Tattha keci “nirodhasamāpannassa cittasaṅkhārāva niruddhā”ti vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2646_10: tasmā nirodhaṃ samāpannena dhammampi kathentena sajjhāyampi karontena nisīditabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0201a:2646_12: tassāpi cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā”ti vacanato cittaṃ aniruddhaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a:2646_13: tasmā kālaṅkate mātāpitaro vā arahante vā jhāpayantena anantariyakammaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2646_14: Iti byañjane abhinivesaṃ akatvā ācariyānaṃ naye ṭhatvā attho upaparikkhitabbo.
atk-s0201a:2647_0: Indriyāni vippasannānīti kiriyamayapavattasmiñhi vattamāne bahiddhā ārammaṇesu pasāde ghaṭṭentesu indriyāni
atk-s0201a:2647_2: vātādīhi uṭṭhitena rajena catumahāpathe ṭhapitaādāso viya.
atk-s0201a:2647_3: Yathā pana thavikāyaṃ pakkhipitvā mañjūsādīsu ṭhapito ādāso antoyeva virocati,
atk-s0201a:2647_4: evaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno antonirodhe pañca pasādā ativirocanti.
atk-s0201a:2648_4: Vissajjane panassa sukhassa ca pahānāti cattāro apagamanapaccayā kathitā.
atk-s0201a:2648_8: nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ pana vipassanānissandāya phalasamāpattiyāti tameva pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2648_10: Animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabbanimittāpagatāya nibbānadhātuyā manasikāro.
atk-s0201a:2649_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne nirodhakathā kathetabbā hoti. Sā,
atk-s0201a:2649_1: “dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi
atk-s0201a:2649_2: vasībhāvatāpaññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge āgatā.
atk-s0201a:2650_2: Nirodhato hi vuṭṭhānakaphalasamāpattiyā ṭhiti nāma na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2650_3: ekaṃ dve cittavārameva pavattitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
atk-s0201a:2650_4: Ayañhi bhikkhu satta divase arūpapavattaṃ nirodhetvā nisinno nirodhavuṭṭhānakaphalasamāpattiyaṃ na ciraṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2650_6: Tasmā sā ṭhiti nāma hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2650_9: Vissajjane panassā pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti addhānaparicchedo vutto.
atk-s0201a:2650_11: Vissajjanepissā sabbanimittānañca manasikāroti rūpādinimittavasena bhavaṅgasahajātamanasikāro vutto.
atk-s0201a:2651_3: Heṭṭhā kathitadhammeyeva ekato samodhānetvā pucchāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2651_7: odātakampi sañjānātī”ti etasmiñhi ṭhāne appamāṇā cetovimutti kathitā.
atk-s0201a:2651_11: paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā vuṭṭhānāyā”ti ettha animittā.
atk-s0201a:2651_12: Evaṃ heṭṭhā kathitāva imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekato samodhānetvā pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2651_13: Taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā etā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne niddiṭṭhāvāti vatvā aññe cattāro dhammā ekanāmakā atthi.
atk-s0201a:2651_15: etaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā kathāpetuṃ idha pucchatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0201a:2651_17: appamāṇā cetovimuttīti ayaṃ pharaṇaappamāṇatāya appamāṇā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2652_2: Attena vāti atta bhāvaposapuggalādisaṅkhātena attena suññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2652_6: Nānatthā ceva nānābyañjanā cāti byañjanampi nesaṃ nānā atthopi.
atk-s0201a:2652_9: appamāṇā cetovimutti bhūmantarato mahaggatā eva hoti rūpāvacarā;
atk-s0201a:2653_1: pamāṇakaraṇotiādīsu yathā pabbatapāde pūtipaṇṇarasaudakaṃ nāma hoti kāḷavaṇṇaṃ;
atk-s0201a:2653_3: Yaṭṭhiṃ vā rajjuṃ vā gahetvā minantassa piṭṭhipādottharaṇamattampi na hoti.
atk-s0201a:2653_5: tāva puggalaṃ sañjānituṃ na sakkā honti,
atk-s0201a:2653_11: Iti ete “ettako aya”nti puggalassa pamāṇaṃ dassento viya uppajjantīti pamāṇakaraṇā nāma vuttā.
atk-s0201a:2653_25: tasmā aggamakkhāyatīti vuttā. Rāgo kho, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2653_26: kiñcanoti rāgo uppajjitvā puggalaṃ kiñcati maddati palibundhati.
atk-s0201a:2653_28: Manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpento kiñcehi kapila,
atk-s0201a:2653_32: Ākiñcaññā cetovimuttiyo nāma nava dhammā ākiñcaññāyatanañca maggaphalāni ca.
atk-s0201a:2653_33: Tattha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ kiñcanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assa natthīti ākiñcaññaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2653_34: Maggaphalāni kiñcanānaṃ maddanānaṃ palibundhanakilesānaṃ natthitāya ākiñcaññāni.
atk-s0201a:2654_1: nimittakaraṇotiādīsu yathā nāma dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ sadisā dve vacchakā honti.
atk-s0201a:2654_2: Yāva tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2654_4: ayaṃ asukakulassā”ti na sakkā honti jānituṃ.
atk-s0201a:2654_5: Yadā pana tesaṃ sattisūlādīsu aññataraṃ lakkhaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2654_8: tāva na sakkā hoti jānituṃ ariyo vā puthujjano vāti.
atk-s0201a:2654_9: Rāgo panassa uppajjamānova sarāgo nāma ayaṃ puggaloti sañjānananimittaṃ karonto viya uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2655_5: Tattha vipassanā niccanimittaṃ sukhanimittaṃ attanimittaṃ ugghāṭetīti animittā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2655_6: Cattāro āruppā rūpanimittassa abhāvena animittā nāma.
atk-s0201a:2655_11: Atha kasmā suññatā cetovimutti na gahitāti? Sā,
atk-s0201a:2655_15: Appamāṇaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ suññataṃ animittanti hi sabbānetāni nibbānasseva nāmāni.
atk-s0201a:2655_18: aññasmiṃ ākiñcaññā aññasmiṃ suññatā aññasmiṃ animittāti iminā pariyāyena nānābyañjanā.
atk-s0201a:2659_2: Tattha visākho upāsakoti visākhoti evaṃnāmako upāsako.
atk-s0201a:2659_3: Yena dhammadinnāti yena dhammadinnā nāma bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0201a:2659_8: So yadā bhagavā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā pavattavaradhammacakko yasādayo kulaputte vinetvā uruvelaṃ
atk-s0201a:2659_9: patvā tattha jaṭilasahassaṃ vinetvā purāṇajaṭilehi khīṇāsavabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ gantvā buddhadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0201a:2659_10: dvādasanahutāya parisāya saddhiṃ āgatassa bimbisāramahārājassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a:2659_11: Tadā raññā saddhiṃ āgatesu dvādasanahutesu ekaṃ nahutaṃ upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi,
atk-s0201a:2659_12: ekādasa nahutāni sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu saddhiṃ raññā bimbisārena.
atk-s0201a:2659_15: puna ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā,
atk-s0201a:2659_16: tato aparabhāgepi ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2659_17: So anāgāmī hutvā gehaṃ āgacchanto yathā aññesu divasesu ito cito ca olokento sitaṃ kurumāno āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:2659_18: evaṃ anāgantvā santindriyo santamānaso hutvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2660_0: Dhammadinnā sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā vīthiṃ olokayamānā tassa āgamanākāraṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2660_1: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti cintetvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ kurumānā sopānasīse ṭhatvā olambanatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0201a:2660_4: Upāsako pubbe tāya saddhiṃ ekato bhuñjati.
atk-s0201a:2660_5: Taṃ divasaṃ pana taṃ anapaloketvā yogāvacarabhikkhu viya ekakova bhuñji. Sā,
atk-s0201a:2660_8: aññaṃ gabbhaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā kappiyamañcakaṃ paññapāpetvā nipajji. Upāsikā,
atk-s0201a:2660_11: udāhu mayheva koci doso atthī”ti balavadomanassā hutvā,
atk-s0201a:2660_12: “ekaṃ dve divase vasitakāle sakkā ñātu”nti tassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2661_4: kiṃ nu te bahiddhā patthanā atthīti?
atk-s0201a:2661_8: Evaṃ sante mayheva koci doso bhavissatīti.
atk-s0201a:2661_10: Atha kasmā mayā saddhiṃ yathā pakatiyā ālāpasallāpamattampi na karothāti?
atk-s0201a:2661_12: “ayaṃ lokuttaradhammo nāma garu bhāriyo na pakāsetatabbo,
atk-s0201a:2661_14: ayaṃ hadayaṃ phāletvā ettheva kālaṃ kareyyā”ti tassānuggahatthāya kathesi –
atk-s0201a:2661_15: “dhammadinne ahaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nāma adhigato,
atk-s0201a:2661_16: taṃ adhigatassa evarūpā lokiyakiriyā na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0201a:2661_18: tava cattālīsa koṭiyo mama cattālīsa koṭiyoti asītikoṭidhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0201a:2661_19: ettha issarā hutvā mama mātiṭṭhāne vā bhaginiṭṭhāne vā ṭhatvā vasa.
atk-s0201a:2661_24: ahaṃ taṃ bhaginiṭṭhāne vā dhituṭṭhāne vā ṭhapetvā posessāmī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2662_3: So pana dhammo kiṃ puriseheva paṭibujjhitabbo,
atk-s0201a:2662_4: udāhu mātugāmopi paṭivijjhituṃ sakkotī”ti visākhaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0201a:2662_5: “kiṃ nu kho eso dhammo puriseheva labhitabbo,
atk-s0201a:2662_15: manaṃ pana te ajānamāno na kathemīti tāvadeva bimbisārassa rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2663_10: Visākho dhammadinnaṃ gandhodakena nahāpetvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkārāpetvā sovaṇṇasivikāya nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0201a:2663_11: ñātigaṇena parivārāpetvā gandhapupphādīhi pūjayamāno nagaravāsanaṃ karonto viya bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2663_13: Bhikkhuniyo “ekaṃ vā dve vā dose sahituṃ vaṭṭati gahapatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2663_16: Athekā byattā therī tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā kese ohāretvā pabbājesi. Visākho,
atk-s0201a:2664_1: Teneva palibuddhā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0201a:2664_3: upajjhāyatheriyo gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhā,
atk-s0201a:2665_0: Ito paṭṭhāya hi satasahassakappamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0201a:2665_1: Tadā esā ekasmiṃ kule dāsī hutvā attano kese vikkiṇitvā sujātattherassa nāma aggasāvakassa dānaṃ datvā patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0201a:2665_9: rājagahaṃ gacchāmī”ti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ gahetvā rājagahameva agamāsi. Visākho,
atk-s0201a:2665_16: “atha kho visākho upāsako yena dhammadinnā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2666_4: ayye”ti evaṃ pucchanaṃ nāma na paṇḍitakiccaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2666_6: pañhabyākaraṇena tassā abhiratiṃ vā anabhiratiṃ vā jānissāmīti,
atk-s0201a:2666_10: acirapabbajitā sakāyaṃ vā parakāyaṃ vā kuto jānissāmīti vā,
atk-s0201a:2666_11: aññattheriyo upasaṅkamitvā pucchāti vā avatvā upanikkhittaṃ sampaṭicchamānā viya,
atk-s0201a:2666_12: ekapāsakagaṇṭhiṃ mocentī viya gahanaṭṭhāne hatthimaggaṃ nīharamānā viya khaggamukhena samuggaṃ vivaramānā
atk-s0201a:2666_13: viya ca paṭisambhidāvisaye ṭhatvā pañhaṃ vissajjamānā,
atk-s0201a:2666_18: Upādānakkhandhāti upādānānaṃ paccayabhūtā khandhāti evamādinā nayenettha upādānakkhandhakathā vitthāretvā kathetabbā.
atk-s0201a:2666_19: Sā panesā visuddhimagge vitthāritā evāti tattha vittāritanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0201a:2667_0: Idaṃ pana catusaccabyākaraṇaṃ sutvā visākho theriyā abhiratabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0201a:2667_1: Yo hi buddhasāsane ukkaṇṭhito hoti anabhirato,
atk-s0201a:2667_2: so evaṃ pucchitapucchitapañhaṃ saṇḍāsena ekekaṃ palitaṃ gaṇhanto viya,
atk-s0201a:2667_3: sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viya vissajjetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2667_4: Yasmā pana imāni cattāri saccāni loke candimasūriyā viya buddhasāsane pākaṭāni,
atk-s0201a:2667_5: parisamajjhe gato hi bhagavāpi mahātherāpi saccāneva pakāsenti;
atk-s0201a:2667_6: bhikkhusaṅghopi pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya kulaputte cattāri nāma kiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2667_8: Ayañca dhammadinnā upāyakosalle ṭhitā paṇḍitā byattā nayaṃ gahetvā sutenapi kathetuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0201a:2667_9: tasmā “na sakkā etissā ettāvatā saccānaṃ paṭividdhabhāvo ñātuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2667_10: saccavinibbhogapañhabyākaraṇena sakkā ñātu”nti cintetvā heṭṭhā kathitāni dve saccāni paṭinivattetvā guḷhaṃ
atk-s0201a:2667_11: katvā gaṇṭhipañhaṃ pucchissāmīti pucchanto taññeva nu kho,
atk-s0201a:2668_2: taññeva upādānanti upādānassa saṅkhārakkhandhekadesabhāvato na taṃyeva upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0201a:2668_7: parasamaye cittavippayutto anusayo viya paṇṇatti viya nibbānaṃ viya ca khandhavinimuttaṃ vā siyā,
atk-s0201a:2668_10: Tassā byākaraṇaṃ sutvā “adhigatapatiṭṭhā aya”nti visākho niṭṭhamagamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2668_11: Na hi sakkā akhīṇāsavena asambaddhena avitthāyantena padīpasahassaṃ jālentena viya evarūpo guḷho paṭicchanno
atk-s0201a:2668_14: “ayaṃ dhammadinnā sāsane laddhapatiṭṭhā adhigatapaṭisambhidā vesārajjappattā bhavamatthake ṭhitā mahākhīṇāsavā,
atk-s0201a:2668_16: idāni pana naṃ ovattikasāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2669_5: yo ahaṃ taṃ rūpanti rūpañca attañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2669_6: Seyyathāpi nāma telappadīpassa jhāyato yā acci so vaṇṇo,
atk-s0201a:2669_7: yo vaṇṇo sā accīti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2669_9: advayaṃ samanupassatī”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ attāti diṭṭhipassanāya passati.
atk-s0201a:2669_10: Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti arūpaṃ attāti gahetvā chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya taṃ attānaṃ rūpavantaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2669_11: Attani vā rūpanti arūpameva attāti gahetvā pupphasmiṃ gandhaṃ viya attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2669_12: Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti arūpameva attāti gahetvā karaṇḍāya maṇiṃ viya attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2670_1: rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti suddharūpameva attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2670_6: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu arūpaṃ attāti kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2670_9: vedanāya vā attānanti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu rūpārūpamissako attā kathito.
atk-s0201a:2670_10: Tattha rūpaṃ attato samanupassati… vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0201a:2670_11: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā,
atk-s0201a:2670_15: Na rūpaṃ attatoti ettha rūpaṃ attāti na samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2670_18: na viññāṇasmiṃ attānanti ime pañcakkhandhe kenaci pariyāyena attato na samanupassati,
atk-s0201a:2670_19: sabbākārena pana aniccā dukkhā anattāti samanupassati.
atk-s0201a:2671_3: sakkāyadiṭṭhi hotī”ti evaṃ purimapañhaṃ vissajjentiyā ettakena gamanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2671_6: vaṭṭaṃ vattatīti vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassitaṃ. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0201a:2671_8: sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti pacchimaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjentiyā ettakena gamanaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2671_11: vaṭṭaṃ nāma na vattatīti vivaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2672_2: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ayaṃ pañho theriyā paṭipucchitvā vissajjetabbo bhaveyya – “upāsaka,
atk-s0201a:2672_5: Sā pana attano byattatāya paṇḍiccena tassa adhippāyaṃ sallakkhesi –
atk-s0201a:2672_6: “iminā upāsakena heṭṭhā paṭipattivasena maggo pucchito bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2672_10: Tattha saṅkhatoti cetito kappito pakappito āyūhito kato nibbattito samāpajjantena samāpajjitabbo.
atk-s0201a:2672_13: khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahitoti ettha yasmā maggo sappadeso,
atk-s0201a:2672_15: tasmā ayaṃ sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito.
atk-s0201a:2672_18: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ sīlakkhandheti bhummena viya niddeso kato,
atk-s0201a:2672_20: Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2672_21: Vīriye pana paggahakiccaṃ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhūpakāro hutvā sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2673_1: yathā hi “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu eko supupphitaṃ campakarukkhaṃ disvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0201a:2673_3: so tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0201a:2673_5: so ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷeyya.
atk-s0201a:2673_7: Ekato uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyakā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā.
atk-s0201a:2673_9: Hatthaṃ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṃ asakkonto viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ asakkonto samādhi.
atk-s0201a:2673_12: Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā ekassa aṃsakūṭaṃ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2673_14: satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṃ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2674_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2674_1: vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0201a:2674_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhudaleneva parivattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2674_3: aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2674_4: Evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṃ nicchetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2674_5: abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyā dinnameva vinicchetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2674_6: Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā.
atk-s0201a:2674_8: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2675_0: Idāni ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ maggasamādhiṃ sanimittaṃ saparikkhāraṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2675_2: Tassa vissajjane cattāro satipaṭṭhānā maggakkhaṇe catukiccasādhanavasena uppannā sati,
atk-s0201a:2676_2: ‘evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī’ti hi vacanato sattapi vassāni maggabhāvanā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2676_3: kilesā pana lahu chijjantā sattahi ñāṇehi chijjantī”ti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2676_6: “yā tesaṃyeva dhammānaṃ āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkamma”nti idameva suttaṃ āharitvā,
atk-s0201a:2676_16: evaṃ sante ekaṃ cittaṃ āsevamānaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2676_18: aparampi āsevamānanti evaṃ divasampi āsevanāva bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2676_21: Ekaṃ vā bhāvayamānaṃ uppannaṃ aparampi bhāvayamānaṃ aparampi bhāvayamānanti evaṃ divasampi bhāvanāva bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2676_25: aparampi bahulīkarontanti evaṃ divasampi bahulīkammameva bhavissati kuto āsevanā,
atk-s0201a:2677_11: “mā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā avaca.
atk-s0201a:2677_12: Pañhaṃ vissajjentena nāma ācariyassa santike vasitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā attharasaṃ viditvā vattabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2677_21: gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2678_1: Kati panāyye saṅkhārāti idha kiṃ pucchati?
atk-s0201a:2678_8: Tattha kāyapaṭibaddhattā kāyena saṅkharīyati karīyati nibbattīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a:2678_10: Cittapaṭibaddhattā cittena saṅkharīyati karīyati nibbattīyatīti cittasaṅkhāro.
atk-s0201a:2678_12: Ime saṅkhārā aññamaññamissā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā. Tathā hi,
atk-s0201a:2678_13: kāyadvāre ādānagahaṇamuñcanacopanāni pāpetvā uppannā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā dvādasa akusalacetanāti
atk-s0201a:2678_14: evaṃ kusalākusalā vīsati cetanāpi assāsapassāsāpi kāyasaṅkhārātveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2678_15: Vacīdvāre hanusaṃcopanaṃ vacībhedaṃ pāpetvā uppannā vuttappakārāva vīsati cetanāpi vitakkavicārāpi vacīsaṅkhārotveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2678_16: Kāyavacīdvāresu copanaṃ apattā raho nisinnassa cintayato uppannā kusalākusalā ekūnatiṃsa cetanāpi saññā
atk-s0201a:2678_17: ca vedanā cāti ime dve dhammāpi cittasaṅkhārotveva vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2678_18: Evaṃ ime saṅkhārā aññamaññamissā āluḷitā avibhūtā duddīpanā.
atk-s0201a:2678_19: Te pākaṭe vibhūte katvā kathāpessāmīti pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2679_0: Kasmā panāyyeti idha kāyasaṅkhārādināmassa padatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0201a:2680_1: Idāni kiṃ nu kho esā saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ valañjeti,
atk-s0201a:2680_3: Ciṇṇavasī vā tattha no ciṇṇavasīti jānanatthaṃ pucchanto,
atk-s0201a:2680_6: Tassa vissajjane samāpajjissanti vā samāpajjāmīti vā padadvayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattikālo kathito.
atk-s0201a:2680_8: Tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi sacittakakālo kathito,
atk-s0201a:2680_10: Pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva,
atk-s0201a:2680_11: ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2680_12: Yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetīti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2681_0: Paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāroti sesasaṅkhārehi paṭhamaṃ dutiyajjhāneyeva nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a:2681_1: Tato kāyasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a:2681_2: Tato cittasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ cittasaṅkhāro antonirodhe nirujjhati.
atk-s0201a:2681_3: Vuṭṭhahissanti vā vuṭṭhahāmīti vā padadvayena antonirodhakālo kathito.
atk-s0201a:2681_5: Tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi acittakakālo kathito,
atk-s0201a:2681_7: Pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotīti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0201a:2681_8: acittako hutvā tato paraṃ sacittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2681_9: Yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetīti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2682_0: Idāni nirodhakathaṃ kathetuṃ vāroti nirodhakathā kathetabbā siyā,
atk-s0201a:2682_2: “dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi
atk-s0201a:2682_3: vasībhāvatāpaññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbākārena visuddhimagge kathitā.
atk-s0201a:2682_8: Saṅkhārānaṃ pavatte ukkaṇṭhitā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā sukhaṃ viharissāma,
atk-s0201a:2683_0: Paṭhamaṃ uppajjati cittasaṅkhāroti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa hi phalasamāpatticittaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:2683_3: Tato kāyasaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasamaye kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:2683_4: Kiṃ pana phalasamāpatti assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti?
atk-s0201a:2683_8: Kiṃ vā etena phalasamāpatti paṭhamajjhānikā vā hotu,
atk-s0201a:2683_10: santāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā honti.
atk-s0201a:2683_12: Sañjīvattherassa hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya kiṃsukapupphasadise vītaccitaṅgāre maddamānassa gacchato cīvare aṃsumattampi na jhāyi,
atk-s0201a:2683_15: Evamevaṃ santāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā hontīti bhavaṅgasamayenevetaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2684_0: Tato vacīsaṅkhāroti tato paraṃ kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakāle vacīsaṅkhāro uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:2684_3: Taṃsamuṭṭhānā pana vitakkavicārā vācaṃ abhisaṅkhātuṃ na sakkontīti kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakālenevataṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2684_6: tāya sahajātaṃ phassaṃ sandhāya suññato phassoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2684_8: Ārammaṇena pana nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi suññattā suññaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a:2684_11: Suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaphalasamāpattiyaṃ phasso suññato nāma.
atk-s0201a:2685_0: Aparā āgamaniyakathā nāma hoti, suññatā, animittā,
atk-s0201a:2685_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu saṅkhāre aniccato pariggahetvā aniccato disvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2685_4: Yo dukkhato pariggahetvā dukkhato disvā dukkhato vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2685_6: Yo anattato pariggahetvā anattato disvā anattato vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0201a:2685_10: Animittaphalasamāpattisahajāte phasse phusante animitto phasso phusatīti vuccati.
atk-s0201a:2685_12: Āgamaniyena kathite pana suññato vā phasso animitto vā phasso appaṇihito vā phassoti vikappo āpajjeyya,
atk-s0201a:2685_13: tasmā saguṇena ceva ārammaṇena ca kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2686_3: tena vaṅkaṃ viya hutvā ṭhitanti vivekapoṇaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2687_1: Idāni yā vedanā nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a:2687_4: Kāyikaṃ vātiādīsu pañcadvārikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a:2687_11: Ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhātiādīsu sukhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo sukhaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2688_0: Kiṃ anusayo anusetīti katamo anusayo anuseti.
atk-s0201a:2688_1: Appahīnaṭṭhena sayito viya hotīti anusayapucchaṃ pucchati. Na kho,
atk-s0201a:2688_3: sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetīti na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti.
atk-s0201a:2688_4: Na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya so appahīno,
atk-s0201a:2688_5: na sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2689_0: Rāgaṃ tena pajahatīti ettha ekeneva byākaraṇena dve pucchā vissajjesi.
atk-s0201a:2689_1: Idha bhikkhu rāgānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a:2689_2: jhānavikkhambhitaṃ rāgānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmimaggena samugghāteti.
atk-s0201a:2689_3: So anāgāmimaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva paṭhamajjhāne nānuseti nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2689_7: Iti anuttaresūti evaṃ anuttarā vimokkhāti laddhanāme arahatte.
atk-s0201a:2689_9: Uppajjati pihāpaccayā domanassanti patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0201a:2689_10: Taṃ panetaṃ na patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0201a:2689_13: Tattha kiñcāpi domanassaṃ nāma ekantena akusalaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2689_14: idaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ domanassaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2689_15: Yogino hi temāsikaṃ chamāsikaṃ vā navamāsikaṃ vā paṭipadaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:2689_16: Tesu yo taṃ taṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā antokālaparicchedeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti ghaṭento vāyamanto na sakkoti yathāparicchinnakālena pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2689_19: Thero kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi. Tassa,
atk-s0201a:2689_21: imasmiṃ vāre visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāressāmī”ti mānasaṃ bandhitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontasseva ekūnavīsativassāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0201a:2689_22: Pavāraṇādivase āgate therassa assupātena muttadivaso nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0201a:2690_0: Paṭighaṃ tena pajahatīti ettha domanasseneva paṭighaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0201a:2690_3: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu temāsikādīsu aññataraṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0201a:2690_8: nanu te sīlaṃ suparisuddhaṃ vīriyaṃ supaggahitaṃ paññā sūrā hutvā vahatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2690_10: “na dāni puna imassa domanassassa uppajjituṃ dassāmī”ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā antotemāse vā antochamāse
atk-s0201a:2690_11: vā antonavamāse vā anāgāmimaggena taṃ samugghāteti.
atk-s0201a:2691_0: Na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetīti tattha evarūpe domanasse paṭighānusayo nānuseti.
atk-s0201a:2691_3: Avijjaṃ tena pajahatīti idha bhikkhu avijjānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0201a:2691_4: jhānavikkhambhitaṃ avijjānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattamaggena samugghāteti.
atk-s0201a:2691_5: So arahattamaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva catutthajjhāne nānuseti nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2692_7: Yattakesu pana ṭhānesu avijjā tamaṃ karoti,
atk-s0201a:2692_8: tattakesu vijjā tamaṃ vinodetīti visabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito.
atk-s0201a:2692_10: āvusoti ettha ubhopete dhammā anāsavā lokuttarāti sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito.
atk-s0201a:2692_12: āvusoti ettha anāsavaṭṭhena lokuttaraṭṭhena abyākataṭṭhena ca sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito.
atk-s0201a:2692_13: Accayāsīti ettha pañhaṃ atikkamitvā gatosīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2692_14: Nāsakkhi pañhānaṃ pariyantaṃ gahetunti pañhānaṃ paricchedapamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0201a:2692_17: na sakkā nīlaṃ vā pītakaṃ vāti kenaci dhammena saddhiṃ paṭibhāgaṃ katvā dassetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2692_18: Tañca tvaṃ iminā adhippāyena pucchasīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2693_0: Ettāvatā cāyaṃ upāsako yathā nāma sattame ghare salākabhattaṃ labhitvā gato bhikkhu satta gharāni atikkamma
atk-s0201a:2693_1: aṭṭhamassa dvāre ṭhito sabbānipi satta gehāni viraddhova na aññāsi,
atk-s0201a:2693_2: evamevaṃ appaṭibhāgadhammassa paṭibhāgaṃ pucchanto sabbāsupi sattasu sappaṭibhāgapucchāsu viraddhova hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2693_4: Nibbānaparāyananti nibbānaṃ paraṃ ayanamassa parā gati,
atk-s0201a:2694_3: Mahāpaññāti mahante atthe mahante dhamme mahantā niruttiyo mahantāni paṭibhānāni pariggaṇhanasamatthāya paññāya samannāgatā.
atk-s0201a:2694_4: Yathā taṃ dhammadinnāyāti yathā dhammadinnāya bhikkhuniyā byākataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2694_6: Ettāvatā ca pana ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto,
atk-s0201a:2694_8: Yathā hi rājayuttehi likhitaṃ paṇṇaṃ yāva rājamuddikāya na lañchitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2694_10: lañchitamattaṃ pana rājapaṇṇaṃ nāma hoti, tathā,
atk-s0201a:2694_11: “ahampi taṃ evameva byākareyya”nti imāya jinavacanamuddikāya lañchitattā ayaṃ suttanto āhaccavacanena jinabhāsito nāma jāto.
atk-s0201a:2698_4: āyūhanakkhaṇe sukhaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena sakkā pūretuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2699_1: Natthi kāmesu dosoti vatthukāmesupi kilesakāmesupi doso natthi.
atk-s0201a:2699_2: Pātabyataṃ āpajjantīti te vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena pātabyataṃ pivitabbataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2699_13: Rukkhamūle patitamāluvābījato hi latā uppajjitvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhati.
atk-s0201a:2699_14: Sā mahāpattā ceva hoti bahupattā ca,
atk-s0201a:2699_16: Atha taṃ rukkhaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya vinandhamānā sabbaviṭapāni sañchādetvā mahantaṃ bhāraṃ janetvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0201a:2699_17: Sā vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante oghanaṃ janetvā tassa rukkhassa sabbasākhāpasākhaṃ bhañjati,
atk-s0201a:2699_19: Tato tasmiṃ rukkhe patiṭṭhitavimānaṃ bhijjati nassati.
atk-s0201a:2700_0: Ārāmadevatāti tattha tattha pupphārāmaphalārāmesu adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a:2700_2: Rukkhadevatāti abhilakkhitesu naḷerupucimandādīsu rukkhesu adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a:2700_3: Osadhitiṇavanappatīsūti harītakīāmalakīādīsu osadhīsu tālanāḷikerādīsu tiṇesu vanajeṭṭhakesu ca vanappatirukkhesu adhivatthā devatā.
atk-s0201a:2700_4: Vanakammikāti vane kasanalāyanadāruāharaṇagorakkhādīsu kenacideva kammena vā vicarakamanussā.
atk-s0201a:2700_6: Vilambinīti vātena pahatapahataṭṭhānesu keḷiṃ karontī viya vilambantī.
atk-s0201a:2700_7: Sukho imissāti evarūpāya māluvālatāya samphassopi sukho,
atk-s0201a:2700_11: dutiyaṃ me vimānaṃ paṭiladdhanti latāya dassanepi samphassepi somanassajātā evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2701_0: Viṭabhiṃ kareyyāti sākhānaṃ upari chattākārena tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0201a:2701_2: Upari āruyha sakalaṃ rukkhaṃ paliveṭhetvā puna heṭṭhā bhassamānā bhūmiṃ gaṇheyyāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2701_3: Padāleyyāti evaṃ oghanaṃ katvā puna tato paṭṭhāya yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhi abhiruhamānā sabbasākhā paliveṭhentī
atk-s0201a:2701_4: matthakaṃ patvā teneva niyāmena puna orohitvā ca abhiruhitvā ca sakalarukkhaṃ saṃsibbitvā ajjhottharantī
atk-s0201a:2701_5: sabbasākhā heṭṭhā katvā sayaṃ upari ṭhatvā vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante padāleyya.
atk-s0201a:2701_9: taṃ sākhāsu bhijjamānāsu tattha tattheva bhijjitvā sabbasākhāsu bhinnāsu sabbaṃ bhijjati.
atk-s0201a:2701_10: Rukkhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ pana yāva rukkhassa mūlamattampi tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2701_14: Devatā puttake gahetvā khāṇuke ṭhitā paridevituṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0201a:2702_2: Rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti tibbarāgajātikattā diṭṭhe diṭṭhe ārammaṇe nimittaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2702_4: So abhikkhaṇaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ karonto dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-s0201a:2702_9: Mohajātiko pana idha kataṃ vā katato akataṃ vā akatato na sallakkheti,
atk-s0201a:2703_5: Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobho balavā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2703_9: tassa mando alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0201a:2703_10: adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-s0201a:2703_11: Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti,
atk-s0201a:2704_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a:2704_4: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca,
atk-s0201a:2704_5: paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo dattābhayatthero viya.
atk-s0201a:2705_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a:2705_2: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca,
atk-s0201a:2706_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a:2706_2: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
atk-s0201a:2707_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a:2708_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a:2708_2: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti sukhasīlako ca,
atk-s0201a:2709_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a:2709_2: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca,
atk-s0201a:2710_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādayo balavanto honti,
atk-s0201a:2710_2: so mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hoti.
atk-s0201a:2715_5: Tatrāti tasmiṃ aniṭṭhavaḍḍhane ceva iṭṭhaparihāne ca.
atk-s0201a:2715_9: tasmiṃ parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0201a:2715_10: bhagavatā pana no ime dhammā uppāditā.
atk-s0201a:2715_11: Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti.
atk-s0201a:2715_12: Bhagavaṃnettikāti bhagavā hi dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetāti.
atk-s0201a:2715_13: Yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā dassitā dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti.
atk-s0201a:2715_14: Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakā dhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0201a:2715_16: Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena phasso āgacchati,
atk-s0201a:2715_18: Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-s0201a:2715_21: Tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0201a:2715_23: Bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātūti bhagavatoyeva etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu,
atk-s0201a:2716_3: Yathā taṃ aviddasunoti yathā aviduno bālassa andhaputhujjanassa.
atk-s0201a:2716_4: Yathā taṃ viddasunoti yathā viduno medhāvino paṇḍitassa.
atk-s0201a:2717_3: idha pana yathādhammaraseneva satthā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2720_1: Sahāpi dukkhenāti ettha micchācāro abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya ca aparacetanāya
atk-s0201a:2720_2: cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a:2720_3: Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana sukhasampayuttā vā upekkhāsampayuttā vā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2720_4: Sesā pāṇātipātādayo satta tissannampi cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a:2720_8: Pariyeṭṭhiṃ vā āpajjantassa pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu kāyikaṃ dukkhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2721_1: Sahāpi sukhenāti ettha pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādoti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya ca aparacetanāya cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā honti.
atk-s0201a:2721_3: Sesā satta tissannampi cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā hontiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2721_4: Sahāpi somanassenāti somanassameva cettha sukhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2721_5: Iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbasamaṅgino vā pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu kāyikaṃ sukhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0201a:2722_4: Tassa garuṭṭhāniyo bhikkhu akāmakasseva pāṇātipāte ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2722_5: pāṇātipātaviratiyā ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā sikkhāpadaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2722_6: So gaṇhantopi dukkhito domanassitova hutvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2722_7: Aparabhāge katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā rakkhituṃ asakkontopi dukkhitova hoti,
atk-s0201a:2722_9: Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana sukhasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vāti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2723_1: Catutthadhammasamādāne dasasupi padesu tissopi pubbabhāgāparabhāgasanniṭṭhāpakacetanā sukhasampayuttā hontiyeva,
atk-s0201a:2724_2: Visena saṃsaṭṭhoti halāhalavisena sampayutto missito luḷito.
atk-s0201a:2724_3: Nacchādessatīti na ruccissati na tuṭṭhiṃ karissati.
atk-s0201a:2725_4: Chādessatīti tañhi halāhalavisaṃ yattha yattha pakkhittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2726_4: Evaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ gahitaṃ taruṇampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva.
atk-s0201a:2726_6: Sukhī assāti arogo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhī bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2727_1: Dadhi ca madhu cāti suparisuddhaṃ dadhi ca sumadhuraṃ madhu ca.
atk-s0201a:2727_2: Ekajjhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti ekato katvā missitaṃ āluḷitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2727_3: Tassa tanti tassa taṃ catumadhurabhesajjaṃ pivato rucceyya.
atk-s0201a:2728_8: Bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate cāti saradakāle majjhanhikasamaye ādiccova obhāsaṃ muñcati tapati vijjotatīti.
atk-s0201a:2729_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ devatānaṃ ativiya piyaṃ manāpaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2729_2: dakkhiṇadisāyaṃ kira hatthibhogajanapade saṅgaravihāro nāma atthi.
atk-s0201a:2729_3: Tassa bhojanasāladvāre saṅgararukkhe adhivatthā devatā rattibhāge ekassa daharassa sarabhaññavasena idaṃ suttaṃ osārentassa sutvā sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2729_4: Daharo kiṃ esoti āha. Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2729_12: Satthārā jetavane nisīditvā kathitadivase ca ajja ca ekabyañjanepi nānaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0201a:2729_13: Assosi tvaṃ devate satthārā kathitadivaseti? Āma, bhante.
atk-s0201a:2729_16: mahesakkhāsu pana devatāsu āgacchantīsu tattha okāsaṃ alabhitvā idheva ṭhatvā assosinti.
atk-s0201a:2729_17: Ettha ṭhitāya sakkā sutthu saddo sotunti?
atk-s0201a:2729_21: Dakkhiṇakaṇṇapasse nisīditvā kathanakālo viya, bhante, hotīti.
atk-s0201a:2729_22: Kiṃ pana devate satthu rūpaṃ passasīti?
atk-s0201a:2729_23: Satthā mameva oloketīti maññamānā saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkomi, bhanteti.
atk-s0201a:2729_26: Taṃ divasaṃ kiresa devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0201a:2733_12: paṇḍito bhikkhu vīmaṃsakoti alaṃ vacanāyā”ti ettha saṅkhāravīmaṃsako āgato.
atk-s0201a:2734_1: Dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabboti idha kalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2734_4: ekasmiṃ hi samaye āyasmā ānando upaḍḍhaṃ attano ānubhāvena hoti,
atk-s0201a:2734_5: upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittānubhāvenāti cintetvā attano dhammatāya nicchetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi, –
atk-s0201a:2734_24: sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ evaṃ kho, ānanda,
atk-s0201a:2734_29: Yathā sakalamevidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā. Mamañhi, ānanda,
atk-s0201a:2734_30: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2735_12: mayamettha kalyāṇamittā bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2739_0: Etesu taṇhaṃ mākāsi, mā lokaṃ punarāgamī”ti. –
atk-s0201a:2740_2: Idhāpi taṃ dassento bhagavā dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabboti desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2740_3: Paṇḍito bhikkhu dvīsu dhammesu tathāgataṃ esatu gavesatūti attho.
atk-s0201a:2740_8: imaṃ nissāyāhaṃ cīvarādayo paccaye labhissāmīti vā,
atk-s0201a:2740_9: evaṃ cintetvā maṃ nissāya vasanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0201a:2740_11: “pahoti me esa satthā hutvā satthukiccaṃ sādhetu”nti,
atk-s0201a:2741_0: Idāni te dve dhamme dassento cakkhusotaviññeyyesūti āha.
atk-s0201a:2741_1: Tattha satthu kāyiko samācāro vīmaṃsakassa cakkhuviññeyyo dhammo nāma.
atk-s0201a:2741_3: Idāni tesu samannesitabbākāraṃ dassento ye saṃkiliṭṭhātiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2741_6: Yathā pana udake calante vā pupphuḷake vā muñcante anto maccho atthīti viññāyati,
atk-s0201a:2741_8: musāvādādīni vā bhaṇantassa kāyavacīsamācāre disvā ca sutvā ca taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhanti viññāyati.
atk-s0201a:2741_11: Na te tathāgatassa saṃvijjantīti na te tathāgatassa atthi.
atk-s0201a:2741_13: Natthitāyeva hi te na upalabbhanti na paṭicchannatāya.
atk-s0201a:2741_14: Tathā hi bhagavā ekadivasaṃ imesu dhammesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavārento āha –
atk-s0201a:2741_18: na ca me kiñci garahatha kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2741_19: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0201a:2741_21: bhagavato kiñci garahāma kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā.
atk-s0201a:2741_30: Uttaropi sudaṃ māṇavo tathāgatassa kāyavacīdvāre anārādhanīyaṃ kiñci passissāmīti satta māse anubandhitvā likkhāmattampi na addasa.
atk-s0201a:2741_31: Manussabhūto vā esa buddhabhūtassa kāyavacīdvāre kiṃ anārādhanīyaṃ passissati?
atk-s0201a:2741_32: Māropi devaputto bodhisattassa sato mahābhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya chabbassāni gavesamāno kiñci anārādhanīyaṃ nāddasa,
atk-s0201a:2741_37: So chabbassāni adisvā buddhabhūtampi ekaṃ vassaṃ anubandhitvā kiñci vajjaṃ apassanto gamanasamaye vanditvā –
atk-s0201a:2746_0: Imaṃ kusalaṃ dhammanti imaṃ anavajjaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2746_1: “Ayamāyasmā satthā kiṃ nu kho dīgharattaṃ samāpanno aticirakālato paṭṭhāya iminā samannāgato,
atk-s0201a:2746_2: udāhu ittarasamāpanno hiyyo vā pare vā parasuve vā divase samāpanno”ti evaṃ gavesatūti attho.
atk-s0201a:2746_3: Ekaccena hi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantena bahu micchājīvakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0201a:2746_6: So aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ vā samuddatīraṃ vā gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā āraññako viya hutvā viharati.
atk-s0201a:2746_7: Manussā sambhāvanaṃ uppādetvā tassa paṇīte paccaye denti.
atk-s0201a:2746_11: “asukaṭṭhāne asukaṃ nāma micchājīvaṃ katvā pakkantabhikkhū”ti ñatvā na sakkā iminā saddhiṃ uposatho vā
atk-s0201a:2746_12: pavāraṇā vā kātunti sannipatitvā dhammena samena ukkhepanīyādīsu aññataraṃ kammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0201a:2746_13: Evarūpāya paṭicchannapaṭipattiyā atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā vīmaṃsāpetuṃ evamāha.
atk-s0201a:2747_3: Yaṃ tathāgatassa etarahi sabbaññutaṃ pattassa dīgharattaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2748_0: Atīte kira gandhārarājā ca vedeharājā ca dvepi sahāyakā hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā rajjāni puttānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2748_1: niyyātetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ araññagāmake piṇḍāya caranti.
atk-s0201a:2748_3: Tato aloṇaṃ yāguṃ labhitvā ekissāya sālāya nisīditvā pivanti.
atk-s0201a:2748_5: Ekadivasaṃ eko vedehisissa paṇṇe pakkhipitvā loṇacuṇṇaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2748_7: santike ṭhapetvā upaḍḍhaṃ attano santike ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2748_9: “mā idaṃ nassī”ti paṇṇena veṭhetvā tiṇagahane ṭhapesi.
atk-s0201a:2748_10: Puna ekasmiṃ divase yāgupānakāle satiṃ katvā olokento taṃ disvā gandhārisiṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0201a:2748_13: Tasmiṃ divase paribhuttāvasesaṃ “mā nassī”ti mayā ṭhapitanti.
atk-s0201a:2748_15: aloṇakaṃyeva yāguṃ pivitvā vedehaṃ isiṃ avoca –
atk-s0201a:2751_2: idāni kasmā loṇacuṇṇamattasannidhikāraṇā pabbajjāya anucchavikaṃ na karothā”ti?
atk-s0201a:2755_0: “Dhammaṃ bhaṇāmi vedeha, adhammo me na ruccati;
atk-s0201a:2759_0: Mahatthiyampi ce vācaṃ, na taṃ bhāseyya paṇḍito”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2761_0: “Kāmaṃ ruppatu vā mā vā, bhusaṃva vikirīyatu;
atk-s0201a:2763_0: Tato vedehisi yassa sakāpi buddhi natthi,
atk-s0201a:2763_2: so andhamahiṃso viya vane caratīti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0201a:2764_0: “No ce assa sakā buddhi, vinayo vā susikkhito;
atk-s0201a:2768_0: Evañca pana vatvā vedehisi ajānitvā mayā katanti gandhārisiṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0201a:2768_1: Te ubhopi tapaṃ caritvā brahmalokaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2768_2: Evaṃ tathāgatassa bodhisattakālepi dīgharattaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2769_0: Uttajjhāpanno ayamāyasmā bhikkhu yasapattoti ayamāyasmā amhākaṃ satthā bhikkhu ñattaṃ paññātabhāvaṃ pākaṭabhāvaṃ ajjhāpanno nu kho,
atk-s0201a:2769_1: sayañca parivārasampattiṃ patto nu kho noti.
atk-s0201a:2769_2: Tena cassa paññātajjhāpannabhāvena yasasannissitabhāvena ca kiṃ ekacce ādīnavā sandissanti udāhu noti evaṃ samannesantūti dasseti. Na tāva,
atk-s0201a:2769_5: yāva bhikkhu na rājarājamahāmattādīsu abhiññātabhāvaṃ vā parivārasampattiṃ vā āpanno hoti,
atk-s0201a:2769_6: tāva ekacce mānātimānādayo ādīnavā na saṃvijjanti upasantūpasanto viya sotāpanno viya sakadāgāmī viya ca viharati.
atk-s0201a:2769_7: Ariyo nu kho puthujjano nu khotipi ñātuṃ na sakkā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2770_1: bhikkhaveti yadā pana idhekacco bhikkhu ñāto hoti parivārasampanno vā,
atk-s0201a:2770_2: tadā tiṇhena siṅgena gogaṇaṃ vijjhanto duṭṭhagoṇo viya,
atk-s0201a:2770_3: migasaṅghaṃ abhimaddamāno dīpi viya ca aññe bhikkhū tattha tattha vijjhanto agāravo asabhāgavutti aggapādena bhūmiṃ phusanto viya carati.
atk-s0201a:2770_4: Ekacco pana kulaputto yathā yathā ñāto hoti yasassī,
atk-s0201a:2770_5: tathā tathā phalabhārabharito viya sāli suṭṭhutaraṃ onamati,
atk-s0201a:2770_6: rājarājamahāmattādīsu upasaṅkamantesu akiñcanabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chinnavisāṇausabho viya,
atk-s0201a:2770_7: caṇḍāladārako viya ca sorato nivāto nīcacitto hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ceva sadevakassa ca lokassa,
atk-s0201a:2770_9: Evarūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ sandhāya “nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2771_9: tasmā sabbākārena nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā saṃvijjanti.
atk-s0201a:2771_13: Cattāri hi bhayāni kilesabhayaṃ vaṭṭabhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ upavādabhayanti.
atk-s0201a:2771_22: “mādisaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ paṭicca sattā mā nassantū”ti upavādaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0201a:2772_1: Athassa upaṭṭhākakuladvāraṃ pattassa pattaṃ gahetvā thaṇḍilapīṭhakaṃ nissāya āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2772_2: Amaccadhītāpi taṃyeva pīṭhakaṃ nissāya paratobhāge nīcataraṃ āsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2772_3: Eko nevāsiko bhikkhu pacchā piṇḍāya paviṭṭho dvāre ṭhatvāva olokento thero amaccadhītarā saddhiṃ ekamañce nisinnoti sallakkhetvā,
atk-s0201a:2772_5: antogāme pana upaṭṭhāyikāhi saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīdatī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0201a:2772_6: “kiṃ nu kho mayā duddiṭṭha”nti punappunaṃ oloketvā tathāsaññīva hutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0201a:2772_7: Theropi bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gantvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2772_9: “taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ niggaṇhitvā vihārā nikkaḍḍhissāmī”ti asaññatanīhārena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0201a:2772_10: paribhogaghaṭato uluṅkena udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsaddaṃ karonto pāde dhovi. Thero,
atk-s0201a:2772_11: “ko nu kho ayaṃ asaññatacāriko”ti āvajjanto sabbaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0201a:2772_12: “ayaṃ mayi manaṃ padosetvā apāyūpago mā ahosī”ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalasamīpe pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2772_13: Nevāsiko duṭṭhākārena ghaṭikaṃ ukkhipitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto paviṭṭho theraṃ apassanto,
atk-s0201a:2772_14: “heṭṭhāmañcaṃ paviṭṭho bhavissatī”ti oloketvā tatthāpi apassanto nikkhamituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2772_16: Itaro uddhaṃ olokento disvā adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto evamāha –
atk-s0201a:2772_18: paṃsukūlika evaṃ ānubhāvasampannassa upaṭṭhāyikāya saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīditu”nti.
atk-s0201a:2773_3: Tañceti evaṃ tathāgatassa kilesappahānaṃ ñatvā tattha tattha ṭhitanisinnakālādīsupi catuparisamajjhe
atk-s0201a:2773_4: alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvāpi itipi satthā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho vantakileso pahīnamalo abbhā muttapuṇṇacando
atk-s0201a:2773_5: viya suparisuddhoti evaṃ tathāgatassa kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānaṃ taṃ vīmaṃsakaṃ bhikkhuṃ pare
atk-s0201a:2774_2: Saṅghe vā viharantoti appekadā aparicchinnagaṇanassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe viharanto.
atk-s0201a:2774_6: temāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti evaṃ paṭisallāne ceva pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe ca ekako viharanto.
atk-s0201a:2774_11: Gaṇamanusāsantīti gaṇabandhanena baddhā gaṇārāmā gaṇabahulikā hutvā gaṇaṃ pariharanti.
atk-s0201a:2774_13: Tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā gaṇato nissaṭā visaṃsaṭṭhā vippamuttavihārinopi atthi.
atk-s0201a:2775_0: Āmisesu sandissantīti āmisagiddhā āmisacakkhukā catupaccayaāmisatthameva āhiṇḍamānā āmisesu sandissamānakabhikkhūpi atthi.
atk-s0201a:2775_1: Āmisena anupalittā catūhi paccayehi vinivattamānasā abbhā muttacandasadisā hutvā viharamānāpi atthi.
atk-s0201a:2775_2: Nāyamāyasmā taṃ tena avajānātīti ayaṃ āyasmā satthā tāya tāya paṭipattiyā taṃ taṃ puggalaṃ nāvajānāti,
atk-s0201a:2775_5: Ayaṃ āmisena anupalitto paccayehi vinivattamānaso abbhā mutto candimā viyāti evamassa gehasitavasena ussādanāpi natthi.
atk-s0201a:2775_8: ayaṃ āmisagiddho lolo āmisacakkhukoti evamassa gehasitavasena apasādanāpi natthīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2775_10: Tathāgatassa sattesu tādibhāvo kathito hoti. Ayañhi –
atk-s0201a:2777_0: Dhanapāle rāhule ca, sabbesaṃ samako munī”ti. ;
atk-s0201a:2778_2: “ke panāyasmato ākārā”ti pucchāyaṃ āgato gaṇṭhivīmaṃsako ca,
atk-s0201a:2778_5: So hi pubbe parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṅgato.
atk-s0201a:2778_6: Paro ca nāma jānitvāpi katheyya ajānitvāpi.
atk-s0201a:2778_8: tasmā parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṃ agantvā tato uttari tathāgatova paṭipucchitabboti attho.
atk-s0201a:2779_0: Byākaramānoti ettha yasmā tathāgatassa micchābyākaraṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2779_1: tasmā sammā micchāti avatvā byākaramānotveva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2779_2: Etaṃ pathohamasmi etaṃ gocaroti esa mayhaṃ patho esa gocaroti attho.
atk-s0201a:2779_5: svāhaṃ tassa parisuddhabhāvena vīmaṃsakassa bhikkhuno ñāṇamukhe etāpātho,
atk-s0201a:2779_7: No ca tena tammayoti tenapi cāhaṃ parisuddhena sīlena na tammayo,
atk-s0201a:2780_0: Uttaruttariṃ paṇītapaṇītanti uttaruttariṃ ceva paṇītatarañca katvā deseti.
atk-s0201a:2780_3: kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā sukkanti sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhanti evaṃ sappaṭibhāgaṃ katvā kaṇhasukkaṃ deseti.
atk-s0201a:2780_6: Abhiññāya idhekaccaṃ dhammaṃ dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti tasmiṃ desite dhamme ekaccaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ
atk-s0201a:2780_7: abhiññāya tena paṭivedhadhammena desanādhamme niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2780_8: Satthari pasīdatīti evaṃ dhamme niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhiyyosomattāya sammāsambuddho so bhagavāti satthari pasīdati.
atk-s0201a:2780_9: Tena pana bhagavatā yo dhammo akkhāto,
atk-s0201a:2780_12: sopi suppaṭipanno vaṅkādidosarahitaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāti evaṃ dhamme saṅghepi pasīdati.
atk-s0201a:2780_13: Tañceti taṃ evaṃ pasannaṃ tattha tattha tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathentaṃ bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2781_3: Imehi byañjanehīti imehi idha vuttehi akkharehi.
atk-s0201a:2781_16: sotāpannassa hi vasavattimārenāpi saddhā asaṃhāriyā hoti sūrambaṭṭhassa viya.
atk-s0201a:2782_0: So kira satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā gehaṃ āgato.
atk-s0201a:2782_1: Atha māro dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ buddharūpaṃ māpetvā tassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā –
atk-s0201a:2782_4: “ahaṃ idāneva satthu santikā dhammaṃ sutvā āgato,
atk-s0201a:2782_5: kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upasaṅkamitvā satthusaññāya vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2782_11: taṃ anupadhāretvāva sahasā mayā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2782_16: yaṃ buddhā anupadhāretvā apaccakkhaṃ katvā kiñci katheyyuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2782_17: addhā ayaṃ mayhaṃ vibādhanatthaṃ māro āgato”ti.
atk-s0201a:2782_21: Kasmā āgatosīti vutte tava saddhācālanatthanti āha.
atk-s0201a:2782_24: tādisānaṃ mārānaṃ satampi sahassampi mama saddhaṃ cāletuṃ asamatthaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2782_25: maggena āgatā saddhā nāma silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitasineru viya acalā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2782_29: Kenaci vā lokasminti ete samaṇādayo ṭhapetvā aññenapi kenaci vā lokasmiṃ harituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0201a:2786_3: Tassa kira nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu kosambarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2786_5: Kusambassa nāma isino assamato avidūre māpitattātipi eke.
atk-s0201a:2787_1: Tato kotūhalako nāma daliddo chātakabhayena saputtadāro kedāraparicchinnaṃ subhikkhaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gacchanto puttaṃ vahituṃ asakkonto chaḍḍetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2787_6: Atha so puriso pahūtapāyasaṃ bhuñjitvā jirāpetuṃ asakkonto rattibhāge kālaṃ katvā tattheva sunakhiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā kukkuro jāto.
atk-s0201a:2787_9: Paccekabuddhopi bhattakiccāvasāne kukkurassa ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti.
atk-s0201a:2787_10: So paccekabuddhe sinehaṃ uppādetvā gopālakena saddhiṃ paṇṇasālampi gacchati.
atk-s0201a:2788_0: So gopālake asannihite bhattavelāya sayameva gantvā kālārocanatthaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre bhussati,
atk-s0201a:2788_2: So paccekabuddhe mudukena cittena kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0201a:2788_4: So devalokato cavitvā kosambiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulaghare nibbatti.
atk-s0201a:2788_5: Taṃ aputtako seṭṭhi tassa mātāpitūnaṃ dhanaṃ datvā puttaṃ katvā aggahesi.
atk-s0201a:2788_6: Atha so attano putte jāte sattakkhattuṃ mārāpetuṃ upakkami.
atk-s0201a:2788_7: So puññavantatāya sattasupi ṭhānesu maraṇaṃ appatvā avasāne ekāya seṭṭhidhītāya veyyattiyena laddhajīviko
atk-s0201a:2788_8: aparabhāge pituaccayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ patvā ghositaseṭṭhi nāma jāto.
atk-s0201a:2788_9: Aññepi kosambiyaṃ kukkuṭaseṭṭhi pāvārikaseṭṭhīti dve seṭṭhino santi.
atk-s0201a:2789_0: Tena ca samayena tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ seṭṭhīnaṃ kulūpakā pañcasatā isayo pabbatapāde vasiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2789_1: Te kālena kālaṃ loṇambilasevanatthāya manussapathaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2789_2: Athekasmiṃ vāre gimhasamaye manussapathaṃ āgacchantā nirudakamahākantāraṃ atikkamitvā kantārapariyosāne mahantaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ disvā cintesuṃ –
atk-s0201a:2789_6: sace no pānīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyyā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2789_7: Devatā isīnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmīti attano ānubhāvena viṭapantarato naṅgalasīsamattaṃ udakadhāraṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0201a:2789_8: Isigaṇo rajatakkhandhasadisaṃ udakavaṭṭiṃ disvā attano bhājanehi udakaṃ gahetvā paribhogaṃ katvā cintesi –
atk-s0201a:2789_13: Devatā isīnaṃ upasaṃkappanavasena dibbāni yāgukhajjakādīni datvā santappesi.
atk-s0201a:2790_0: Devatā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā upaḍḍhakāyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2790_3: kiṃ kammaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ adhigatāsī”ti? Bhante,
atk-s0201a:2790_5: Upaḍḍhauposathakammaṃ nissāya hi devatāya sā sampatti laddhā.
atk-s0201a:2791_0: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira gehe ayaṃ devaputto kammakāro ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2791_1: Seṭṭhissa hi gehe uposathadivasesu antamaso dāsakammakāre upādāya sabbo jano uposathiko hoti.
atk-s0201a:2791_2: Ekadivasaṃ ayaṃ kammakāro ekakova pāto uṭṭhāya kammantaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a:2791_3: Mahāseṭṭhi nivāpaṃ labhanamanusse sallakkhento etassevekassa araññaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā assa sāyamāsatthāya nivāpaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2791_4: Bhattakārikā dāsī ekasseva bhattaṃ pacitvā araññato āgatassa bhattaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi,
atk-s0201a:2791_6: “aññesu divasesu imasmiṃ kāle gehaṃ ekasaddaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0201a:2791_14: Imasmiṃ kāle uposathaṃ samādinnassa uposathakammaṃ hoti na hotīti mahāseṭṭhiṃ puccha ammāti?
atk-s0201a:2791_19: Kammakāro bhattaṃ abhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko hutvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā nipajji.
atk-s0201a:2791_21: So paccūsasamaye kālaṃ katvā upaḍḍhauposathakammanissandena mahāvaṭṭaniaṭaviyaṃ nigrodharukkhe devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0201a:2792_2: uppanno nu kho loke buddhoti? Āma, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2792_6: Isayo tiṭṭhatha tāva tumhe mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāmāti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā nikkhamitvā anupubbena kosambinagaraṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2792_10: bhante”ti nimantetvā punadivase isigaṇassa mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2792_11: Isayo bhuñjitvāva gacchāmāti āpucchiṃsu. Tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2792_12: aññasmiṃ kāle ekampi māsaṃ dvepi tayopi cattāropi māse vasitvā gacchatha.
atk-s0201a:2792_13: Imasmiṃ pana vāre hiyyo āgantvā ajjeva gacchāmāti vadatha,
atk-s0201a:2792_16: na kho pana sakkā jīvitantarāyo vidituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2792_17: tena mayaṃ turitā gacchāmāti. Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2792_22: mayaṃ puretaraṃ gamissāmāti nikkhamitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dvepi divasāni avasitvā turitagamaneneva sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0201a:2792_24: Satthu madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbeva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2793_0: Tepi tayo seṭṭhino pañcahi pañcahi sakaṭasatehi sappimadhuphāṇitādīni ceva paṭṭunnadukūlādīni ca ādāya
atk-s0201a:2793_1: kosambito nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanasāmante khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2793_2: gantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2793_4: Te balavasomanassajātā satthāraṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2793_5: Puna nimantetvā punadivaseti evaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ dānaṃ datvā,
atk-s0201a:2793_6: “amhākaṃ janapadaṃ āgamanāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti pādamūle nipajjiṃsu. Bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2793_8: Ettāvatā paṭiññā dinnā nāma hotīti gahapatayo sallakkhetvā dinnā no bhagavatā paṭiññāti dasabalaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0201a:2793_9: nikkhamitvā antarāmagge yojane yojane ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā anupubbena kosambiṃ patvā,
atk-s0201a:2793_11: Tayopi janā attano attano ārāme mahantaṃ dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā bhagavato vasanatthāya vihāre kārāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2793_12: Tattha kukkuṭaseṭṭhinā kārito kukkuṭārāmo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2793_13: Pāvārikaseṭṭhinā ambavane kārito pāvārikambavano nāma ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2794_2: Hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakaṃ patto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātā.
atk-s0201a:2794_7: Te na ceva aññamaññaṃ saññāpenti na ca saññattiṃ upentīti te atthañca kāraṇañca dassetvā neva aññamaññaṃ jānāpenti.
atk-s0201a:2795_0: Dve kira bhikkhū ekasmiṃ āvāse vasanti vinayadharo ca suttantiko ca.
atk-s0201a:2795_1: Tesu suttantiko bhikkhu ekadivasaṃ vaccakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho ācamanaudakāvasesaṃ bhājane ṭhapetvāva nikkhami.
atk-s0201a:2795_2: Vinayadharo pacchā paviṭṭho taṃ udakaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2795_3: tayā idaṃ udakaṃ ṭhapitanti? Āma, āvusoti.
atk-s0201a:2796_1: “ayaṃ suttantiko āpattiṃ āpajjamānopi na jānātī”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0201a:2796_3: “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi āpattibhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2796_9: “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo musāvādī”ti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2797_2: Tañca kho neva piyakamyatāya na bhedādhippāyena,
atk-s0201a:2797_9: appeva nāma sadevake loke appaṭipuggalo bhagavā sayaṃ vā gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2797_10: attano vā santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sāraṇīyadhammadesanaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0201a:2797_11: sāmaggiṃ kareyyā”ti atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya gantvā avoca.
atk-s0201a:2798_2: dhammā sāraṇīyāti heṭṭhā kalahabhaṇḍanavasena desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0201a:2798_3: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cha sāraṇīyā dhammā āgatāti evamidaṃ kosambiyasuttaṃ yathānusandhināva gataṃ hoti.
atk-s0201a:2798_4: Tattha sāraṇīyāti saritabbayuttā addhāne atikkantepi na pamussitabbā.
atk-s0201a:2798_17: Bhikkhūnañhi mettacittena ābhisamācārikadhammapūraṇaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2798_18: Gihīnaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya bodhivandanatthāya saṅghanimantanatthāya gamanaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe bhikkhū
atk-s0201a:2798_19: disvā paccuggamanaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ anugamananti evamādikaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2799_1: kammaṭṭhānakathanaṃ dhammadesanā tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2799_15: paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā chandajātā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”tiādikathanakāle mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2800_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni ca katvā vivittāsane nisīditvā,
atk-s0201a:2800_2: averā abyāpajjhā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2800_4: averā abyāpajjhā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2801_0: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca.
atk-s0201a:2801_1: Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2801_2: Therānaṃ pana pādadhovanavandanabījanadānādibhedampi sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2801_3: Ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ tesu avamaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2801_4: Devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2801_7: amhākaṃ tissatthero kadā nu kho āgamissatīti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2801_8: Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā suppasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2801_10: tissatthero arogo hotu appābādhoti samannāharaṇaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2802_1: Dhammikāti kuhanādibhedaṃ micchājīvaṃ vajjetvā dhammena samena bhikkhācariyavattena uppannā.
atk-s0201a:2802_2: Antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampīti pacchimakoṭiyā patte pariyāpannaṃ pattassa antogataṃ dvattikaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi.
atk-s0201a:2802_3: Appaṭivibhattabhogīti ettha dve paṭivibhattāni nāma āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ puggalapaṭivibhattañca. Tattha,
atk-s0201a:2802_5: ettakaṃ na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2802_7: asukassa na dassāmī”ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ pana puggalapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2803_0: Sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogīti ettha sādhāraṇabhogino idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2803_2: taṃ taṃ neva lābhena lābhaṃ jigīsanāmukhena gihīnaṃ deti,
atk-s0201a:2803_4: paṭiggaṇhantova saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti gahetvā gaṇḍiṃ paharitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ viya passati.
atk-s0201a:2803_8: Na hi tassa santakaṃ sīlavantā gaṇhanti.
atk-s0201a:2804_1: yo hi odissakaṃ katvā mātu vā pitu vā ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā deti,
atk-s0201a:2804_6: tena pana odissakaṃ dentena gilānagilānupaṭṭhākaāgantukagamikānañceva navapabbajitassa ca saṅghāṭipattaggahaṇaṃ ajānantassa dātabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2804_7: Etesaṃ datvā avasesaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya thokaṃ thokaṃ adatvā yo yattakaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0201a:2804_9: Avasiṭṭhe asati puna piṇḍāya caritvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2805_0: Ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo susikkhitāya parisāya supūro hoti,
atk-s0201a:2805_2: Susikkhitāya hi parisāya yo aññato labhati,
atk-s0201a:2805_6: Ayañca pana sāraṇīyadhammo evaṃ punappunaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ dentassāpi dvādasahi vassehi pūrati,
atk-s0201a:2805_8: Sace hi dvādasamepi vasse sāraṇīyadhammapūrako piṇḍapātapūraṃ pattaṃ āsanasālāyaṃ ṭhapetvā nahāyituṃ gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2805_11: “āharatha na”nti sabbaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vicāretvā bhuñjitvā ca rittapattaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0201a:2805_17: Sakiṃ khaṇḍe jāte puna pūretabbova. Yo pana,
atk-s0201a:2805_20: yassa me pattagataṃ anāpucchāva sabrahmacārī paribhuñjantī”ti somanassaṃ janeti,
atk-s0201a:2806_6: bhaye vā chātake vā sampatte devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0201a:2807_1: leṇagirivāsī tissatthero kira mahāgirigāmaṃ upanissāya vasati.
atk-s0201a:2807_2: Paññāsa mahātherā nāgadīpaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya gacchantā girigāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2807_15: Dhurageheyeva mahāupāsikā khīrabhattaṃ sajjetvā theraṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā therassa dvāraṃ sampattasseva pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2807_16: So taṃ ādāya therānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2807_21: kiṃ nu kho”ti sesānaṃ mukhaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0201a:2807_24: nikkukkuccā gaṇhatha bhante”tiādito paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā attanāpi yāvadatthaṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0201a:2808_0: Atha naṃ bhattakiccāvasāne therā pucchiṃsu – “kadā, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2808_5: Etampi me, bhante, natthīti. Nanu, āvuso,
atk-s0201a:2808_8: tassa me dhammassa pūritakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi bhikkhusatasahassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2808_13: Idaṃ tāva pattagataṃ na khīyatīti ettha vatthu.
atk-s0201a:2809_0: Ayameva pana thero cetiyapabbate giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāya dānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0201a:2809_9: Tassa bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite dentassa matthake ṭhapitāpi te sāṭakā hatthaṃ nārohanti,
atk-s0201a:2809_12: So tassa hatthe ṭhapetvā amaccassa mukhaṃ oloketvā daharaṃ nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ datvā saṅghaṃ vissajjetvā daharassa santike nisīditvā, “kadā, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2809_19: tassa me dhammassa pūritakālato paṭṭhāya bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0201a:2809_22: Idaṃ bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti ettha vatthu.
atk-s0201a:2810_0: Brāhmaṇatissabhaye pana bhātaragāmavāsino nāgattheriyā anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2810_4: Tā gantvā sabbesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theriyā ārocesuṃ. Sā sutvā,
atk-s0201a:2810_6: attano uddesaparipucchāyonisomanasikāresuyeva yogaṃ karothā”ti vatvā bhikkhācāravelāya pārupitvā attadvādasamā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2810_7: Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā dvādasannampi bhikkhunīnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā, “ayye,
atk-s0201a:2810_10: Theriyā pana kaniṭṭhabhātā nāgatthero nāma atthi. So,
atk-s0201a:2810_13: paratīraṃ gamissāmāti attadvādasamova attano vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhanto theriṃ disvā gamissāmī”ti bhātaragāmaṃ āgato. Therī,
atk-s0201a:2810_17: “ajja ekadivasaṃ vihāreyeva vasitvā sveva gamissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2811_0: Therī punadivase rukkhamūle piṇḍāya caritvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0201a:2811_3: Dhammiko tātā piṇḍapāto kukkuccaṃ akatvā paribhuñjathāti.
atk-s0201a:2811_8: therīti vatvā bhayaṃ nāma sabbakālaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0201a:2811_10: ‘bho piṇḍapātika bhikkhunībhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vītināmayitthā’ti cittena anuvadiyamāno santhambhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0201a:2812_4: nivattessāmī”ti cintayamānā ṭhatvā therassa gamanaṃ disvā rukkhā oruyha pattaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0201a:2812_5: dethāti pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ rukkhamūlaṃyeva ānetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ paṭiññaṃ kāretvā dvādasa bhikkhuniyo,
atk-s0201a:2812_6: dvādasa ca bhikkhū satta vassāni upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0201a:2812_7: Idaṃ devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti ettha vatthu,
atk-s0201a:2813_0: Akhaṇḍānītiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2813_1: tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2813_3: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2813_4: Yassa pana paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni,
atk-s0201a:2813_5: tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññataravaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2813_7: tassa antarantarā visabhāgabinducitrā gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0201a:2813_9: tassa tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni nāma honti.
atk-s0201a:2813_10: Tāni panetāni taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇato bhujissāni.
atk-s0201a:2813_13: “idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpannapubbo”ti kenaci parāmaṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca aparāmaṭṭhāni.
atk-s0201a:2813_14: Upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikānīti vuccanti.
atk-s0201a:2813_15: Sīlasāmaññagato viharatīti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānabhāvūpagatasīlo viharati.
atk-s0201a:2813_16: Sotāpannādīnañhi sīlaṃ samuddantarepi devalokepi vasantānaṃ aññesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ sīlena samānameva hoti,
atk-s0201a:2814_10: Yadidaṃ kūṭanti yametaṃ kūṭāgārakaṇṇikāsaṅkhātaṃ kūṭaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2814_12: Yasmiṃ patite mattikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe patanti.
atk-s0201a:2814_15: evaṃ imesampi sāraṇīyadhammānaṃ yā ayaṃ ariyā diṭṭhi,
atk-s0201a:2814_16: sā aggā ca saṅgāhikā ca saṅghāṭaniyā cāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0201a:2815_4: yāyaṃ sotāpattimaggadiṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti vuttā,
atk-s0201a:2815_5: sā kathaṃ kena kāraṇena niyyātīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2815_6: Pariyuṭṭhitacittova hotīti ettāvatāpi pariyuṭṭhitacittoyeva nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2815_8: Suppaṇihitaṃ me mānasanti mayhaṃ cittaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2815_10: Ariyantiādīsu taṃ ñāṇaṃ yasmā ariyānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0201a:2815_17: Puthujjanānaṃ pana abhāvato asādhāraṇaṃ puthujjanehīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2816_1: Labhāmi paccattaṃ samathanti attano citte samathaṃ labhāmīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2818_3: Vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyatīti saṅghakammavasena vā desanāya vā vuṭṭhānaṃ dissati.
atk-s0201a:2818_4: Ariyasāvako hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto garukāpattīsu kuṭikārasadisaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2818_14: dakkhiṇena vā vāmena vā passena sayituṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2818_15: Aṅgāraṃ akkamitvāti ito cito ca pasāritena hatthena vā pādena vā phusitvā.
atk-s0201a:2818_16: Evaṃ phusantānaṃ pana manussānaṃ na sīghaṃ hattho jhāyati,
atk-s0201a:2818_17: tathā hi ekacce hatthena aṅgāraṃ gahetvā parivattamānā dūrampi gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2818_19: so phuṭṭhamatteneva dayhamāno cirīti saddaṃ karonto khippaṃ paṭisaṃharati,
atk-s0201a:2818_24: Desetīti āpattipaṭiggāhake sabhāgapuggale sati ekaṃ divasaṃ vā rattiṃ vā anadhivāsetvā rattiṃ caturaṅgepi
atk-s0201a:2819_2: Kiṃ karaṇīyānīti kiṃ karomīti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni.
atk-s0201a:2819_3: Tattha uccakammaṃ nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ cetiye sudhākammaṃ uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhigharesu kattabbakammanti evamādi.
atk-s0201a:2819_5: atha vā cetiye sudhākammādi uccakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2819_7: Ussukkaṃ āpanno hotīti ussukkabhāvaṃ kattabbataṃ paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0201a:2819_11: Taruṇavacchā hi gāvī araññe ekato āgataṃ vacchakaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipannaṃ pahāya dūraṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0201a:2819_12: vacchakassa āsannaṭṭhāne caramānā tiṇaṃ ālumpitvā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā ekantaṃ vacchakameva ca viloketi,
atk-s0201a:2819_13: evameva sotāpanno uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni karonto tanninno hoti,
atk-s0201a:2820_1: mahācetiye kira sudhākamme kariyamāne eko ariyasāvako ekena hatthena sudhābhājanaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2820_2: ekena kucchaṃ gahetvā sudhākammaṃ karissāmīti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruḷho.
atk-s0201a:2820_3: Eko kāyadaḷhibahulo bhikkhu gantvā therassa santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2820_4: Thero aññasmiṃ sati papañco hotīti tasmā ṭhānā aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0201a:2820_6: Thero puna aññaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ katipayaṭṭhāne āgataṃ, –
atk-s0201a:2820_7: “sappurisa mahantaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ kiṃ aññasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ na labhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0201a:2821_5: Sabbacetasā samannāharitvāti appamattakampi vikkhepaṃ akaronto sakalacittena samannāharitvā.
atk-s0201a:2821_8: dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā niddāyamānā vā yena kenaci saddhiṃ sallapamānā vā vikkhittacittā vā na nisīdanti,
atk-s0201a:2821_9: atha kho amataṃ paribhuñjantā viya atittāva honti dhammassavane,
atk-s0201a:2822_1: Dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hotīti sabhāvo suṭṭhu samannesito hoti.
atk-s0201a:2822_4: Evaṃ sattaṅgasamannāgatoti evaṃ imehi sattahi mahāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇehi samannāgato.
atk-s0201a:2823_0: Vitaṇḍavādī pana ekacittakkhaṇiko nāma maggo natthi,
atk-s0201a:2823_1: “evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti hi vacanato sattapi vassāni maggabhāvanā honti.
atk-s0201a:2823_2: Kilesā pana lahu chijjantā sattahi ñāṇehi chijjantīti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2823_7: idamassa sattamaṃ ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hotī”ti imameva āharitvā dassessati.
atk-s0201a:2823_8: Tato vattabbo kiṃ panidaṃ suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ nītatthanti.
atk-s0201a:2823_13: “dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hoti sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyāti ettha ko attho”ti?
atk-s0201a:2823_22: ariyasāvako sotāpattiphalasamannāgato hotīti idha maggaṃ abhāvetvā maṇḍūko viya uppatitvā ariyasāvako phalameva gaṇhissati.
atk-s0201a:2823_23: Mā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā avaca.
atk-s0201a:2823_24: Pañhaṃ vissajjentena nāma ācariyasantike vasitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā attharasaṃ viditvā vattabbaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2823_30: “gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī”ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-s0201a:2827_3: Idaṃ niccanti idaṃ saha kāyena brahmaṭṭhānaṃ aniccaṃ “nicca”nti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2827_9: Idañhi na jāyatītiādīsu imasmiṃ ṭhāne koci jāyanako vā jīyanako vā mīyanako vā cavanako vā upapajjanako vā natthīti sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0201a:2827_10: Ito ca panaññanti ito saha kāyakā brahmaṭṭhānā uttari aññaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti evamassa thāmagatā sassatadiṭṭhi uppannā hoti.
atk-s0201a:2827_11: Evaṃvādī pana so upari tisso jhānabhūmiyo cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni nibbānanti sabbaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0201a:2827_12: Avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato samannāgato aññāṇī andhībhūto.
atk-s0201a:2828_2: māro pāpimāti māro kathaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa?
atk-s0201a:2828_3: So kira attano bhavane nisīditvā kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ āvajjeti –
atk-s0201a:2828_4: “ajja samaṇo gotamo katarasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā vasatī”ti.
atk-s0201a:2828_7: “kattha nu kho gato”ti olokento brahmalokaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2828_9: yāva tattha dhammakathaṃ kathetvā brahmagaṇaṃ mama visayā nātikkameti,
atk-s0201a:2828_10: tāva gantvā dhammadesanāyaṃ vichandaṃ karissāmī”ti satthu padānupadiko gantvā brahmagaṇassa antare adissamānena kāyena aṭṭhāsi. So,
atk-s0201a:2828_11: “satthārā bakabrahmā apasādito”ti ñatvā brahmuno upatthambho hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2829_0: Brahmapārisajjaṃ anvāvisitvāti ekassa brahmapārisajjassa sarīraṃ pavisitvā.
atk-s0201a:2829_1: Mahābrahmānaṃ pana brahmapurohitānaṃ vā anvāvisituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2829_10: Kattā nimmātāti lokassa kattā ca nimmātā ca,
atk-s0201a:2830_0: Seṭṭho sajitāti ayaṃ lokassa uttamo ca sajitā ca.
atk-s0201a:2830_8: goṇo hohī”ti evaṃ sattānaṃ visajjetā ayanti dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2830_9: Vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānanti ayaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya vasī,
atk-s0201a:2830_11: Tattha aṇḍajajalābujā sattā antoaṇḍakose ceva antovatthimhi ca bhabyā nāma,
atk-s0201a:2831_5: Hīne kāye patiṭṭhitāti catūsu apāyesu nibbattā.
atk-s0201a:2831_8: “niccā dhuvā sassatā acchejjā abhejjā akkhayā”ti evaṃ pathavīpasaṃsakā pathaviyā vaṇṇavādino ahesunti vadati.
atk-s0201a:2831_12: Taṃ tāhanti tena kāraṇena taṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2831_17: Daṇḍena paṭippaṇāmeyyāti catuhatthena muggaradaṇḍena pothetvā palāpeyya.
atk-s0201a:2831_19: Virādheyyāti hatthena gahaṇayutte vā pādena patiṭṭhānayutte vā ṭhāne gahaṇapatiṭṭhānāni kātuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0201a:2831_20: Nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasīti bhikkhu nanu tvaṃ imaṃ brahmaparisaṃ sannipatitaṃ obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2831_21: jotayamānaṃ passasīti brahmuno ovāde ṭhitānaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0201a:2831_26: māro pāpimā nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasi brahmaparisaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ jotayamānaṃ,
atk-s0201a:2831_27: yadi tvampi mahābrahmuno vacanaṃ anatikkamitvā yadeva te brahmā vadati,
atk-s0201a:2831_29: tvampi evamevaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca viroceyyāsīti evaṃ vadanto maṃ brahmaparisaṃ upanesi upasaṃhari.
atk-s0201a:2831_30: Mā tvaṃ maññitthoti mā tvaṃ maññi.
atk-s0201a:2831_31: Māro tvamasi pāpimāti pāpima tvaṃ mahājanassa māraṇato māro nāma,
atk-s0201a:2831_32: pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ mahājanassa ayasaṃ karaṇato pāpimā nāmāti jānāmi.
atk-s0201a:2832_2: Te kho evaṃ jāneyyunti te evaṃ mahantena tapokammena samannāgatā,
atk-s0201a:2832_5: yassa te ajjāpi mukhe khīragandho vāyatīti ghaṭṭento vadati.
atk-s0201a:2832_6: Pathaviṃ ajjhosissasīti pathaviṃ ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi gaṇhissasi.
atk-s0201a:2832_7: Opasāyiko me bhavissasīti mayhaṃ samīpasayo bhavissasi,
atk-s0201a:2832_13: Yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāhiteyyoti mayā attano ruciyā yaṃ icchāmi,
atk-s0201a:2832_15: bāhitvā ca pana jajjharikāgumbatopi nīcataro lakuṇḍaṭakataro kātabbo bhavissasīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2833_0: Iminā esa bhagavantaṃ upalāpeti vā apasādeti vā.
atk-s0201a:2833_1: Upalāpeti nāma sace kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0201a:2833_8: ahaṃ taṃ sesajanaṃ paṭibāhitvā vissāsikaṃ abbhantarikaṃ karissāmīti evaṃ tāva upalāpeti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2833_13: mama gamanādīni āgametvā gamissasi vā ṭhassasi vā nisīdissasi vā nipajjissasi vā,
atk-s0201a:2833_15: ahaṃ pana taṃ yathākāmaṃ karissāmi bāhitvā ca jajjharikāgumbatopi lakuṇḍakataranti evaṃ apasādeti nāma.
atk-s0201a:2834_0: Apica te ahaṃ brahmeti idāni bhagavā,
atk-s0201a:2834_2: attano yasena sammatto sarīraṃ phusitumpi samatthaṃ kiñci na passati,
atk-s0201a:2834_3: thokaṃ niggahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2835_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā vicaranti.
atk-s0201a:2835_1: Disā bhanti virocanāti disāsu virocamānā obhāsanti,
atk-s0201a:2835_3: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakena pamāṇena sahassadhā loko,
atk-s0201a:2835_5: Ettha te vattate vasoti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse tuyhaṃ vaso vattati.
atk-s0201a:2835_6: Paroparañca jānāsīti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse paropare uccanīce hīnappaṇīte satte jānāsi.
atk-s0201a:2835_9: “ayaṃ pana sarāgo ayaṃ vītarāgo”ti evaṃ rāgavirāginampi janaṃ jānāsi.
atk-s0201a:2835_12: Sattānaṃ āgatiṃ gatinti ettha cakkavāḷasahasse paṭisandhivasena sattānaṃ āgatiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2835_16: aññesaṃ pana tayā uttari dvisahassānaṃ tisahassānaṃ catusahassānaṃ pañcasahassānaṃ dasasahassānaṃ satasahassānañca brahmānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0201a:2835_17: catuhatthāya pilotikāya paṭappamāṇaṃ kātuṃ vāyamanto viya mahantosmīti saññaṃ karosīti niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2836_2: Tena taṃ tvaṃ na jānāsīti tena kāraṇena taṃ kāyaṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi.
atk-s0201a:2836_3: Neva te samasamoti jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpi tayā samasamo na homi.
atk-s0201a:2836_5: Kuto nīceyyanti tayā nīcatarabhāvo pana mayhaṃ kuto.
atk-s0201a:2837_0: Heṭṭhūpapattiko kiresa brahmā anuppanne buddhuppāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiyo
atk-s0201a:2837_1: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vehapphalabrahmaloke pañcakappasatikaṃ
atk-s0201a:2837_3: Tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā heṭṭūpapattikaṃ katvā tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā subhakiṇhabrahmaloke catusaṭṭhikappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0201a:2837_4: Tattha dutiyajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā ābhassaresu aṭṭhakappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0201a:2837_5: Tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyuko hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0201a:2837_6: so paṭhamakāle attanā katakammañca nibbattaṭṭhānañca aññāsi,
atk-s0201a:2837_7: kāle pana gacchante ubhayaṃ pamussitvā sassatadiṭṭhiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0201a:2838_1: “samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ āyuñca nibbattaṭṭhānañca pubbekatakammañca jānāti,
atk-s0201a:2838_2: handa naṃ pubbe katakammaṃ pucchāmī”ti satthāraṃ attano pubbekatakammaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0201a:2839_0: Pubbe kiresa kulaghare nibbattitvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2839_1: “jātijarābyādhimaraṇassa antaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamma isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
atk-s0201a:2839_2: abhiññāpādakajjhānalābhī hutvā gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā jhānaratiyā vītināmeti.
atk-s0201a:2839_3: Tadā ca kālena kālaṃ satthavāhā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi marukantāraṃ paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0201a:2839_4: Marukantāre pana divā na sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0201a:2839_6: Atha purimasakaṭassa aggayuge yuttabalibaddā gacchantā nivattitvā āgatamaggābhimukhāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2839_7: Itarasakaṭāni tatheva nivattitvā aruṇe uggate nivattitabhāvaṃ jāniṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2839_10: “natthi dāni amhākaṃ jīvita”nti cintetvā goṇe cakkesu bandhitvā manussā sakaṭapacchāyāyaṃ pavisitvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2839_11: Tāpasopi kālasseva paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā paṇṇasāladvāre nisinno gaṅgaṃ olokayamāno addasa gaṅgaṃ mahatā
atk-s0201a:2839_14: “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ loke evarūpassa madhurodakassa alābhena kilissamānā sattā”ti.
atk-s0201a:2839_15: So evaṃ āvajjanto marukantāre taṃ satthaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2839_17: “ito mahā udakakkhandho chijjitvā marukantāre satthābhimukho gacchatū”ti abhiññācittena adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2839_18: Sahacittuppādena mātikāruḷhaṃ viya udakaṃ tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0201a:2839_19: Manussā udakasaddena vuṭṭhāya udakaṃ disvā hatthatuṭṭhā nhāyitvā pivitvā goṇepi pāyetvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2845_0: Aparasmiṃ samaye tāpaso gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā āraññakaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0201a:2845_1: Tena ca samayena corā taṃ gāmaṃ paharitvā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā gāviyo ca karamare ca gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2845_3: Tāpaso taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjanto,
atk-s0201a:2845_5: “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya abhiññācittena corānaṃ
atk-s0201a:2851_0: Puna ekasmiṃ samaye uparigaṅgāvāsikaṃ kulaṃ heṭṭhāgaṅgāvāsikena kulena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ
atk-s0201a:2851_1: bandhitvā bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyañceva gandhamālādīni ca āropetvā gaṅgāsotena āgacchati.
atk-s0201a:2851_2: Manussā khādamānā bhuñjamānā naccantā gāyantā devavimānena gacchantā viya balavasomanassā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2851_5: idāni ne samuddameva pāpessāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā uṭṭhāya phaṇaṃ katvā sussūkāraṃ karonto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0201a:2851_10: kiṃ nu kho”ti āvajjanto nāgarājaṃ disvā,
atk-s0201a:2851_11: “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ māpetvā nāgarājassa dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2851_12: Nāgarājā bhīto phaṇaṃ saṃharitvā udakaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0201a:2858_0: Aparasmiṃ samaye esa isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kesavo nāma tāpaso ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2858_1: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto kappo nāma māṇavo kesavassa baddhacaro antevāsiko hutvā ācariyassa kiṃkārapaṭissāvī
atk-s0201a:2864_0: Evaṃ brahmuno nānattabhāvesu katakammaṃ satthā pakāsesi.
atk-s0201a:2864_2: dīpasahasse ujjalite rūpāni viya sabbakammānissa pākaṭāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2869_0: Athassa bhagavā uttari asamasamataṃ pakāsento pathaviṃ kho ahaṃ brahmetiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2869_1: Tattha pathaviyā pathavattena ananubhūtanti pathaviyā pathavisabhāvena ananubhūtaṃ appattaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2869_3: Tañhi sabbasmā saṅkhatā nissaṭattā pathavisabhāvena appattaṃ nāma.
atk-s0201a:2869_5: Pathaviṃ nāpahosinti pathaviṃ taṇhādiṭṭhimānagāhehi na gaṇhiṃ.
atk-s0201a:2870_1: sabbassa sabbattenāti idameva brahmā attano vāditāya sabbanti akkharaṃ niddisitvā akkhare dosaṃ gaṇhanto āha.
atk-s0201a:2870_8: Mā heva te rittakameva ahosi tucchakameva ahosīti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ rittakaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0201a:2870_9: tucchakaṃ mā hotūti satthāraṃ musāvādena niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0201a:2871_0: Satthā pana etasmā brahmunā sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena vādītaro,
atk-s0201a:2871_3: suṇāhi meti tassa vādamaddanatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharanto viññāṇantiādimāha.
atk-s0201a:2871_5: Anidassananti cakkhuviññāṇassa āpāthaṃ anupagamanato anidassanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0201a:2873_0: Bhūte antāni dissanti, bhūte antā pakāsitā”ti.
