atk-s0201a:2874_1: Nibbānato hi añño dhammo sapabhataro vā jotivantataro vā parisuddhataro vā paṇḍarataro vā natthi.
atk-s0201a:2874_4: Puratthimadisādīsu hi asukadisāya nāma nibbānaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2874_7: Nibbānassa kira yathā mahāsamuddassa yato yato otaritukāmā honti,
atk-s0201a:2874_10: Evamevaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu yena yena mukhena nibbānaṃ otaritukāmā honti,
atk-s0201a:2874_14: Taṃ pathaviyā pathavattenāti taṃ nibbānaṃ pathaviyā pathavīsabhāvena tato paresaṃ āpādīnaṃ āpādisabhāvena ca ananubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2874_15: Iti yaṃ tumhādisānaṃ visayabhūtaṃ sabbatebhūmakadhammajātaṃ tassa sabbattena taṃ viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ
atk-s0201a:2875_0: Tato brahmā gahitagahitaṃ satthārā vissajjāpito kiñci gahetabbaṃ adisvā laḷitakaṃ kātukāmo handa carahi te, mārisa,
atk-s0201a:2875_3: Sace visahasīti yadi sakkosi mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ,
atk-s0201a:2875_6: Nevassu me sakkoti antaradhāyitunti mayhaṃ antaradhāyituṃ neva sakkoti.
atk-s0201a:2875_12: Satthā tassa mūlapaṭisandhiṃ gantuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0201a:2875_13: Mūlapaṭisandhiṃ vā agantvāpi yena tamena attānaṃ antaradhāpetvā adissamānako bhaveyya,
atk-s0201a:2875_23: brahme tvaṃ antarahitomhī”ti saññaṃ uppādesi nāmāti.
atk-s0201a:2876_5: antaradhāyāmī”ti evaṃ vutte taṃ antaradhāyituṃ asakkontaṃ disvā ahaṃ etadavocaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2876_7: Samaṇassa gotamassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne atthibhāvo vā natthibhāvo vā kathaṃ sakkā jānitunti evaṃ brahmagaṇassa
atk-s0201a:2877_0: Tattha bhavevāhaṃ bhayaṃ disvāti ahaṃ bhave bhayaṃ disvāyeva.
atk-s0201a:2877_1: Bhavañca vibhavesinanti imañca kāmabhavāditividhampi sattabhavaṃ vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ gavesamānaṃ pariyesamānampi punappunaṃ bhaveyeva disvā.
atk-s0201a:2877_2: Bhavaṃ nābhivadinti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṃ na abhivadiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2877_4: Nandiñca na upādiyinti bhavataṇhaṃ na upagañchiṃ,
atk-s0201a:2877_6: Iti cattāri saccāni pakāsento satthā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0201a:2877_7: Desanāpariyosāne desanānusārena vipassanāgabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalāmatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2878_0: Acchariyabbhutacittajātāti acchariyajātā abbhutajātā tuṭṭhijātā ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2878_1: Samūlaṃ bhavaṃ udabbahīti bodhimaṇḍe attano tāya tāya desanāya aññesampi bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ samūlakaṃ bhavaṃ udabbahi,
atk-s0201a:2879_1: Tasmiṃ pana samaye māro pāpimā kodhābhibhūto hutvā,
atk-s0201a:2879_2: “mayi vicaranteyeva samaṇena gotamena dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dasamattāni brahmasahassāni mama vasaṃ ativattitānī”ti
atk-s0201a:2879_6: Tattha sace tvaṃ evaṃ anubuddhoti sace tvaṃ evaṃ attanāva cattāri saccāni anubuddho.
atk-s0201a:2879_7: Mā sāvake upanesīti gihisāvake vā pabbajitasāvake vā taṃ dhammaṃ mā upanayasi.
atk-s0201a:2879_8: Hīne kāye patiṭṭhitāti catūsu apāyesu patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0201a:2879_12: Anuppanne hi buddhuppāde kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kassaci kiñci avicāretvā ekacarā hutvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā brahmaloke uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2879_14: Anakkhātaṃ kusalañhi mārisāti paresaṃ anakkhātaṃ anovadanaṃ dhammakathāya akathanaṃ kusalaṃ etaṃ seyyo.
atk-s0201a:2879_21: Brahmuno ca abhinimantanatāyāti bakabrahmuno ca idañhi, mārisa,
atk-s0201a:2879_22: niccantiādinā nayena saha kāyakena brahmaṭṭhānena nimantanavacanena.
atk-s0201a:2879_24: Imassa veyyākaraṇassa brahmanimantanikaṃtveva adhivacanaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti jātā.
atk-s0201a:2883_2: Tattha koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭhoti kucchiṃ pavisitvā antānaṃ anto anupaviṭṭho,
atk-s0201a:2883_4: Garugaro viyāti garukagaruko viya thaddho pāsāṇapuñjasadiso.
atk-s0201a:2883_5: Māsācitaṃ maññeti māsabhattaṃ bhuttassa kucchi viya māsapūritapasibbako viya tintamāso viya cāti attho.
atk-s0201a:2883_6: Vihāraṃ pavisitvāti sace āhāradosena esa garubhāvo,
atk-s0201a:2883_7: abbhokāse caṅkamituṃ na sappāyanti caṅkamā orohitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā pakatipaññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0201a:2883_9: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjamāno attanoyeva upāyena manasi akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2883_10: Sace pana thero attano sīlaṃ āvajjetvā,
atk-s0201a:2883_11: “yaṃ hiyyo vā pare vā parasuve vā paribhuttaṃ avipakkamatthi,
atk-s0201a:2883_13: sabbaṃ jīratu phāsukaṃ hotū”ti hatthena kucchiṃ parāmasissa,
atk-s0201a:2883_15: Thero pana tathā akatvā yoniso manasi akāsi.
atk-s0201a:2883_16: Mā tathāgataṃ vihesesīti yathā hi puttesu vihesitesu mātāpitaro vihesitāva honti,
atk-s0201a:2883_19: evaṃ tathāgatasāvake vihesite tathāgato vihesitova hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0201a:2884_2: mukhena uggantvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā bahipaṇṇasālāya kavāṭaṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2885_1: Bhūtapubbāhaṃ pāpimāti kasmā idaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi?
atk-s0201a:2885_3: “ākāsaṭṭhakadevatānaṃ tāva manussagandho yojanasate ṭhitānaṃ ābādhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0201a:2885_6: Ayaṃ pana māro nāgariko paricokkho mahesakkho ānubhāvasampanno devarājā samāno mama kucchiyaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0201a:2885_7: antānaṃ anto pakkāsayokāse nisinno ativiya paduṭṭho bhavissati.
atk-s0201a:2885_8: Evarūpaṃ nāma jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ okāsaṃ pavisitvā nisīdituṃ sakkontassa kimaññaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0201a:2885_10: tvaṃ mama ñātikoti pana vutte mudubhāvaṃ anāpajjamāno nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2885_11: handassa ñātikoṭiṃ paṭivijjhitvā mudukeneva naṃ upāyena vissajjessāmī”ti cintetvā imaṃ desanamārabhi.
atk-s0201a:2886_0: So me tvaṃ bhāgineyyo hosīti so tvaṃ tasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo hosi.
atk-s0201a:2886_2: Devalokasmiṃ pana mārassa pitu vaṃso pitāmahassa vaṃso rajjaṃ karonto nāma natthi,
atk-s0201a:2886_5: Añño eko attanā katena kammena tasmiṃ ṭhāne adhipati hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0201a:2886_6: Iti ayaṃ māropi tadā tato cavitvā puna kusalaṃ katvā imasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ adhipatiṭṭhāne nibbattoti veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2887_6: Aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsūti ettakena sarīraṃ pariyādānaṃ gamissatīti citakassa pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā catūsu disāsu aggiṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2887_8: therassa udakaleṇaṃ pavisitvā nisinnakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0201a:2887_9: Cīvarāni papphoṭetvāti samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vigatadhūme kiṃsukavaṇṇe aṅgāre maddamāno cīvarāni vidhunitvā.
atk-s0201a:2888_6: Yathā taṃ dūsī māroti yathā etesaṃ dūsī māro.
atk-s0201a:2888_9: Muṇḍakātiādīsu muṇḍe muṇḍāti samaṇe ca samaṇāti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya,
atk-s0201a:2888_10: ime pana hīḷentā muṇḍakā samaṇakāti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2889_0: Jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmāti jhāyino mayaṃ jhāyino mayanti.
atk-s0201a:2889_4: Mūsikaṃ maggayamānoti sāyaṃ gocaratthāya susirarukkhato nikkhantaṃ rukkhasākhāya mūsikaṃ pariyesanto.
atk-s0201a:2889_5: So kira upasantūpasanto viya niccalova tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0201a:2889_9: Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti sandhimhi ca samale ca saṅkaṭire ca.
atk-s0201a:2889_14: Sandhisamalasaṅkaṭireti sandhimhi vā samale vā saṅkaṭire vā.
atk-s0201a:2889_15: Sopi hi baddhagatto viya niccalo jhāyati.
atk-s0201a:2890_0: Nirayaṃ upapajjantīti sace māro manussānaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā evaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0201a:2890_3: Sarīre pana anadhimuccitvā visabhāgavatthuṃ vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a:2890_4: tadā kira so bhikkhū khippaṃ gahetvā macche ajjhottharante viya,
atk-s0201a:2890_7: sunakhehi saddhiṃ araññe migavaṃ carante viya,
atk-s0201a:2890_13: Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi vippaṭisārārammaṇaṃ passitvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti –
atk-s0201a:2890_17: Evaṃ te manussā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne sīlavante akkosantā apuññaṃ pasavitvā apāyapūrakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2891_2: Pharitvā vihariṃsūti na kevalaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2891_3: Kakusandhassa pana bhagavato ovāde ṭhatvā ime cattāro brahmavihāre nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0201a:2892_1: Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vāti paṭisandhivasena āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ vā,
atk-s0201a:2892_3: Siyā cittassa aññathattanti somanassavasena aññathattaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0201a:2892_4: Saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantīti idhāpi purimanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0201a:2892_5: Yathā hi pubbe vippaṭisārakaraṃ ārammaṇaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0201a:2892_7: So kira tadā manussānaṃ dassanaṭṭhāne bhikkhū ākāse gacchante viya,
atk-s0201a:2892_11: ākāse cīvaraṃ pasāretvā kāyaṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpente viya,
atk-s0201a:2892_13: taruṇasāmaṇere ākāse ṭhatvā pupphāni ocinante viya katvā dassesi.
atk-s0201a:2892_14: Manussā araññagatāpi vanagatāpi vihāragatāpi pabbajitānaṃ taṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā āgantvā aññesaṃ kathenti –
atk-s0201a:2892_18: Tato manussā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkarontā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā saggapathapūrakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2893_3: asubhānupassino kāye viharathāti bhagavā sakalajambudīpaṃ āhiṇḍanto antamaso dvinnampi tiṇṇampi bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0201a:2894_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato methunadhammasamāpattiyā cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2895_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato rasataṇhāya cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2896_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato lokacitresu cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2897_2: bhikkhuno cetasā bahulaṃ viharato lābhasakkārasiloke cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
atk-s0201a:2897_3: upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhātī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā –
atk-s0201a:2898_3: āhāre paṭikūlasaññino sabbaloke anabhiratisaññino sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassinoti.
atk-s0201a:2898_5: Tepi bhikkhū imesu catūsu kammaṭṭhānesu kammaṃ karontā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sabbāsave khepetvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2898_6: imānipi cattāri kammaṭṭhānāni rāgasantāni dosamohasantāni rāgapaṭighātāni dosamohapaṭighātāni cāti.
atk-s0201a:2899_1: Sakkharaṃ gahetvāti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ tiṭṭhanapamāṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0201a:2899_4: otāraṃ alabhanto idāni sahatthā upakkamitukāmo aññatarassa kumārassa sarīre adhimuccitvā evarūpaṃ pāsāṇaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0201a:2900_2: Sakkharā panassa sīsakaṭāhaṃ abhinditvā aṭṭhiṃ āhacceva nivattā.
atk-s0201a:2900_3: Nāgāpalokitaṃ apalokesīti pahārasaddaṃ sutvā yathā nāma hatthināgo ito vā etto vā apaloketukāmo gīvaṃ
atk-s0201a:2900_6: Yathā hi mahājanassa aṭṭhīni koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca ṭhitāni,
atk-s0201a:2900_9: Buddhānaṃ pana saṅkhalikāni viya ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni,
atk-s0201a:2900_10: tasmā pacchato apalokanakāle na sakkā hoti gīvaṃ parivattetuṃ.
atk-s0201a:2900_11: Yathā pana hatthināgo pacchābhāgaṃ apaloketukāmo sakalasarīreneva parivattati,
atk-s0201a:2900_13: Tasmā bhagavā yantena parivattitā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya sakalasarīreneva nivattitvā apalokesi,
atk-s0201a:2900_17: ayaṃ dūsī māro pāpaṃ karonto neva pamāṇaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0201a:2901_0: Sahāpalokanāyāti kakusandhassa bhagavato apalokaneneva saha taṅkhaṇaññeva.
atk-s0201a:2901_1: Tamhā ca ṭhānā cavīti tamhā ca devaṭṭhānā cuto,
atk-s0201a:2901_3: Cavamāno hi na yattha katthaci ṭhito cavati,
atk-s0201a:2901_5: “sahāpalokanāyā”ti ca vacanato na bhagavato apalokitattā cutoti veditabbo,
atk-s0201a:2901_7: Uḷāre pana mahāsāvake viraddhattā kudāriyā pahaṭaṃ viyassa āyu tattheva chijjitvā gatanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2901_8: Tayo nāmadheyyā hontīti tīṇi nāmāni honti.
atk-s0201a:2901_9: Chaphassāyatanikoti chasu phassāyatanesu pāṭiyekkāya vedanāya paccayo.
atk-s0201a:2902_2: Saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyyāti ayasūlena saddhiṃ ayasūlaṃ hadayamajjhe samāgaccheyya.
atk-s0201a:2902_3: Tasmiṃ kira niraye upapannānaṃ tigāvuto attabhāvo hoti,
atk-s0201a:2902_5: Athassa hi nirayapālā tālakkhandhapamāṇāni ayasūlāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni sajotibhūtāni sayameva gahetvā punappunaṃ nivattamānā, –
atk-s0201a:2902_6: “iminā te ṭhānena cintetvā pāpaṃ kata”nti pūvadoṇiyaṃ pūvaṃ koṭṭento viya hadayamajjhaṃ koṭṭetvā,
atk-s0201a:2902_7: paṇṇāsa janā pādābhimukhā paṇṇāsa janā sīsābhimukhā koṭṭetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0201a:2902_8: evaṃ gacchantā pañcahi vassasatehi ubho ante patvā puna nivattamānā pañcahi vassasatehi hadayamajjhaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0201a:2903_1: Sā kira mahāniraye vedanāto dukkhatarā hoti,
atk-s0201a:2903_3: evaṃ mahānirayadukkhato ussade vipākavuṭṭhānavedanā dukkhatarāti vadanti.
atk-s0201a:2903_5: sūlena paharantassa pahāro ṭhānaṃ na labhati parigalati,
atk-s0201a:2904_3: Īdiso nirayo āsīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne nirayo devadūtasuttena dīpetabbo. Kaṇha-
atk-s0201a:2904_6: Majjhe sarassāti mahāsamuddassa majjhe udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā nibbattavimānāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti,
atk-s0201a:2904_8: pabbatamatthake jalitanaḷaggikkhandho viya ca nesaṃ acciyo jotanti,
atk-s0201a:2904_10: tesu vimānesu nīlabhedādivasena nānattavaṇṇā accharā naccanti.
atk-s0201a:2904_11: Yo etamabhijānātīti yo etaṃ vimānavatthuṃ jānātīti attho.
atk-s0201a:2904_14: Yo vejayantaṃ pāsādanti idaṃ cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2904_15: Sakkaṃ so paripucchatīti idampi teneva dīpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2905_0: Brahmaloke pabhassaranti brahmaloke mahāmoggallānamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi saddhiṃ tassa tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa bhagavato obhāsaṃ.
atk-s0201a:2905_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya devasabhāya sannipatitvā, –
atk-s0201a:2905_2: “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko.
atk-s0201a:2905_3: Yo idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā”ti cintentasseva brahmagaṇassa cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmagaṇassa matthake
atk-s0201a:2905_4: nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0201a:2905_5: Tepi gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā paccekaṃ disāsu nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0201a:2906_3: Ye ca bhūmisayā narāti bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā ca uttarakurukā ca.
atk-s0201a:2906_8: Āsaṃ mā akāsi bhikkhūsūti bhikkhū vihesemīti etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsi.
